K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-10: shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-11: shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje za byed ma zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-12: shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje 'dren ma zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-13: shin tu gsod ma chen mo rdo rje sbor ma zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-14: shin tu gsod ma chen mo'i 'khor rab tu mang po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-15: de dag la sogs te rdul phra rab snyed dang thabs cig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7a-16: yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo sa nga sho ri kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khril te mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la @7b shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-1: gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-2: thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-4: rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des dbyings kyi ngang la mi g-yo bar mnal bzhin du yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi glu 'di blangs te rnam par bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-6: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-7: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-8: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-9: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-10: zhes bskul nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-12: nam mkha' dvangs pa las zla ba dri ma med par shar ba lta bu'o; ;de nas yum sa nga sho ri ka la gzigs te 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:7b-14: nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bkye ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-0: de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las @8a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-1: byang chub kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-2: rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-3: rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-4: rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-5: rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-6: rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-10: rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-11: rol pa sna tshogs kyi sgeg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-18: rol pa sna tshogs kyis gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-25: rol pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-26: de nas yum kun tu bzang mo des spyan zim bag gis rnam par 'dud pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bltas te rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas rol pa chen po'i glu 'dis gsol pa btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-27: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8a-28: longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod @8b bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-1: thabs kyis rol pa bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des glu des bskul bar thugs su chud nas bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen por rnam par bzhengs te rnam par 'gying ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-4: gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-5: rnam par bshad pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-8: smin ris kyi 'bri ku ta bsgyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-9: sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-11: thams cad la mtshan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-14: med pa thams cad la gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun la khyab par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-15: de dag gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-16: de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang mo de ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-17: yang rnal 'byor pa'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs te cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-18: ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rol pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-19: thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i; ;'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:8b-20: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi @9a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-1: bdag po des rdo rje rol pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-2: de nas yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-3: dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa la 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-4: de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa'i de kho na'i glu 'dis bskul te gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-6: yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-7: khyab pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-8: gzi brjid sprin dpung rol pas bsgyings pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-9: thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-11: yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-12: snyan pa'i byin rlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-13: yan lag rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-14: seng+ge sgra yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston; ;ae ma ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-15: ye shes snying po nyi ma lta bu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-16: ye shes byin rlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-17: thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-18: rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-19: mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9a-20: sdug bsngal rgya mtshos bcings pa thabs kyis grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-0: ma rig mun pas ldongs @9b pa'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-1: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-3: ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-4: rnal 'byor theg chen rdo rje kun 'dus rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-5: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-7: zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-9: 'dzum pa mdzad pas thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byams klas pa khyab par shar bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-10: 'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje he ru ka rab tu mang po'i tshogs shar bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-11: de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag 'khor so so'i zham 'bring bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-12: de dag las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab pas mun pa'i klong thams cad gsal bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-13: rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-14: rig pa'i chos kyi char dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:9b-15: rig pa'i chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-0: rig pa'i chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste 'byams klas pa'i nam mkha' @10a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-1: la sgra sna tshogs phan tshun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-3: snrel zhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long chad par byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-4: mchod pa'i char yang mngon par phab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-5: rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ling long chad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-6: rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-7: rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang aa la la ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-9: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag kyang gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-11: rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-12: 'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-15: ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-16: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-17: snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-19: rdo rje 'du bar bsdus pa yi; ;dam tshig chen po'i rig 'dzin rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-20: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-21: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral 'khod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10a-22: rigs ma yin pa rigs min 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-0: skal @10b pa bzang po'i dam tshig 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-2: de las 'das na de rlag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-3: h'um kro dha dzva la sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-4: raksha dzva la sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-5: yaksha dzva la sa ma ya; tsitta dzva la sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-6: zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis zhal ljags kyi dbang po 'od me dpung chen po las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-7: srin po 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-8: gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-9: za byed 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba brgyud mar byung bas ru tra can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-30: bsam ngan la sogs pa brlags te mi gnas par gyur cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-31: rmad du byung ba nyid du mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-32: de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-33: 'khor mang po dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:10b-35: ae ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-0: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhal gyi mdangs phyung ste 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi @11a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-2: mdzes shing bde ba dang ldan pas thams cad rangs par byas pas snod du rung bar rnam par sbyangs nas 'od de dag 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-4: gsang ba'i nges pa rgyud mi 'grel pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-6: rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po sgra 'dis bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-11: pu ti aa ho ku la ma tong byid ta ba dra aa mo gha a'i shva ra sa ya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-12: gu ti aa la la ho zhes cang mi gsung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-17: ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11a-18: rnam par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la zhal gzigs te 'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-0: de nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems des bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs nas rang gi mchan ma gnas ldar reg par byas na lce padmo'i steng du bzhag nas lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor @11b gyi lugs su seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis byas nas stong pa'i zhal du bltas te rdo rje rgyal po tshogs bdag dgongs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-1: chos kyi rgyal po mi g-yo rgyal tshul mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-2: rgyal mchog rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-3: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-5: zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-6: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje las kyi bka' ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;badzra karma tsakra satva ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-8: rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo gcig sems dpa' rdo rje'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob par gyur te; rnam par rol pa chen po shin tu bla brkyal ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-9: byin gyis brlabs nas kun tu mi bzo bar rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen por gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-10: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag tu glangs te stobs sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:11b-12: glu sna tshogs rdo rje tshig tu len cing rdo rje rgya gram las kyi 'khor lo de lan rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas grangs gnyis dang lnga bsgyur bas zhing khams mtha' dag rnam par g-yos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-15: kun tu rab tu chem par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-17: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sha stag tu gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-20: rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gdan la 'gying bag gi tshul gyis rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-21: de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-28: 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12a-34: byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi phyi mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-0: snying rje thams cad kyi bdag @12b po; ;sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsun /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-2: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mes chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-3: mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi dad dpon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-4: bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-6: ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-8: thog ma dang tha ma med pa mnyam pa'i dus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-9: pha mtha' las kyang pha mtha'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-10: dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-11: 'byams klas pa'i dus nas bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-12: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-13: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing gnas pas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-14: rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-15: kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-16: de 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal pa las 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-22: sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la logs su btud de lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas te rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-23: tshogs kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-24: 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:12b-25: sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-2: rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-3: ngo mtshar khyod kyis spyod pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-4: bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-5: sgrub pa'i lam mchog dam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-6: tshig gis mtshon te gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-7: aa la la ho zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-8: de nas dam pa rdo rjes rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid bag tu tshig tu mtshon te smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-11: rgyal ba'i sras pos cang mi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-12: mi gsung bas ni rgya cher bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-13: bshad du med pa'i chos 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-14: rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-15: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-16: rnam par brjod par mi bzhed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-17: rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-18: skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-19: ma skyes par yang snying por bzhed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-20: snying po'i don du gang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-21: tshig tu smra ba legs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-22: spros pa nyid na gol ba zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-23: rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-24: de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-25: bka' mi stsal bar dgongs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-26: dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-27: ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-28: dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-29: ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-30: tshig tu spro ba ma yin na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13a-31: mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-0: tshig la @13b zhib cing don la rtsing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-1: tshig phyir blo 'brang rtsal zhan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-2: dkri phyir bsam pa rangs bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-3: ma dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-4: cho 'phrul tshig gis mtshon pa ni; ;bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-5: gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-6: mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-7: gsal bar bkod de nges brjod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-8: rgya chen 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-9: nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-10: rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-11: stong par sbas pa'i don 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-12: dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis; ;mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-13: sbas pa'i don 'byin gsal byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-14: s'a lu phub khros snang me bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-15: gsal bteg snang rnyed la ler 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-16: zab mor spyod pa la mos pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-17: gang zhig don la 'dris pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-18: gsang sngags spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-19: mthun pa'i dmigs bcu dper bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-20: rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-21: sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-22: gzugs brnyan dri za grong khyer dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-23: brag ca chu zla mig yor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-24: chu bur 'khrul dang mgal mer snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-25: sgrub dang gsang sngags spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-26: grub pa dang ni gnas dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-27: bzlas pa'i sgra dang phyag rgyar rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:13b-29: ji ltar sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-2: sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-3: dbang po yid 'phrog cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-5: de ltar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-6: yig 'bru rdzas kyi sbyor pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-7: grub par snang yang rang bzhin med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-8: ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-9: zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-10: drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-11: byis pa gdungs pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-12: chu yis 'du shes ci bskyed kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-13: tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-14: gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-15: rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-16: mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-17: de nyid stong pas ming mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-18: dper na rmi lam rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-19: skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-20: thang gcig skad cig yud tsam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-21: lo la sogs pa de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-22: bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-23: sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltar; ;de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-24: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-25: spyod pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-26: brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-27: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-28: dper na gdong dang me long la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-29: brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14a-30: red par gyur pa ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-0: de bzhin sngags kyi @14b dngos grub kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-1: sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-2: brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-3: gsol thob dmigs pa ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-4: dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-5: mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' ngos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-6: dri za'i gsungs ni gar byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-7: grong khyer de yang de nas byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-8: byung nas de yang mi rtag ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-9: gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-10: chos sam yid kyi mkha' ngos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-11: rnal 'byor gsang bdag gar bskyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-12: de nyid gnas pa'i gzhal med khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-13: byung yang de la gnas mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-14: brag ca grags pa'i mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-15: dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-16: ji bzhin sgra ltar brag ca 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-17: byung yang sgrar thos dmigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-18: de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-19: dper na med las yod btags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-20: mtshan ma la brten stong pa'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-21: brjod pa tsam du bstan par zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-22: ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-23: sgrib med mkha' las zla shar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-24: gzugs brnyan dvangs pa'i chu nang snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-25: snang yang gzung pa'i rtog med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-26: de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-27: sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-28: phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin ngo la snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-29: de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-30: ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:14b-31: chu las chu bur rnam par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-0: @15a *// de yang gcig gi rnam pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-1: mang pa'i rnam grangs du ma 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-2: sdud cing phyir yang dum bur 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-3: de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi; ;ting 'dzin rnam pa mang por 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-4: 'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-5: spros bral dngos po stong pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-6: srog dang shed can byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-7: sems can pa la sogs par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-8: mig nad ngo la rdzas ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-9: 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-10: de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-11: cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul pa; ;snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-12: 'khrul pa sna tshogs snang bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-13: rnal 'byor can gyis de ltar blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-14: ji ltar mgal me'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-15: gang dag lag na mgal me thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-16: bskor na 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-17: de la 'khor lo'i rang bzhin med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-18: de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-19: mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-20: ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-22: de phyir mtshan ma'i chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-23: mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-24: rtog pa'i bag chags ci byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-25: chos kun dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15a-26: rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-0: ma byung ma skyes @15b dbyings nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-2: yon tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-3: gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-5: skad cig gcig la de la 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-6: de bas yid bzhin rin chen 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-7: ldog pa med pas dang du blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-8: don dam yang dag gter gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-9: rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-10: gang rtogs de 'thob gcig pu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-11: 'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-12: bdag med gnyis bral bde chen klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che; ;ye nas lhun grub 'dus ma byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-14: thig le chos nyid ye 'byams pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-15: kun khyab brdal bas snying por 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-16: mi dmigs spros bral byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-17: zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-18: mkha' la mdud pa gting dpag dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-19: rnal 'byor dmigs ldan blo chung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-20: gang zhig rtsal zhan de rtog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-21: g-yor mo'i tshul du bdag brtag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-22: brtags kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-23: dper na nyi ma'i snying po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-24: mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-25: de brtags don de mi rtogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-27: de 'drar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-28: zab mo'i don la cir brtags kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-29: yang dag don de mi mthong gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:15b-30: blo zhan byis pa ga chad brgyal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-0: @16a *// brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-1: rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-2: gang zhig de don mi rtogs phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-3: g-yang sar ltung ba ci cha yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-4: gdod nas ma thos shin tu dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-5: bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-6: mi rtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-7: byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-8: bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-9: bstan du med cing go bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-10: tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-11: 'di zhes bstan du ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-12: med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi phyed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-13: mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-14: yid kyi me long gsal byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-15: nam mkha' dag la rab brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-16: snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-17: nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-18: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-19: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-20: nam mkha' gang min rjod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-21: brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-22: dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-24: de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-25: rjod pa de nyid rnam rtog lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-26: rnam rtog de yi ming brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-28: de 'drar sems kyang de ltar blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-29: sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16a-30: de bzhin chos kyang grub ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-0: sems dang chos nyid gnyis @16b med de; ;sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-1: chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-2: chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-3: bla med byang chub chen por bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-4: sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-5: rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-6: de bzhin sa gzhi chen po ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-7: bla med byang chub myu gu skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-8: me yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-9: rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-10: rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-11: mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-12: chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-13: nyon mongs gdung ba kun sim byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-14: sman gyi rang bzhin yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-16: de ltar rtsi yi rang bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-18: de bzhin rno dbal rang bzhin pas; ;sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-19: nyi ma lta bur snang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-20: mun khang snang ston sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-21: ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-22: brtan po mi 'gyur g-yo ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-23: rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-24: mi g-yo ba la byin rlabs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-27: gnyis su snang ba ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-28: sems kyi rang bzhin bzang ngan las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-29: gnyis kyi 'du shes phye ste bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:16b-30: sems las yang dag ye shes 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-0: de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal @17a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-2: chos dang sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-3: dge 'dun yang ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-4: 'di las pha rol phyin tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-6: 'di las rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-7: dri med rin chen dpa' sbyin 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-8: de bzhin rdo rje dpag med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-10: 'di las phyag rgya sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-11: rig pa'i snying po thams cad 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-13: sdug bsngal nga rgyal phrag dog 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-14: gti mug dag kyang de bzhin te; ;'di las khams gsum thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-15: skyes pa bud med ma ning 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-18: ri dang skye bo de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-19: nam mkha' dang ni rlung dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-20: sreg pa'i me ni rab tu 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-21: 'di las sa dang chu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-22: rdo dang sa bon myu gu 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-23: de bzhin glog dang skar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-24: nyi ma zla ba sprin rnams 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-25: de bzhin spyod dang mi spyod kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-27: dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-28: sprin dang na bun khug rlangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-29: zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-30: snang yang nam mkha' bzhin du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17a-31: de bzhin sems kyi nam mkha' las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-0: mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul @17b ci byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-1: chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-2: rnal 'byor can gyis blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-3: de lta bu yi sems nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-4: rtogs dang ma rtogs rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-5: lta ba'i khyad par so sor blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-6: rtog pa can gyi ngo ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-7: rtog pa 'khrul pa'i ngo bor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-8: kun tu nyer 'jog lam tshor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-9: kun tu rdul gyi phung por snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-10: tshogs spyod snying rje nyer 'jog la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-11: thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-12: de nyid mnyam par shes gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-13: nam mkha'i rang bzhin mthong bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-14: ye shes rang snang nam mkha' la; ;nam mkha' nyid du snang bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-15: brjod bral mthong med dmigs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-16: mthong ba med pa'i don 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-17: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-18: bde gshegs snying po byang chub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-19: dgongs pa 'di las gang mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-20: lta ba de dang ldan bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-21: dam tshig nam mkha' lta bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-22: bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-24: srung ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-25: dus gsum rgyal bas gsungs mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-26: srung ba'i mdo ni gcig tu 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-27: nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-28: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i dam tshig bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-29: de yang bsrung du med na bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-30: gzhan pa theg pa chung ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:17b-31: bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bsrungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-1: yon chos la blang dor byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-2: bsrung dang bral ba'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-3: bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-4: de bzhin pa yi dam tshig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-5: ji bzhin pa yi blo gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-6: brjed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-7: bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-8: bsrung med nam mkha'i dam tshig 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-9: ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-10: sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-11: byis pa rnams ni tha tshig sdom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-12: bden gnyis rgyu la ston par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-13: bla med mchog la dam tshig spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-14: gcig gi don las ma g-yos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-15: 'dul dbang ngo la so sor grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-16: kho na nyid ldan dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-17: de dang gang ldan dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-19: de phyir dam tshig chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-20: nam mkha' 'dra bar dpa' bos bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-21: rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-22: dam chig 'di las yong mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-23: spyod pa dag gi khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-24: chos nyid bya rtsol kun bral la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-25: sgrub dang bsgrub pa'i dmigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-26: 'khrul pa gcod pa'i skye bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-27: dmigs med byang chub bde chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-28: sdug bsngal rtsol sems bcug pas nor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-29: bya ba med pa'i chos nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-30: nyon mongs bya med spyad pas 'khrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18a-31: rang byung lhun grub gnas gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-0: byis pa'i spyod @18b pas ci btsal dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-1: gang zhig 'dod de ci zhig sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-2: ci spyad ci bsgrubs ci btsal yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-3: sdug bsngal nyid de byang chub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-4: dmyal ba sangs rgyas chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-5: sdug bsngal byang chub lam nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-6: nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-7: theg pa'i khyad par ci bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-8: byed rtsol bcas pa thams cad 'khrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-9: bla med byang chub gegs su che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-10: gang zhig btsal med bde chen don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-11: sems kyi klong 'dis ma mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-12: sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-13: byis pa don med gyis na 'khyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-14: btsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-15: rtsol ba'i spyod pas ci zhig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-16: 'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-17: tshig 'dzin nor pa'i rtsol byar med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-18: bgrod du med pa'i chos nyid la; ;bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor ming dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-19: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-20: rtog sems bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-21: btsal med pa yi chos nyid la; ;btsal med ye nas lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-22: mtha' dbus med pas brdal pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-23: phyi nang med pas ye gsal khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-24: skyon yon med pa lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-25: bsgrub tu med pas btsal sems bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-26: gzung du med pas dmigs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-27: thams cad mkhyen pas byin rlabs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:18b-28: gdod nas byang chub snying por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-2: des na gcig las med bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-3: spyod mthun rtsol ba'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-4: rnam rtog spyad pa so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-6: rgyu 'bras mi slu bden don spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-7: mi dmigs pa la nam mkhar spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-8: de ltar spyod pa kun spyod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-9: dam pa'i don de spyod mchog nyid; ;dam par gyur pa thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-10: dam pa'i spyod pa de las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-11: skyes bu mchog gis de skad bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-12: the tshom med par shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-13: ma spyod byang chub de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-14: bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-15: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-16: ting 'dzin zhes ni gdags su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-17: bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-18: de bzhin ma bsgoms stor ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-19: bsgom chos sna tshogs cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-20: bsgoms nas de yi ngang mi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-21: de bas byis pa'i spyod yul yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-22: dper na byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-23: sa la sogs pa gzugs sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-24: mdzes par byas nas skad cig mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-25: mthong ba nyid na ma grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-26: skad cig kho nas zhig gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-27: sa la sogs pa'i rdul du snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-28: de bzhin rnal 'byor byis pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-29: gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs bsgoms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19a-30: sems kyi bye brag skad cig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-0: yid @19b kyi rgyu ba sna tshogs 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-1: byung ba bzhin du de ma grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-2: sems kyi skad cig dran pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-3: yid kyis dmigs pa rgyun chad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-4: byung chor chad pa'i mtha' spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-5: chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-6: brjod med rgyun mi 'chad par dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-7: de don phyin ci ma log par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-8: rjed med ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-9: ci phyir chos kyi dbyings nyid ni; ;nam mkha' lta bur 'dus ma byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-10: bsam du med pas nam mkha' 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-11: brjod du med pas gzugs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-12: kun gzhi kun tu nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-13: yid ni mkha' la nyi shar 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-14: rnam shes nyon mongs sprin gyis khebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-15: 'du byed rlung gis kun bskyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-17: rnam shes mtshan ma'i rtog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-18: kun gzhi nam mkha' mthong mi ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-19: kun gzhi mthong nyid chos sku ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-20: 'di don nam mkha' ma brjed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-23: gzugs kyi dngos po cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-24: sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-25: bde chen sangs rgyas thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-26: dgongs pa 'di las yong mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-27: snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-28: ting 'dzin chen por gnas bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:19b-29: 'di las glags te ci zhig tshol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-0: rgyal bas btsal kyang yong mi @20a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-1: rnyed; ;'di las gzhan du gang tshol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-2: btsal ba nyid na tshe chad 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-3: gzhan nam dman pa'i sgo rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-4: ting 'dzin med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-6: de dag la ni gang spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-7: then tsher mig ni nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-8: phra rab then thag 'dzud pa ltar; ;byis pa las gang byed pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-9: shed can dag gis byar mi rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-10: shed can spyod pa'i nam mkha' de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-11: then tsher nam mkhar shong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-12: de bas gzhan la bstan pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-13: bstan na byis pa ga chad 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-14: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-16: byin rlabs 'od kyi zer phreng tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-17: sgyu ma ltar snang mtshan mar thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-18: mi g-yo mtshan med rang bzhin dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-19: skye med sems kyis ma mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-20: byis pa 'drid pa'i rtsed mor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-21: dngos grub chen po'i sems nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-22: yid bzhin 'byung ba rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-23: ji ltar dmigs shing bsgyur bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-24: grub pa'i don chen thams cad rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-25: sems kyis sems kyi tshul mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-26: dngos grub ces de dag las 'ong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-27: gang gis stsol te su yis blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20a-28: stsal dang stsol bar byed mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-0: dper na chu dang me long @20b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-1: mkha' dang ral gri shel la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-2: gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-3: rnyog med la sogs bltas gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-4: chu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-5: de la ngo mtshar che mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-6: sems kyi chu gsal nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-7: nyon mongs sprin gyis rnyog med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-8: dngos grub nyi zla skar tshogs bkram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-9: sgrib med byin rlabs ngang gis 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-10: kun gzhi nam mkha'i snying po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-11: nyon mongs sprin gyis gting spungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-12: shes rab rlung gis ma gtor bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-13: ga zha mkhan gyi spyo 'dri yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-14: sgrib gsal chos nyid gsal 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-15: ji ltar chus gsher byis pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-16: nyi ma sprin ldan grib ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-17: shin tu bsgribs par gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-18: sprin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-19: kha yi dbugs kyis bus byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-21: de phyir rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-22: sems nyid don la rnam brtags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-23: kun gzhi rtsa ba shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-24: sems nyid de la bltas gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-25: rtsa ba dang ni gang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-26: dus dang tshig dang log gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-29: ji ltar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-30: nan gyis mtshan pa'i dngos grub dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:20b-31: byis pa'i sems kyis blang 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-0: de yang mtshan mas de rangs @21a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-2: dper na me yi rang bzhin dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-3: sa dang nags tshal sreg byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-4: rgyu rnams tshogs pa'i bden pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-5: med las yod pa'i bden par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-6: de ltar mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-8: mtshan ma'i rgyu rnams tshogs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-9: mtshan ma rangs pa'i mtshan mar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-10: shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-11: byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-12: dam pa'i don la cher dmigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-13: gsang mchog rig pa'i dngos grub myur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-14: mtshan mar mi rtog rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-15: zab mo'i don chen go ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-16: nges pa'i don gyis thag bcad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-17: mnyam pa'i don la yid ches bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-18: ji ltar mkha' la tshig tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-19: ngang du brjod pas rjod byed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-20: brjod pa'i tha snyad dang bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-21: ji ltar 'khrigs kyi smig rgyu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-22: snang ba nyid na med pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-23: chos so cog gi rang bzhin gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-24: gsal ba nyid na de mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-25: thabs chen gting zab shes rab lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-27: gtos ches yangs pas lam gnyis bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-28: dbus mtha' mi dmigs mnyam pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-29: gcig tu mnyam par chud nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21a-30: yul med tshol ba'i sems bral de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-0: blang dor gnyis kyi @21b mtha' spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-1: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-2: chos nyid dbyings su ro gcig phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-3: shes dang shes bya gnyis med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-4: ye nas shes nyid chos shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-5: chos nyid gzhan nas bcol ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-6: dper na sgyu ma'i bde sdug kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-7: bsal nas gnyi ga ma dmigs ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-9: mnyam par rang bzhin don gyis mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-10: ji ltar dus rnams thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-11: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-12: sgros tshig rjes su ma 'brangs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-13: mnyam 'gyur dus rnams ga la dmigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-14: mkha' la ngang gis gzugs med phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-15: dmigs su zin par mi 'gyur bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-16: sems kyis ma skyes don mi dpogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-17: skyon dang yon tan gnyis 'byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-18: rtogs nas gnyis kyi don spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-19: rang bzhin mnyam par don bzhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-20: bsgom zhes ming du brjod par zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-21: gnyis su lta ba ma skyes phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-22: gnyis kyi 'du shes ci byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-23: rang byung zhi ba ma bkag chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-24: ye nas ma bcos don gyis gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-25: ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-26: mi gnas ye shes thugs dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-27: rig dang ma rig khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-29: rnam rtog med phyir zhi ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:21b-30: 'dzin par ma yin spros bral min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-0: drang ba'i don bstan ma gtogs @22a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-1: par; ;don la tshig gis brjod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-2: snang yang med pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-3: shes blo yod pa'i sems mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-4: mnyam nyid stong pa'i don 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-5: don ldan stong pa'i sgro mi 'dogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-6: ma bcos rang bzhin zhi ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-7: mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-8: mdo tsam du'ang mi dmigs na; ;byung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-9: thams cad mi gnas byang chub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-10: btsal nas grub pa ma yin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-11: sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul bral bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-12: spros bral ye shes snying por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-13: 'khor bar rtogs pa dug yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-14: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-16: sbyar legs dug nyid sman du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-17: 'khor ba'i las rnams de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-18: 'khrul snang dug gzer bzod dka' ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-19: ma rig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-20: rmi lam sgyu 'phrul mi zad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-21: shin tu nyam thag gdungs pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-23: mgon btsun gzhan gyis mi phan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-24: bdud sel rtsi dang 'dra bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-25: yang dag lam mchog rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-26: dug nad smyo sangs 'byang ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-27: skad cig ma la mi bzod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22a-28: sman dang sman pa'i rtsol bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-0: sangs @22b nas de dag mi dmigs ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-2: rmi lam nad sel rtsol sgrub ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-3: sgrub dang ting 'dzin rtsol byed kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-4: 'khor ba stong rtogs nyid byang chub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-5: sgyu ma rgyu 'bras mi slu bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-6: blun rmongs ngo la de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-7: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal can dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-9: ma nor lam rig blo la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-10: de la rtsol thob rlom sems med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-11: sems nyid don dang ma mnyam na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-12: tshig gis mnyam pas don mi dpog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-14: log rtog sgyu ma'i tshul tsam snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-15: sems nyid ye sangs rgyas rig nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-16: rig pa'i don la brtson sbyor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-17: rang byung yon tan rtsal sdung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-19: byang chub sems ldan bsam rdzogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-20: ye shes mchog ldan mnyam nyid sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-21: ting 'dzin mchog ldan bla ma'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-22: dge bsags mchog ldan lus spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-23: bsod nams mchog ldan gzugs kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-24: rnam smin tshul gyis 'grub mi lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-25: btsal nas thob par mi byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-26: rgyu yi dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-27: dpyod pa'i sems nyid ting 'dzin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-28: sems can dus na don la sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-29: lhun grub sa la bgrod mi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-30: 'khor ba'i sa shes bde ldan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:22b-31: mi gnas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-1: sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma bkag tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-2: rang byung rtogs bral gcig tu mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-3: mnyam pa nyid kyi don brtson par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-4: chos nyid la yang chos nyid gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-5: mnyam pas mnyam zhes tshig brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-6: mnyam pa'i don dang mthun mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-7: byang chub de yang mi dmigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-8: mi gnas zhes ni gang brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-9: gnas dang dmigs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-10: gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-11: rgyu 'drar byang chub sems med na; ;dngos bral yul med stong pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-12: mkha' la rang bzhin mi gnas zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-13: bstan pa de ni yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-14: bsam gtan lus ni gtsor byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-15: gnas de lus kyi phyag rgya kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-16: mtshan mar mngon par zhen las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-17: mtshan med sems la bya rtsol med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-18: smig rgyu bzhin du lus red na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-19: gnas dang phyag rgyar dmigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-20: byed spyod ched du ston byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-21: bya med bya ba'i dmigs pa'ang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-22: de nyid ma skyes gzhi med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-23: gnas ba der lus bcos kha na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-24: zhen par 'chos lam spyod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-25: de nyid gzung 'dzin rnam rtog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23a-26: bsam gtan lus dben dben ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-0: mkha' la sems dben dben pa'i @23b mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-1: sems nyid dben pa'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-3: bla gab ri phug gzhal med min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-4: sems nyid dpag yas gzhal med mchog 'di ni rmad byung nor bu'i gzhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-5: phyi dang nang med kun tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-7: sems la ye shes tshogs 'dus mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-8: chos kun 'dus pas lus pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-9: dpag med rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-10: kun rdzob 'byor ba yo byad min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-11: sems nyid 'byor pa rdzas dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-12: lhag pa'i rdzas mchog 'di shes na; ;sgrub 'grub 'di la the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-13: sgom par byed pa bsgom pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-14: bsam bya dmigs su med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-15: 'di ltar sems kyi gsang sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-16: don la sems sgom ting 'dzin mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-17: bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-18: stong par sbas pa'i sems nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-19: mtshan mar 'das nas tshig shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-20: bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-21: tshig tu mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-22: sems nyid rang dag mnyam pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-23: mnyam pa'i don nyid lhag par med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-24: 'di don mnyam shes mnyam pa'i don; ;brtul zhugs spyod pa spyod min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-25: sems la sems gzhol rol spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-26: thabs che yangs pa spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:23b-27: byang chub don gyi phyi mo ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-2: gsol thob mtshan ma'i ming mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-3: dngos grub chen po rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-4: de ltar sems kyis sems mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-5: ye shes kyis ni chos nyid mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-6: dus kun tu ni skye 'gag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-7: sngon ma mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-8: de yang dngos po cang mi mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-9: thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-10: blo la 'gyus pa kho nar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-11: de lta bu yi don mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-12: mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-13: sgyu ma tsam du tshul shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-14: nam mkha' mnyam pa'i don snang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-15: kha cig dag ni de don la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-16: mthong ba ci yang med 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-17: snang ba zhes ni ci'i phyir gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-19: the tshom za 'gyur de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-20: mthong ba med pa'i don de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-21: yid kyi ngo la snang 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-22: snang zhes de phyir brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-23: de bas 'khrul pa ma zad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-24: nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-25: de nyid yid la snang 'gyur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-26: gzugs la snang bar 'gyur ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-27: sems nyid bden par ma mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-28: yid la mtshan med don gsal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-29: mtshan ma 'khrul par rgyu ba gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24a-31: de nyid bden par mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-0: de nas de ma thag tu @24b yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-1: yid kyi rgyu ba rgyun chad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-2: sngar 'khrul mtshan ma'i chos bral te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-3: des ni bden pa mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-4: de bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-5: sems ni yang dag lam nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-6: mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-7: gol med lam zhes 'dren pas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-8: de ltar bshad pa'i lam de yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-9: kun gyi rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-10: tshig tu mtshon te bshad mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-11: dmigs med tshig gi yul bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-12: de yi rang bzhin de yin na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-13: rang bzhin gzhi las mtshan mar g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-14: de la ming med ming btags rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-15: yin dang ma yin the tshom skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-16: de nas rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-17: de bsal don phyir mtshan ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-18: tshig gi tshogs kyi rnam grangs las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-19: sgo mo dpag tu med par bshad; ;de yis nges don rjes bcad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-20: thugs kyi klong nas bton pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-21: tshig gi sgron mes don btsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-22: lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-23: dran byung rjes su 'brangs na ni; ;'khor ba'i gnas su 'khor bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-24: dran 'byung g-yo ba ci bkag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-26: dran byung med par blun pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-27: mu stegs can lam mun par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-28: 'di zhes sems su gcig gzung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-29: mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-30: snga phyi med ces phyang bcad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:24b-31: med de chad pa'i mu can yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-2: cir g-yos skye 'gag byung ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-4: lam gyi chos nyid ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-5: dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-6: grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-7: rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-8: btsal na grib med dag mi rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-9: don nyid ye nas gnas bzhin du; ;sems nyid sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-10: sha thang par ni don tshol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-11: don med bdud kyi las yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-12: don dam tshig tu brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-13: nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-14: tshig tu sman dang dpyad bshad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-15: nad pa'i tshogs la mi phan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-16: sems nyid don du ma shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-17: tshig tu don brjod don mi rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-19: gzugs btang nas ni grib tshol 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-20: lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-21: ma rig ye shes tha dad min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-22: ma rtogs rtogs pa lam du gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-23: sems 'di sna tshogs par snang bas; ;sna tshogs sems su gcig pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-24: dper na gser du gcig pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-25: dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-26: byis pas so so'i ming du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-27: grags kyang gser gyi ngo bor gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-28: de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25a-30: ji ltar bltas rgyu der snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-0: snang yang sems las @25b gzhan mi dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-1: sgron mar 'bar ba'i rin chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-2: gal te ngan khung sbas gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-3: de nyid yon tan rang snang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-5: de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-6: lus ngan 'khor bar bying gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-7: rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-8: shes rab chos nyid mkha' la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-9: sems nyid nam mkhar 'drar mtshungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-10: kun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-11: byung tshor g-yo 'gog thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-12: rang bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-13: mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-14: 'gyur bas thams cad ngo bor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-15: ma bcos g-yo ba med nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-16: sna sogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-17: cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med; ;ji bzhin nam mkha'i ring bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-18: blo bzhag ma g-yengs kho nar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-19: de ni skyes mchog don po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-20: de sems dus gsum thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-21: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-22: de lta'i don la ring zhig nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-23: shes shing 'dris par gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-24: nges don mthong ba'i nyams drod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-25: don dang mjal ba'i rtags chen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-26: man ngag lung gis brgyan 'char te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-27: nges par don gsum myong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-28: de dag thog tu phebs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:25b-29: drod chen rtags su bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-2: 'khor ba'i chos la snying rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-3: byang chub sems kyang skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-4: mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-5: yid mi ches pa'i 'du shes skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-6: chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-9: 'di don ma shes 'gro ba rnams; ;rtsol sgrub dka' ba'i thabs chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-10: yang dag don tshol lam re ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-12: don de mthong bar yong mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-14: de ltar shes pa'i nyams drod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-15: skal dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-16: rgyus 'gros tshig gis ma bkrol bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-17: sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-18: smra ba'i sgo mor thams cad gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-19: don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-20: tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-21: de ni chos sku mnyam nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-22: dbyer med gnyis su med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-23: rten pa'i gsung thugs sku brnyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-24: de ni mtshungs pa yod min no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-25: zhi lus mthar 'gog skyon gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-26: de ni mtshungs pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-27: sa la slob pa'i sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-28: de yang mi mtshungs rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26a-29: rigs dang drang srong don dpyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-0: lus 'dra sems ni @26b yong mi mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-1: de phyir rnam dag lam che ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-2: sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-3: skal ldan 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-4: lam 'di shes par bya ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-5: btsal bar bya ba'i sems med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-6: lam 'di shes pa de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-7: dka' ba'i rtsol sgrub ma byas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-17: sems zhes bya'o; ;shes rab ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-23: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-24: zab pa zhes bya'o; ;gsang ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-25: gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-27: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:26b-42: dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-8: dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-16: kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni; chos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-22: de'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-27: chos thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir na gzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-28: mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di nas gshegs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-29: da ltar ston pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-30: de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-34: de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27a-36: bdag po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-1: yon tan zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-10: chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-13: sna tshogs su ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-14: thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-16: mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-17: de ltar yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-18: de'i phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o; ;de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-19: 'tsho ba chen po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-20: longs spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-21: yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-25: spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-27: phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-28: bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-29: nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-30: sgrub pa zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-31: sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-32: tshogs chen po zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-33: kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:27b-35: yul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-3: rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-12: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongs su shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-13: gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-17: rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-21: 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-22: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-24: 'khrul pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28a-25: de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-0: mu gsum shes te @28b chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-2: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-3: lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-4: yul dang gnyis su gyur pa'i phyir na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-6: dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-7: nges pa las log pa'i phyir don las gol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-8: mnyam pa las gol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-10: gzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-11: rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-15: kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-16: kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-19: thams cad nas byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-20: rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-21: sgor gsal zhing yul la dbang byed pa'i phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-25: reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:28b-26: 'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-3: dus su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-4: rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-14: bskams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-15: mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-25: chos skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-26: mtshan ma'i chos nyid can gyi phyir mthong ba'i chos nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-43: rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-44: mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sgyur ba'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-45: dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29a-46: rnam par g-yo ba'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-0: sgros su 'dogs pa'i spyod @29b pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-1: zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-2: kun tu 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-3: bla bkyal 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-4: chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-5: kun tu bdud kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-6: phyin ci log pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-7: gnyis la brten pa'i spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-8: 'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-10: glo bur du smin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-11: bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-12: bgrod par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-16: yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-17: rten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-22: dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-23: bde ba'i mu bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-25: dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-29: shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:29b-30: de bzhin du don gnyis dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:34b-25: mu stegs kyi khams su ltang ba'i sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:34b-26: srin po'i khams su ltung ba'i sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:34b-27: gnod sbyin gyi ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-3: sho gam gcan chen gyi ris su ltung ba'i sgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-4: dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i sgo'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-9: ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni; rtag par yang blta'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-20: de dang nye ba lnga dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-21: lci ba bzhi dang bcas pa'o ////

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-23: gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-25: srog gcod pa dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-26: ma byin par len pa dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-27: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang bcas pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-31: tshig khyal pa dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35a-34: log par lta ba dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams la spyod par 'dod pas lam 'di la bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-5: glong du gyur par gyis shig ces sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-6: rgyud pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-7: rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi le'u ste dang po'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-8: /de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che'i tshogs kyis rmad byung gi phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-9: sems dpa' chen po smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la bdag cag shin tu zhu bar spobs na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-12: smra ba'i seng+ge des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-14: ji ltar zhu ba'i don snang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-15: kun tu spobs pa skyed la zhu ba'i don gsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-16: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:35b-17: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis aa la la ho //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-0: @36a *// 'di'i don rgya cher bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-1: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-2: smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-8: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo gsal zhing rgya cher byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-9: rna lhogs la gus par nyon cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-16: grub pa thabs kyi sgo mo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-20: thub pa rigs kyi 'jug sgo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-21: grub pa lung gi gsang sgo'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-23: gsum gsum yod par 'dren pas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-24: gnyis pa'i sgo la'ang gsum yod de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-26: ting 'dzin goms pa'i sgo mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-27: smon lam grub pa'i sgo mor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36a-28: tha ma mthar phyin sgo mo la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-3: dam pa chen po'i mdzod gsum mo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-7: rjes su gang gis brtags byas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-12: rnam pa bcu zhes 'dren pas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-13: bcu nyid gang dang gang zhe na //
