K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-16: bslab pa 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-18: sbyor chen la 'jug gnas skabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-19: yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-20: rtog chen nyid la phebs skabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-21: de nyid gdeng du gyur pa'i skabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-22: las su rung ba'i skabs dang bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-23: bcu po de dag re re yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-24: skabs su sems dang chos phrad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-25: rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-26: byang chub sems ni gang zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:36b-27: 'di yi grangs kyang rnam pa bcu //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-2: de bzhin sbyor ba byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-3: 'jug pa'i sems dang dge ba'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-4: mi 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-5: gnas pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-6: byang chub sems zhes grags pas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-8: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-9: skabs bcu dag tu sbyor bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-10: gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-11: phra mo tsam gyi skar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-12: de bzhin skar ma tha mal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-13: skar ma chen po dag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-14: zla ba tshes gcig rnam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-15: gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-17: gzugs brnyan dag tu snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-18: dngos por snang ba cang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-19: chu zla lta bur gzung du med; ;sems kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37a-20: chos nyid gsal ba'i nyi ma gnyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37b-17: bcing bar bya ba 'gro ba ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:37b-22: mtho sar phyin cing rtse non pas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:38a-31: bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:38b-31: su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:38b-32: tshegs med gyi na'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:38b-33: bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-1: sgrub pa; ;kun gzhi gnas 'gyur man ngag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-2: gang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-3: dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-4: sems kyi gsang 'di sus mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-5: de dag man ngag ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-6: 'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-7: de dag tshegs med kyi nas 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-8: don rnams sgrub par gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-9: man ngag can gyis 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-11: bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-12: dper na kun tu rgyu ba'i mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-14: yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-15: bgrod pa'i lam gnas gcig las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-16: de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-17: brgyad khri bzhi stong chos bstan kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-18: bkri zhing drang ba'i tshig yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-19: bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-20: don rnams gcig tu sdud pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-21: bslab par bya ba dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-22: nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-23: 'di dag goms par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-24: bslab pa 'di la goms gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-25: lobs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-26: lobs pas lam la mkhas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-27: sngags kyi yon tan chen po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-28: rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-29: gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39a-30: thams cad thams cad bya'o cog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-0: @39b byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-1: dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-2: dper na nam mkhar rgya mtsho 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-3: ji ltar me dpung rgyal po 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-4: de yang de yul che chung gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-5: khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-6: rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-7: dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-8: che chung rim pa yod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-9: rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-10: thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-11: bab chod thad du 'jug pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-12: dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-13: rab dang glang chen bab mi bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-14: de yang rtsal sgying drag zhan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-15: la la thad du gcod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-16: la la bsegs su 'gro ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-17: la la chung zhig bshan thabs 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-18: de ltar rnal 'byor rgyu nyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-19: 'bras bu'i don la bab chod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-20: rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-21: ji ltar nus tshad der snang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-22: sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-23: sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-24: spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-25: dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-26: lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-27: thams cad gcig las med na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-28: grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-29: snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-30: chos rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:39b-31: kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-2: gzhi nyid rgyu yi kun gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-3: sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-4: snang ba don gyi kun gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-5: 'gyur ba med pa'i kun gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-6: btsal med gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-7: skabs lnga dag tu gnas 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-8: sa yi khyad par bgrod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-9: de yang gnyis kyi chos 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-10: kun kyang yongs kyi rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-12: dag don dang ni sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-13: rig 'dzin zhes ni rdzogs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-14: des na rtsal gyis khyad par gyis; ;dang po las kyi rnal 'byor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-15: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-16: rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-17: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-18: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-19: spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-20: sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-21: btsal ba'i yul ni chad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-22: nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa; ;rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-23: rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-24: longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-26: skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-27: skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-28: sna tshogs gter gyi khang pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40a-29: rgyal po'i mdzod du gyur pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-0: spyod sgo 'jug pa thams cad @40b kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-1: dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-2: rin chen sna rgu'i rim pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-3: so so'i las thabs mthong man gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-4: yul de gcig las med na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-5: yig tshang sgo rgu so sor spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-6: rgyal por gyur na de kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-7: dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-8: mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-9: blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-10: rig pa rtsal gyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-11: blta yul gcig las med na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-12: so sor 'jug sgo kun nas spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-13: dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-14: rtsal 'phang mthong man khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-15: skas kyi gdang bu rtsib ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-16: sa dang theg pa'i khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-17: mtho dman rim par snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-18: mnyam par gyur ba'i gzhi gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-19: mthun dang mi mthun don gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-20: dper na khang pa sgo mang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-21: sa dang theg pa so so'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-22: mi mthun so sor snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-23: so so'i theg pa'i sgo rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-24: 'jug pa la sogs ma sbyangs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-25: kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-26: gcig ste tha dad yongs kyis med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-27: de ni ri dang lhun po 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-28: kun tu rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-29: mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-30: don gyis de ltar yod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-31: des na chos rnams thams cad kyi; ;rtsa ba'i sems 'di yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-32: nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:40b-33: kun gyi rtsa ba shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-0: lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa @41a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-1: ste; ;lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-2: nye lam bde rnyed grub pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-3: rnyed pa'i lam nyid gang zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-4: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa yin te; ;sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-5: sa yi khyad par bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-7: rnam pa bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-9: bcos ma phra men spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-10: tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-12: 'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-13: kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-15: gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-17: dang po'i las can rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-18: bslab ba sbyong dang nges pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-19: dag dang ma dag gis sbyong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-20: bka' sdod las kyi dang po pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-21: gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-22: gal chen sbyong ba'i sa 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-23: gnas shing spyod pa'i sa yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-25: dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-26: gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-27: legs nyes stobs chen byed pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-29: g-yo dang thob dang brtan pa'i drod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-30: de bzhin rtags chen g-yo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41a-31: thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-0: rnal 'byor @41b rnam pa drug po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-1: bslab pa'i gnas bcu mthar 'byin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-2: ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-4: don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-5: dpyod sems 'jug pa'i shes pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-6: ngan song mi log dgon par 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-7: bar chad dag kyang de la byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-8: gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-9: spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-10: mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-11: gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-13: spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-14: mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-15: rtsal can blo yi bsti gnas sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-16: bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir chib pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-18: dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-19: rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-20: nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-21: yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-22: bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-24: goms par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-25: ngal bso ba la thams cad mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-26: mi ldogs la goms char med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-27: 'di dag sbyor ba gzhi gcig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-28: so so thun mong ma yin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-29: sgrib la sa zhes rtsi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-31: des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:41b-32: mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-1: pa la bzhag re re la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-2: ye shes re re 'char ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-3: tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-4: mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-5: mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-6: rmi lam dag dang sgra brnyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-7: mngon sum nges pa ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-8: rnal 'byor rdo rje gral sko ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-9: rdo rje rdo rje che ge mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-10: zhes ni nyid dang sa khams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-11: zhing khams kun tu bsgrags byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-16: rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-17: rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-18: khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-21: tshogs chen 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-22: gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-23: phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-24: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-25: mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-26: rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-27: bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-28: rol pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-29: bde ba che dang thig ler rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-30: gsum nyid du ni rdzogs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-31: yul don ye shes de sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42a-32: shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-0: sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod @42b la; ;rdzogs pa spyir chibs 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-1: bcu yi tha ma dang po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-2: mthar rdzogs kun gyi thog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-3: klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-4: sprin med nyi ma'i 'bum gyi bdal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-5: cir snang ci yang ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-6: mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-7: ji ltar bltas rgya der snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-8: theg mchog spyi rgya'i rlabs kyis bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-9: de yang lta ba'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-10: bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-11: lhun gyis grub dang klong yangs chub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-12: gsum rdzogs rang byung bdal bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-14: rnal 'byor can gyis bgrod par bya; ;gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-15: don gyi rjes ni tshol 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-16: tshig 'ga' thos pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-17: chog pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-18: khyed kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-19: yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-20: spyod par 'gyur bar byed mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-21: yang dag don du yong ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-22: chags sdang las la zhen mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-23: dam pa'i don la yong ma zhen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-24: longs spyod rgya cher byed mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-25: chos nyid don gyi ro mtshor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-26: bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-27: nyon mongs lnga dang yong ma bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-28: brtul zhugs rtog pa chom mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-29: gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong ma chom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:42b-31: thos pa tshig gi sgron ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-0: yang dag don gyi gser btsal @43a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-2: rkun mo byi la btags byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-3: gse khung skar khung kun dgag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-4: khang stong phang phung bshig nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-5: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-6: de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-7: yang dag don gyi lam tshol na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-8: rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-9: rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-10: mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-11: byung tshor skyon lnga bsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-12: rtog pa la yang gnyis yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-13: rags dang phra bar snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-14: de bzhin mtshan ma che chung gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-15: rgyu ba ring po thung du gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-16: de bzhin tshor ba gsal mi gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-17: byung tshor gnyis su snang ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-18: myur ba dang ni bul ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-19: 'di ni don la sgrib pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-20: rtog pa chen po'i gegs chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-21: ci phyir don de mi mthong phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-22: mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-23: kun tu 'thibs dang sprin phung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-24: na bun lta bur bsgribs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-25: yang dag mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-26: 'di yang bye brag gnyis gnyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-27: mun pa mun nag chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-28: kun nas 'thibs pa lta bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-29: kun tu 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-30: 'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-32: na bun gtams dang ban bun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43a-33: gnas ngan gsum dang mi'i gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-0: @43b 'dod khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-1: gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-2: nyan thos rang rgyal gnas su ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-3: ltung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-4: mtshan ma'i g-yeng ba rnam drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-5: rang bzhin yul la g-yeng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-6: de bzhin phyi rol g-yeng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-7: nang mtshan ma yi g-yeng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-8: yid la byed dang gnas ngan len; ;'di dag rab tu bsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-9: bsal nas don la mnyam bzhag tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-10: mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-12: byung tshor dbang gis g-yeng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-13: bying rmugs dbang gis 'thibs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-15: ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-16: phyal pa'i dbang gis med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-17: 'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-18: skyon chen de dag glan pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-19: sems kyi lon 'di rgyal bas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-21: rnam par mi rtog don tshol na; ;gcig pu dben pa'i sa bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-22: tshad ma gsum dang ldan pa'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-23: rnam par rtog pa'i rjes bcad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-24: yod med sngon thog ga las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-25: brtags pas rtog pa rtas las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-26: rtog pa sgyu mar rab shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-27: rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-28: des ni gnas ngan gsum mi ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:43b-29: rtog pa gang las byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-1: ba yin; ;mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-2: mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-3: des ni 'dod khams tha mar min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-4: mtshan ma gang las byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-5: dran pa rgyu ba dag las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-6: dran pa skyon du shes gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-7: rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-8: mthu des 'dod khams gnyis par min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-9: rgyu ba gang las byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-10: tshor ba dag las byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-11: dag cing skye bar bya ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-12: tshor ba sgyu mar shes gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-13: skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-15: tshor ba gang las byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-16: byung tshor phyi nang dag las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-17: dag cing skye bar bya ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-18: de nyid skyon du shes gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-19: de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni; ;'dod khams bzhi par mi ltung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-20: byung tshor gang las byung zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-21: sems kyi chos las byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-22: sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-23: sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-24: phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-25: sems nyid smig rgyu lta bu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-26: yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-27: de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-29: sems nyid yod pa'i dngos po 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-30: med ces bya bar mi lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44a-31: mu stegs can du ltung mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-0: bying @44b rmugs can du ma gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-3: sems can gnas su de mi 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-4: kun gzhi'i don la goms pas ni; ;nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-5: stong zhing zhi bar mi byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-6: rang rgyal lta bar de mi ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-7: rnam dag stong par mi byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-8: byang chub spyod par ltung ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-9: mnyam nyid stong pa'i don dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-10: so so tha dad mi 'byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-11: sa yi rim par mi ltung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-12: rim gyis spyang zhing 'phar ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-13: yang dag don gyi rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-14: ci la mi gnas mi len cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-15: ci yang mi mthong thos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-16: cir yang mi byed byed dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-17: ci yang thos pa rdul tsam med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-18: cir yang snang ba med pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-19: de ni snang ba dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-20: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-21: bsam du med pas de bzhin gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-22: rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-23: sems kyi gyin da skad cig mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-24: mi g-yo rgyun du dran par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-25: de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-27: drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-28: mngon shes dang ni ye shes 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-29: drod ni g-yo dang thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-30: rtags ni byung dang brtan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-31: cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-32: rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:44b-33: des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-0: @45a *// dper na mun pa sangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-1: snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-2: kun tu mthong dang thams cad gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-3: de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-4: bag chags mun pa kun bsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-5: ji ltar rlung gis sprin phyags ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-6: skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-8: ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-9: mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-10: skad cig ma yi don rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-11: sngon nas bsags pa'i mun pa sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-12: de ltar rig pa'i skyes bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-13: don la rig pa'i sgo bye zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-14: chos kyi mig dang de ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-15: mthong thos tshig le'u tshig bzhir bsdebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-16: sa pa yin pas don la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-17: chos kyi mig dang mi ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-18: mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-19: don gyi tha snyad ci brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-20: nor ma nor gyi don mi dpog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-21: tshig phyir blo 'brangs dmu rgod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-22: bslab pa'i sa dang lam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-23: tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-24: gzhan la ston par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-25: bstan na rdo rje bka' rkun de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-26: dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-27: gang dag tshul 'chos mkhan dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-28: don la blo shed ma bye bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-29: tshig dang yi ges khrid nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-30: mi shes bzhin du chos bstan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45a-31: sems can thams cad srog 'phrog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-0: mi shes chos @45b ston de bas lci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-1: de bas mnyam pa'i don 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-2: bstun te gcig car 'jug shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-3: bsgom pa'i yun ni ring thung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-4: las 'phro yod dang med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-5: nam grub snyam pa'i khar ma lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-6: mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-7: de ma thag tu rig pa 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-8: mnyam pa'i don las ma g-yos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-9: gzugs khams gnas su de mi ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-10: mnyam pa nyid la ma chags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-11: gzugs med khams su ltung mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-12: mnyam nyid mngon du gyur pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-13: nyan thos gnas su de mi ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-14: ci yang med pa'i don mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-15: sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-18: thams cad mi rtog skye med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-19: rtog pa'i mtha' spangs nam mkha'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-20: ji bzhin mi g-yo mnyam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-21: mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-22: yul med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-23: snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-24: nyi ma stong gi dkyil 'khor shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-25: mtshan ma'i chos rnams kun la khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-26: nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-28: thams cad 'byung ba'i yi ge aa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-29: ci yang 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-31: de yang rtsal gyi khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-32: dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:45b-33: thos dang mthong ba la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-0: @46a *// sems kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-1: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-2: rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-3: yan lag yi ge so so yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-4: rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-6: tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-8: mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o; ;yi ge'i ye shes las bskrun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-9: don byed pa dang phyag rgyar bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-10: rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha'i skas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-11: rlung bcing ba dang rgyun bzlog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-12: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhi la ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-16: gzhig dang spar ba la sogs te; ;bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-17: goms pa las su rung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-18: rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-19: bzlas pa'i mthar phyin grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-20: bcing pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-21: bsam pa las su rung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-22: don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-23: bya ba yongs su dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-24: don gcig yul la so sor snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:46a-25: des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-15: sha ni spros pa med pa'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-16: zhi bas thams cad grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-17: sha ni khur dang bral ba'i sgo; ;lci ba med pas thams cad grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-18: sa ni yang dag gsang ba'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-19: nges pas thams cad grol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-20: ha ni rgyu dang bral ba'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-21: rkyen dang bral bas grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-22: aa ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-23: mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-24: ai ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-25: gzugs dang bral bas thams cad grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-26: au ni thos pa med pa'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-27: sgra dang bral bas thams cad grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-28: ae ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-29: dri dang bral bas grol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50a-30: ao ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-0: rig dang bral @50b bas thams cad grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-2: cir yang snang bas thams cad grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-4: yod mthong snang grags chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-5: yi ge'i tshogs su mngon sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-6: yi ger ma gyur gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-7: chos nyid snying po'i nyi ma la; ;'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogs su 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-8: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-9: yig 'bru sna tshogs phra bkod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-10: dus gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-14: rdo rje snying po'i sa bon zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-15: rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-16: nyi ma'i 'od zer rin chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-18: rin chen snying po'i sa bon zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-19: rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-22: padma rigs kyi zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-24: cho 'phrul yi ge har gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-25: sna tshogs snying po'i sa bon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:50b-26: las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-2: thugs ni rdo rje ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-3: ye shes dam pas sprul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-4: rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-5: rdo rje rigs zhes bya bar bshad; ;yon tan ye shes rin chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-6: rin chen de las sprul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-7: rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-8: drin chen rigs zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-9: gsung gi ye shes padma ste; ;padmo ye shes las sprul pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-10: rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-11: padma rigs kyi zhing du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-12: 'phrin las bya ba sna tshogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-13: sna tshogs ye shes sprul pa yi; ;rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-14: las kyi rigs zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-15: sku ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-16: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-17: sprul pa rgyal ba dpag med la; ;de bzhin rigs zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-18: de bas rigs kyi gtan tshigs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-19: ma bcos sku ni de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-20: mi 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-21: yon tan kun 'byung rin chen rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-22: chags med gsung gi padmo'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-23: bya ba byed pa las kyi rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-24: sku yi sprul pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-25: de bzhin rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-26: thugs las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-27: rdo rje rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-28: yon tan yul gyi sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51a-29: rin chen rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-0: gsung @51b las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-2: mdzad pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-4: ci phyir rigs zhes bya zhen; ;dang po de las byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-5: bar du de yi bya ba byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-6: tha mar de yi rgyu 'dzin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-7: de phyir rigs zhes grags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-8: dper na me dang chu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-9: nam mkha' dang ni sa dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-10: gnas pa'i sems can mtha' dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-11: gnas rgyud nyid kyi ming 'dzin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-12: me la gnas pa'i sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-13: me yi yi dvags ma zhes zer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-14: chu la gnas pa'i sems can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-15: chu srin tva ra na zhes zer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-16: ci'i phyir lnga zhes bya zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-17: rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-18: sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-19: mdzad pa 'phrin las nyid dang lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-20: rig pa lnga dang lnga nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-21: thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-22: des na lnga zhes nges par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-23: ci'i phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-24: lnga po de las ma gtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-25: gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-26: sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-27: mtshan med pa las mtshan btags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-28: thams cad lnga po nyid las btags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-29: mtshan gyi bye brag thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-30: tha snyad tsam du gdags par zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-31: rigs med pa las rigs smos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:51b-32: 'dul ba'i dbang du lngar snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-0: dran pa'i don de dngos gzhi @52a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-1: med; ;ci yang med las ci snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-3: chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-4: gsang ba mchog gi bdag por bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-5: mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-6: sangs rgyas med cing sems can med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-7: 'khor ba med cing chos nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-8: dmigs pa med de mi dmigs med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-9: de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-10: rig dang ma rig tshul gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-11: de ltar shes pa rgyal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-12: sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-13: sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-14: sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-15: de ltar shes pa'i rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-16: byang chub phyir ni gang ma brnyes; ;ma brnyes gang yang de ma brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-17: brnyes pa med pa'i don mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-18: de ni brnyes pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-20: lam gyi ngo bo tshol 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-21: lam gyi rtags nyid dpes mtshon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-22: lam gyi don la goms par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-23: mi gnas mig ldan sgron ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-24: lam gyi rgyu la mkhas par bya; ;bag chags rtogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-25: sna tshogs dngos por snang mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52a-26: nam mkha' dag la smig rgyu 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-0: de yang gtan tshigs nges pa @52b yi; ;dpe yis mtshon te rtogs bya na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-1: mkha' la sprin phung 'ja' tshon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-2: char la sogs pa'i rgyun snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-3: nam mkha'i cho 'phrul gcig tu zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-4: rtag tu de ltar snang ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-5: dper na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-6: slu zhing 'drid pa cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-7: sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa snang bar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-8: rtag tu de ltar snang ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-9: dper na rdo yi dngos po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-10: sra zhing mkhregs pa'i dngos po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-11: btags sam phye mar byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-12: rlung gi mthu yis gtor byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-13: de la rang bzhin ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-14: dper na me yi rang bzhin dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-15: tshang tshing sbar sbur kun bsreg cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-17: chu yi mthu yis brlag 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-18: de la rang bzhin ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-19: dper na rdzas kyi dngos po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-20: me yi mthu yis bsreg 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-21: de la rang bzhin ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-22: shes pas zin pa'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-23: gzugs dang dran pa sna tshogs kyi; ;dbang po la sogs mdzes gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-24: phung po mi rtag shi 'phos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-25: dngos po brtan par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-26: gzugs rnams so sor zhig nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-27: rus pa dag kyang mi snang ste; ;zhig dang rul la sogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-28: tha mar ci yang mi snang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-29: ri bo chen po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:52b-30: dngos po brtan g-yo'i 'jig rten rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-2: bskal pa gsum gyis brlags byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-3: de la rang bzhin ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-4: des na dngos po'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-5: dngos por brtags pa ma yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-6: chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-8: 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams goms par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-9: zhes sems dpa'i rdo rje smra ba'i seng+ges rnal 'byor mchog gi lam gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-10: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-11: rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-12: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-13: ting nge 'dzin de'i byin gyis rlabs las zhing khams thams cad g-yos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-14: don yongs su rdzogs pa'i snga ltas byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-15: 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa rnams la la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-16: nyi zla'i steng na gnas shing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la lding bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-20: stong gsum chen po'i khams 'phen par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-22: chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53a-24: seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-0: de nas @53b sems dpa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis shin tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de la rnal 'byor gyis phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-2: cho 'phrul rgya cher gda' ba 'di don ji lta bu lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-4: bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-5: smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-8: don yongs su rdzogs pa'i ltas chen po yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-9: snga ltas kyi mtshan ma 'di dang sbyar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-10: 'dus pa chen po rnams sa nas sar shin tu 'phar zhing yang dag nges pa'i don mthong ba'i snga ltas yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-12: rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-14: sa non pa'i snga ltas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-16: don mthong ba'i snga ltas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-18: bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-19: sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-20: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs; legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-21: khyod kyis zhus pa'i don rgya cher bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-22: rna ba lhogs la gus par nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:53b-23: sgrub pa don gyi rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-2: spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-3: khams dang sa ni gar 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-4: mdo don tshul lngas lung bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-5: nges ba'i snga ltas byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-6: 'bras bu don gyi khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-7: cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-8: de nas yang dag bden pa 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-9: nges pa'i snga ltas rnam pa lnga; ;rgyu yi dus na 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-10: tshig gi brjod pa 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-11: blo rtsal las kyi khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-12: snang ba lus kyi snga ltas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-13: ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-14: mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-15: 'dun pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-17: mtshan ma gsal bar rgyud las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-18: dper na me yi snga ltas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-19: du ba'i mtshan ma rgyas par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-20: du ba gar byung gnas de na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-21: me nyid yod par nges pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-22: de bzhin chu yi snga ltas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-23: rlangs dang sngabs dang srog chags 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-24: de na chu nyid yod par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-25: rlung gi ltas kyang 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-26: sprin rnams rgyug cing dum bur 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:54a-27: des na rlung chen 'byung bar nges //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:55a-3: snang ba med par mthong bar 'gyur //
