K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-11: lung bstan 'byung ba'i snga ltas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-12: de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-13: ltas chen kun tu snang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-14: gang zag las kyi dang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-15: rig 'dzin so so'i sa pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-16: 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-17: rnal 'byor las kyi dang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-18: ltas chen 'di dag gang byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-20: don la rtog cing sa rnams sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-21: des ni don la reg par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-22: don la reg pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-23: rig 'dzin rdo rjer lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-24: rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-25: sa la rtsal chen sbyong ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-27: nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-28: ri rab rked nas gsor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-30: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58a-31: sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-0: khyad par rtsal gyis @58b ston par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-1: de la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-3: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-5: so so'i skad dang chos mthun par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-6: 'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-7: so so'i skad du ston par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-8: de dag rjes su bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-9: chos kyi sgo rnams snang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-10: nges pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-11: ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-12: 'jig rten khams rnams g-yos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-13: thams cad ngo mtshar skye 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-14: sems kyi bsam pa rangs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-15: so so dga' ba'i ro myong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-16: chos rnams snang ba'i cho 'phrul yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-17: kun nas kun tu brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-18: gsang ba'i yi ge'i phreng ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-19: rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra sgrog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-20: mthong yod snang grags chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-21: kun kyang sngags kyi sgrar grags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-22: sngags su ma gyur gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-23: des na rtsal gyi khyad par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-24: sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-25: zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen po sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-26: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:58b-27: cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-0: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig @59a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-1: gsang ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-2: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-3: 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-4: smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-6: dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-8: sems dpa' chen po des bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-10: chos thams cad kyi srog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-11: dam tshig yin par shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-12: de nas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-14: dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba rnams bdag cag rnams thos par 'tshal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-16: rtogs nas kyang de la gnas par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-17: sems dpa' chen pos rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-18: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-19: sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-22: shin tu gsal ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-23: snod ma yin par gyur pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-24: phyi nang gsang ba gsum dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59a-25: spa ba'i thabs su spyad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-0: gsang @59b ba'i chos rnams gsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-1: bstan pa'i gnas min snod ngan dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-2: rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-4: shes nas spang bar bya phyir bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-5: 'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-6: mu stegs log lta'i lta la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-7: dad med blo zhan g-yeng rmugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-8: bslab nyan mi brtson byol song mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-9: dad log dam nyams don las gol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-10: byang chub thag pa gting nas chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-11: sems kyi myu gu'i rtsa tshig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-13: snod med kha sbub de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-14: gsang ba smra bar bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-15: smras na de nyid kha sbub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-16: gsang ba'i tshig rnams khar smra yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-17: gab pa gsang ba'i don mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-18: skyon can spa lo sgrog rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-19: gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-20: bsnyen sgrub gsang ba'i tshigs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-21: sgra la nyan kyang don mi gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-22: snying po'i don gsang mi thub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-23: bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-24: gsang don mi thub snod ngan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-25: gsang ba smra bar gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-26: de dang snod med snod ngan gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-27: 'khor ba'i khams su zag par mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-28: lta dang dam tshig sgrub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-29: dam pa'i mdzod gsum smra shes kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:59b-30: goms pa'i mthu med gnas ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-2: bya med chos la blo gtod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-3: spyod rtsing dmar la gdeng med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-4: rnal 'byor spyod la lta dman zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-7: gsang ba'i don rnams smra byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-8: gsang ba nyams pa'i dbang gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-10: zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-11: kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-12: sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-13: rku dang sgyu spyod rdzun la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-14: tshe gcig grags pa ched phyir du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-17: log smra dug can tha ram ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-18: dug can ltung ba'i snod de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-19: gsang ba'i dmigs rnams smra ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-20: rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-22: 'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la; ;gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-23: don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-24: bstan kyang pham ltung gegs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-25: de bas bstan par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-26: gal te bstan par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-27: ston smra nyan byed de dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-28: mthong yun phung byed gnyis skrag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60a-29: rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-0: rnal 'byor @60b mi shes gang dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-1: dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-2: sems kyi rnam grangs ci skyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-3: de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-5: gal te las kyi 'phro len na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-6: de snyed bskal par bzod 'jug dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-7: mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-8: gong ma bzhin du ngan bsams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-9: de yang gnas ngan len pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-10: mkhas pa de la skyo mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-11: rnal 'byor don ldan tshul mthun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-12: ngan pa'i tshig gis sems dkrugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-13: sgro skur rku dang brlang btab na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-14: dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-15: zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-17: skal pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-18: rtsa nyams skyo can rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-19: ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-20: mi zad phra men las spyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-21: gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-22: byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-23: shin tu dman pa'i lta sems kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-24: tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-25: gang dag dam tshig yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-26: byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-27: tshul shes don gyi gzhung rnams srong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-28: de dag la ni 'dun pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-29: dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-30: byang chub snying po thob pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:60b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-0: @61a *// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-2: lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-3: kha cig dregs dang phrag dog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-4: khro spong thabs kyis smod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-5: de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-6: nam yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-7: mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-8: yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-9: rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-12: de ni log pa'i lam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-13: rnal 'byor ltang dang byang chub khe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-15: zang zing nor dang g-yo sprul khe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-16: chung yang ci 'grub srog dang bsngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-17: rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can; ;bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-18: shes rab mdzod kyi gter ldan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-19: srog chags rkun mo'i snger mo ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-20: khong nas gab sbas don ston la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-21: blun po rnams kyis cir mi [?] mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-23: lus la gter 'chang mi dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-24: blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-26: ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-27: ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61a-28: yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-0: yang dag don du gnyer ba @61b med; ;dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-1: dam tshig don du gnyer ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-2: ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-4: 'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes; ;rin chen dag gi yon tan brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-5: de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-7: de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-8: dris kyang med pas slar smras pa; ;gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-9: yon tan cung zad smos par zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-10: de nyid bdag la med ces smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-11: de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-12: bslab par bya ba'i chos bral la; ;chos nyid bsngags pa rjod byed kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-13: de dag la ni chos nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-14: de las spyod pa'i log spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-15: dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-18: gsang ba 'jigs pa'i dgrar mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-19: de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-20: skrod cing chad pas gcod byed pa; ;skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-21: dper na blon po gang dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-22: nyes byas khrims dang 'gal gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-23: 'gal bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-24: bka' yi yo srong blon po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-25: rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-26: kun tu rgya cher grags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-27: ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:61b-28: bdag pos dug tu shes ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-2: ci phyir ldum zas de dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-4: de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-5: brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-6: gnas sam lo yis spyugs te spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-7: gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-8: de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-9: don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-10: tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-11: srung ba'i bsam pa mi g-yo bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-12: rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-13: gal te ma tshor zhig gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-14: rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-15: ji ltar glang po ae ne ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-16: shi nas ro ru gyur mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-17: gi'u wam rtsis ni don byed ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-18: rnal 'byor nyams de ror gyur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-19: gzhan gyis bkur ba'i gnas yin zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-20: de yi don byed nus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-21: de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-22: rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-23: ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-24: rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-25: rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-27: 'khor ba'i g-yul rgyal byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-28: log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-29: don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-30: thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62a-31: gal te ma spangs log spyad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-1: bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-2: kun kyang dge sbyong don chung zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-3: yang dag don las yid byung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-4: log pa'i chos la spro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-5: kun kyang log pa'i las spyad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-7: des ni sgro skur gnyis su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-8: bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-9: ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-10: nam yang gnod pa yong mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-11: de yi 'khor na gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-12: gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-13: rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-14: skyon mthong tsam na chad pas gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-15: thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-16: sgrub pa'i snod mchog gcig yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-17: 'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-18: rgyud mnyen don ldan ngang tshul bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-19: ci la chags med gtong ldan sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-20: shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-21: gti mug tha ram blo phye nas; ;chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-22: rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-23: ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-24: sdong po stong chen rab dul ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-25: tha tshig lung las byung ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-26: gzhung srong thub par byed pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-27: rgyal ba'i sras po yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-28: de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:62b-29: ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-1: bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-3: rig 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-4: de bzhin dam tshig thub pa ltar; ;gnas par byed pa'i rten yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-5: dam tshig kun gyi srog yid nye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-6: dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-8: dam tshig bgrod pa lam gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-9: dam tshig chu bo sgrol ba'i gru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-10: dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-11: dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-12: dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-13: ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-14: gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-15: 'khor ba'i g-yul las rgyal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-16: des na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-17: mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-18: dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-19: lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-20: bdag nyid dag pa ma khrel ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-21: tshul gsum mi gnod dam bcas gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-22: yongs su ma nyams mdo bzhi po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-23: mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-24: mdo don dran pa la bgrang bsngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-25: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-26: dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63a-27: wa dang cang shes gyi ling dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-0: blang dor mi 'bral @63b khro chen bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-1: shin tu glang chen smyos 'dra'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-2: dpa' rtul stag mchog rngam zhing gtum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-3: mkha' lding khyung chen lhag mi lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-4: gtum thung don chen sdong gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-5: yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-6: gti mug lkug pa'i blo tshol ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-7: ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-8: mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-9: gnam lcags lce yi drag shul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-10: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-11: zon bag khu 'phrig kha rog sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-12: nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-13: zla bral seng+ge ri dvags rgyal; ;ra 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-14: g-yo ldan lcag chen sgyu ma'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-15: gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-16: thogs med gsod spyod ce spyang kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-17: che ba'i nga rgyal stag mchog blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-18: kun 'dzem blo ldan nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-19: sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-20: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-21: bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-22: goms nas nyams su len byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-23: rnal 'byor gsang ba'i bka' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-24: dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-25: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi; ;srung dang brjod dang gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-26: yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-27: yid 'ong dang du blang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:63b-28: brtul zhugs zab mor spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-2: mi 'dor mi spong sbyar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-3: rig ldan shes par bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-4: thob cing grub par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-5: re re la yang lnga lnga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-6: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-7: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-8: spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-9: rnal 'byor byang chub sems rgyud la; ;nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-10: zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-11: blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-13: zab mo sgrub pa'i sngon logs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-14: rdo rje tha tshig drag po 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-15: gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-16: spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-17: nges pa'i don gyis bsrungs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-18: de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-19: de ltar spyi yi sdom pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-20: gnas nas dus kyi skabs 'di ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-21: bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-22: mi shigs pa ni seng+ge ste; ;gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-23: za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-24: dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-25: rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-26: de ni 'breg pa'i rigs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-27: gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-28: mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-30: zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64a-31: ma brtags bu ga rdol can gyi snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-0: kha @64b mi dbye zhing bcud mi blug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-1: don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-2: bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-3: shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-4: 'dam rdzab khung du bsrub mi bya; ;seng+ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-5: dug can snod du blug pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-6: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-7: bsreg par bya ba yong ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-8: khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba; ;de dag gcag par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-9: gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-10: brdab par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-11: stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-12: las kyi lhag ma bsdu mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-13: rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-14: de dag gzhig par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-15: rdo rje ra ba'i go tshags ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-16: bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-17: bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-18: g-yeng ba'i rlung gis bskyod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-19: rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-20: 'ol dkar gcad par bya ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-21: rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-22: nam zhar dbyi bar mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-23: rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-24: rmang nas bzlog par mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-25: gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-26: rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-27: rnal 'byor las kyi khyad par can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-28: skal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-29: skal par ldan pa'i nor mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-30: rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:64b-31: rdo rje las ni thun tshags dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-0: @65a *// rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-1: srog la bar chad byed pa'i dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-2: nyon mongs 'thibs pa de gzhom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-3: snyom las le lo'i dpung bskyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-4: thug thub ra chod nga rgyal gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-5: dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-6: dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-7: rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-8: 'dres pa gang zag byis pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-9: zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-10: thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-11: ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-12: gshed ma'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-13: thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-14: le lo'i dgra bcom brtson par 'bad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-15: rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gegs bsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-16: dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-17: 'dod dang longs spyod mi mthun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-18: spyi mthun nang du mi gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-19: phyi nang can dang gnod byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-20: 'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-21: dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g-yeng can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-22: mkhas pas bsgrims te spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-23: de ni rnal 'byor gegs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-24: dngos grub chu bo gcod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-25: rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-26: bar du gnod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-27: rnam rtog 'phrig pa'i bdud nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65a-28: de bzhin btang snyoms le lo'i bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-1: tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po'i bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-2: khro gtum ngan thung 'khrug pa'i bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bdud lnga po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-4: yang dag don la sgrib pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-5: gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-6: zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-7: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-8: thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-9: rdo rje brnag pa gsang 'phel bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-10: ngag gi dbang po nyams gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-11: kha na ma thos phog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-12: de dag bcas dkar 'gyur ba'i dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-13: lta dman spyod rtsing 'chol pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-14: bka' yi gzhung por log par spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-15: nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-16: dam gtsor spyod pa'i las rnams yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-17: 'da' dka' rdo rje mchog gsum po; ;btang snyoms phyal bar shor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-18: rtsa ba rul ba'i ljon shing bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-19: bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-20: brtsams pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-21: 'bad pa'i rtsa shugs chung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-22: don rnams grub pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-24: rnal 'byor chen por spyod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-25: 'dod pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra; ;thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-26: skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-27: srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:65b-28: sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-2: zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-3: khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-4: yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te; ;rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-5: rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-7: bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-8: ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-9: btsal med lhun gyis grub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-10: dug lnga rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-11: ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-12: kun shes kun rig gsal ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-13: rang rig ye shes rang las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-14: rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-15: nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-16: 'di ni rgyun gyi dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-17: brjod du med pa srung ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-18: srung ba thub par bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-19: dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-20: gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-21: blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-23: gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-24: rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-25: don dang ldan pa'i skyes pus spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-26: sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-27: ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-28: rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-29: spyad par bya ba'i las yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66a-30: rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-0: dngos por brtags @66b pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-1: don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-2: de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-3: mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-4: mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-5: theg pa 'og ma'i khyad par rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-6: kun kyang rang rig blo la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-7: yon tan ci 'byung mi brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-8: 'og ma rnams la mi smod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-9: thams cad mnyam pa'i dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-10: 'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-11: gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-12: tshig rnams brjod pa snang mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-13: rnam rtog kun tu sems rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-14: rig dang tshor ba rin chen 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-15: yid g-yo byed pa don kun rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-16: stan 'gan rang bzhin sbyor ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-17: zhing bcu dag dang ldan pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-18: bde ba chen po'i longs spyod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-19: thogs med 'phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-20: phyi yi yul dang nang gi sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-21: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-22: de la sgrib dang mi sgrib ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-23: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-24: thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-25: phung po lnga don ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-27: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-28: yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-29: gzhan gyi rang bzhin med pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:66b-30: mtshan ma'i rnam pa cir snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-0: @67a *// de la chad pa'i gnas med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-1: dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-2: rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-3: rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-4: de ni dam tshig chen po 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-5: thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-7: dngos su spyad pa thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-8: de ni dam tshig chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-9: snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-10: bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-12: 'di ni rdo rje'i tha tshig yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-13: srid pa'i sems can thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-14: thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-15: so sor thams cad snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-16: kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-17: spyod pa'i las dang rtog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-18: mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-19: sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-20: brtags na longs spyod tshogs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-21: ma skyes stong pa sku yi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-22: rang bzhin smon med gsung gi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-23: mtshan med yid las 'das pa'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-24: rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-25: mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang bsgyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-26: 'khor ba thams cad dbyings la snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-27: las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-28: gzhan du 'phrin las lus pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67a-29: sdug bsngal byang chub chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-1: sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-2: nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-3: snang ba med pa'i don mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-4: sa dang sa yi rim par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-6: 'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-7: sku dang gsung thugs mi g-yo ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-8: ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-9: ji ltar bsgyur yang chos nyid pas; ;chad pa'i gnas zhes brjod dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-10: med dang phyal ba gcig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-11: lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-12: 'di zhes ris su chad med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-13: 'di ni srung ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-14: spyad dang spyod par bya med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-15: srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-16: spyod par snang ba thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-17: lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod do; ;ma spangs lhun grub dbyer med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-18: dbyings las gzhan na blta yul med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-19: 'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-20: sa chu me rlung snod bcud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-21: kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-22: chos nyid don la gzhan med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-23: rang byung ye shes gsal ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-24: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-25: ma btsal rang la yod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-27: bde chen longs spyod tshogs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:67b-28: ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-0: @68a *// rang bzhin so sor mi dmigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-1: sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-2: spyod dang gzugs rigs thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-3: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-4: sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-5: don rig thugs kyi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-6: ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-7: mi gnas pa la chags pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-8: don gyi khyad par rtogs chud na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-9: kun tu bzang po'i mchog gi sa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-10: mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-11: thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-12: bdag nyid chen por thams cad rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-13: lhun rdzogs bde ba chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-14: khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-15: sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-16: rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-17: lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-18: zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-19: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las; dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-20: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-21: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68a-22: 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-2: bdag cag rnams kyis brda rig pa tsam gyi ngo bor mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-3: de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-8: btags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-9: btags pa'i chos thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-10: phyi nang gang du yang mi gnas te; ;chos thams cad la ming gi gzhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-12: sbas pa btags pa'i tha snyad yin no /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-13: sbas pa'i chos rnams gsang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-14: thams cad sba zhing brgyud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-15: 'di ltar brda yi sbyor ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-16: rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-17: de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-18: sems dpa' chen pos brda'i chos rnams rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-19: bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-20: brda yi don gyi brgyud par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-21: brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-22: sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-23: mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-25: smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa; ;nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-26: brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-27: sbas te gsang ba'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:68b-28: rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-2: mu stegs la sogs sde pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-4: shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-5: sbas pa'i brda yis bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-6: brda yi yon tan chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-7: grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-8: mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-9: gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-10: rnal 'byor rig pa'i spyod yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-11: sbas bas grub thag nye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-12: gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-13: brda la dga' ba'i ma srid rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-14: nye zhing gdung pa'i thabs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-15: de bas sbas pa'i brda rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-16: tshig gis mtshon te brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-18: aa ti pu ho: pra ti pu ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-19: mah'a go ru sang kra ma; gu ya de bi sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-31: sa ma ya; sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69a-45: aa la stom; aa la stom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-14: ae ae ae ae; hrim hrim/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-26: kro dha ksham; kh'a hi bhyo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-38: dag brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-43: ba bya dznyo ba ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-62: dpa' byed kha; dpa' byed kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-63: zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-64: zla ba dkar dang zla phrom mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-65: tshe 'dzin kun gyi gtso mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-66: 'jam po thar pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-67: gal zhes bya ba'i ro mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-68: gzi brjid chen po'i dri zhim dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-69: bran mo dang ni g-yog 'chang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:69b-70: 'jam dpal rnon po'i ka tar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-10: ka ram tha; ka ram tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-14: sgra brda dam tshig phyag gi rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-15: lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-16: gar thabs g-yas g-yon bskor nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-17: se gol brdabs pa 'dren pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-18: bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-19: shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-20: 'di ni mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-21: bskor nas snying gar bcangs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-22: ting 'dzin rdo rje bstan pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-23: gar bskor shin tu gnyis bstab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-24: mchod pa stob par byed pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-25: gar bskor dbang mo'i spyi bor gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-26: sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-27: thabs kyis spyi bor gzhag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-28: shes rab dbang mos snying gar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-29: thabs kyis gsang ba g-yas bcug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-30: shes rab thos byed gsang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-31: thabs kyis na sa g-yas bteg na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-32: shes rab na sa g-yon bteg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-33: thabs kyis rdo rje phyag rgya bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-34: shes rab padmo'i phyag rgya bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-35: thabs kyis smin ma g-yas bskyod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70a-36: shes rab smin ma g-yon bteg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-0: thabs kyis phyag g-yon @70b brkyang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-1: shes rab g-yas kyis 'khyud tshul bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-2: phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-3: dbang mo lce la reg pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-4: tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brda; ;lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-5: de nas dbang mo lce la reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-6: dza gad 'brim pa'i brda thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-7: ma h'a ging chen karma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-8: rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin la; ;sogs pa'i brda yi dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-10: lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-11: zhes smra ba'i seng+ges gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-12: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-13: rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-14: de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor rol pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-15: de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-16: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa; smra ba'i seng+ge chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-18: rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-20: smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-22: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:70b-23: rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-3: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-4: rdo rje lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-5: sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-6: nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-8: rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-9: rnal 'byor kun gyis spyod pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-10: sa mchog bgrod pa'i lam 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-11: 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-12: brtsam pa las kyi dang po pa; ;rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-13: khyad par rim pa ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-14: las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-15: ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-16: sa rab mchog tu bgrod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-17: thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-18: rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-19: nye ba dang ni sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-20: sgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-21: ji ltar grangs dang dus chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-22: mtshan ma byung bar bcas rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-23: gab pa'i sba thabs de sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-24: sus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-25: de dag gsang ba'i bdag po yin; ;gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-26: 'jig rten rdul las grangs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-27: 'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71a-28: ci phyir dang bo yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-0: byis pa @71b blo shed ma bye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-1: bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-2: bstan dang gsang ba'i dmigs mi phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-4: gsang sgo mi dbye skrag par 'gyur; ;rang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-5: so so'i skye bo byis pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-6: snod med snod byas bdud nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-8: ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-9: gsang ni bcas dkar 'gyur phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-10: des na 'di yi spyod pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-11: ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-12: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de thabs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-13: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-14: smra ba'i seng+ge chen po; chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-15: thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-17: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs; 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-18: brgyud de sbas pa'i tshogs yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-19: rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-20: thabs chen phyag rgya sbas tshogs lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-21: rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcu drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-22: bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-23: bri bya yang na bsam pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-24: brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:71b-25: 'jig rten dbang po'i chos lugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-0: @72a *// mos pa la bskyed dran bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-1: rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-2: phyag bya la sogs mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-3: rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar ba'i; ;yo byad chen po la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-4: rdo rje thabs kyis tshogs la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-5: rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-6: mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-7: mchod dang dam skong 'dod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-8: snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-9: dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-10: 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-11: rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis; ;bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-12: rtsal gyi rim par byin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-13: rdo rje gal chen mna' 'dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-14: de nas sgrub pa che chud rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-15: ji ltar 'dod pas nan tan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-17: mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-18: dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-19: rmongs pa gsang phyir sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-20: ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-21: shes nas mig la shes bya'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-22: thams cad rim gyis bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-23: drod can 'khyil ba'i blo ldan la; ;rnal 'byor na spar mdzod sgo dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-24: rtsing po 'gros kyis dmu rgod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72a-26: rdo rje lung gi tshad can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-0: ji ltar @72b nus pa de dbang bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-1: btsal med mi nus yul can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-2: phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-3: gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-4: 'od mi bsub cing ljid mi dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-5: rdo rje blo yi yul can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-6: rtsal chen sbyongs zhes gdams par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-7: rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-8: rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-9: rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-10: so so rigs kyi phyag rgya dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-12: de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-13: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-14: 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-15: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-16: shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-17: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-18: sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-21: shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-23: chos thams cad shes rab gyi rang bzhin las byung zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-24: shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:72b-25: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-1: rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-3: sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa; 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-4: shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-5: rgya cher bshad kyi shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-6: ji ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-7: gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-8: rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-9: lha mo'i tshogs su sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-11: thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-12: rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-13: mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-14: bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-17: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs dang shes rab phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-18: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-21: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni; thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba'i rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73a-23: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-0: bcom ldan @73b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-3: thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-4: gnyis su med par shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-5: de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-7: chos thams cad dra bar 'brel ba'i don bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-8: sems dpa' chen po bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-10: chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-11: phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-12: chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-13: sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-14: gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-15: rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-16: rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-17: 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-18: gsang 'di chud pa'i bu rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-19: rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-20: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di; ;rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-21: lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-23: g-yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-25: g-yon gyi sgra snyan dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:73b-26: rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-2: seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-3: rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-4: kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar bas; ;bcu drug chas ni sgeg pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-5: rim gyis bskyed dang gcig car bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-6: dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-7: gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-8: gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-9: phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal mor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-11: sa dang nam mkha'i spyan rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-12: byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-13: nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-14: gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-15: bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-16: rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-18: rnal 'byor longs spyod che sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-19: mnyes nas skong phyir rim bzhin dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-20: gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-21: gsang ba'i don rnams sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje kun tu 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74a-24: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-0: rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings su bdag cag rnams @74b kyis mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-3: dra ba'i dbyings su shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-5: thugs kyi rig pa las byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-7: rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-10: rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshogs bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-13: rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-14: dra ba 'brel ba'i dbyings nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-15: nges par bshad kyi rtse gcig nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-16: thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-17: nges pa'i rdo rje yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-18: rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-19: thams cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-21: 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-22: gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-23: rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-24: ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-26: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-27: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:74b-28: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-2: bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-3: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mthong ngo zhes gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-7: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid rdzogs pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-8: chos thams cad ni; dus bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs par shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-10: mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la dus snga phyir snang ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-11: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-13: mnyam pa chen po dus nyid cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'dus pa chen po yi ni tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-16: mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-17: dus zhes bya ba'i ming yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-18: dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-19: chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-21: 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-22: mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-25: 'gag par gyur pa de dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-26: rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75a-27: sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-0: @75b shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-1: de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-2: glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-3: mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-4: cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-5: lha yi nyi ma rnams la 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-6: bde ba chen po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-7: tshom bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-8: spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-9: 'das la rnam thar tshogs bskul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-10: da ltar byung dang mi 'byung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-11: tshad med sems dang mnyam par bskrun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-12: mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-13: bde gshegs dus kyi rgyal por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-15: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-16: de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-19: chos thams cad ni; nyi zla'i tshogs su mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-20: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:75b-23: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-1: byung zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin can yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-2: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-5: byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-7: chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-8: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-9: yo byad de dang ma ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-11: rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-12: byang chub rdzogs pa'i zla rgyas tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-13: snying rje ye shes shar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-14: mkha' la nyi gsal shar ba'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-15: don gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-16: rnal 'byor nges pa'i sa pa yin; ;nges pa'i sa la bgrod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-17: rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-18: tshogs chen rnam gnyis bskrun par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-19: skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-20: bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-21: bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-22: bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-23: mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-24: zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-25: mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-26: bcu drug tshogs kyis bsod nams bskrun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76a-27: phyed rdzogs tshogs 'phel de phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-0: mi dmigs @76b chos la blo sbyangs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-1: je zhi je zhi mi dmigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-2: mtshan ma zhes bya bsrabs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-3: bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-4: mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-5: thams cad chos skur rdzogs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-6: sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-7: 'di la rmad byung sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-8: zla ba bdun gyis mtshan ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-9: gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-10: phra mo'i drod du byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-11: smyur te rang las byung rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-12: rtsa ba gcad phyir yongs rdzogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-13: the tshom med par dang blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-14: dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-15: dus 'di rgyun gyi bar chad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-16: bsnyen pa dag gis bzlog par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-17: bar chad byung na gso zhing bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-18: mkha' la zla gsal grva rgyas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-19: sa la rnal 'byor grvar rgyas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-20: bsod nams spel ba chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-21: bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-22: de ni 'bras bu chen po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-23: nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-24: rig 'dzin sa la sleb phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-25: dpal chen bcu drug sa la 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:76b-27: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-1: gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-4: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-6: yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-8: yi ge'i phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-10: chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-11: rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-12: sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-13: yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-14: yi ge'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-15: rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-17: rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-18: rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-19: yi ge'i tshogs bskyed tshogs sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-20: phud lhag bcas sbyar de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-21: 'di ni don la nye ba'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-22: bsod nams bskrun par de myur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-23: kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu des ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-24: yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba; ;mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-25: de nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-26: 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77a-27: thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-0: rgyu dang rkyen ldan @77b phun sum tshogs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-3: ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-4: skad cig yud dam thang gcig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-5: yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-6: lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-7: tshogs la babs pa'i dus 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-8: byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-9: ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-10: phyi dang nang gi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-11: gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-12: rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-13: ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan tan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-14: bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-15: chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-16: skyon bzhi po dag spangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-17: de las bzlog pa'i tshul ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-18: rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur; ;gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-19: ji bzhin 'dod pa nye bar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-20: lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-21: bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-22: don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-23: las 'dir spyad par shin tu gces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-24: tshogs 'di blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-25: mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-26: rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-27: cis 'dul de ltar stobs kyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-28: des na las 'di khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-29: tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:77b-30: bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-0: @78a *// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-2: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las; rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-3: de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-4: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-5: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-6: sngags zab mo spyod pa'i skyon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-7: yon tan ci lags pa bdag cag gi rig pa la snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-10: gsang sngags chen po'i don 'di rab tu spyad par dka' bar shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-11: de ci'i phyir zhe na; gsang sngags kyi tshogs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-14: rgyun du bcangs shing spyad legs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-15: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyun du spyad du yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-16: me nyid ji lta ba bzhin du spyad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78a-18: spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-0: rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang @78b bsregs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-1: de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-3: chu thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-4: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' bder spyad du yod de; chu la dga' ba der thar chu chen po la 'bogs par nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-5: chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la ma goms pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-6: spyod par byed pa de g-yeng zhing 'chi bar byed do; ;gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-7: gcan gzan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-8: gcan gzan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-11: gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-12: sprul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-13: sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongs su zin na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-14: dbang du 'du zhing spyad du yod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-15: thabs kyis ma zin na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-16: 'tsho ba'i srog dang 'bral bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-19: spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshen yang spyad nyes po'i log pa'i lam pa can mang por byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:78b-20: don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-1: ba'i lam du zhugs pa yang mang por byung bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yongs su mkhas par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-3: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-5: gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni; gang gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-6: spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-8: bdag cag la rgya cher bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-12: nyes legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yi; nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-13: nga ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-14: gsang ba spyod pa'i don 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-15: nges don phal cher nub par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-16: tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-17: kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-18: don dang phrad pa ngas ma mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-19: kun kyang log pa'i lam spyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-20: log pa can nyid gang zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-22: 'di las log dang log tshul spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79a-24: g-yo sgyus bden bcos 'gal pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-0: @79b de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-1: bskal pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-2: sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-4: byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgyan te; ;ma shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-5: tshul 'chos log pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-6: tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:79b-7: don las gol zhing 'khor bar log /
