K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-2: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-3: khyod la byin gyis rlob par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-4: de bas lta ba ma g-yel bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-5: sgrib pa sbyang ba'i thabs dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-6: mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-7: rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-8: khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-10: dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-11: de ma thag tu don thob gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-12: de skad lung bstan thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-13: dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g-yos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-14: lung bstan pa ltar de spyad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-15: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras su gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-16: de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-17: mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs pa; ;thams cad du yang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-18: tog ni rtse mor gyur pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-19: yongs kyi nub pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-20: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-21: lha yi bu zhes bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-22: dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-23: tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-24: gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-25: lha'i bu rin chen 'od ldan de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-26: shin tu dad pa cher g-yos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-27: lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-28: bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-29: dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:83b-30: gus par gyur te der gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-1: ste; ;lha gnas kun tu bgrod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-2: 'byung chen lus la sprul pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-4: mi 'chi tshe la gnas pa thob; ;rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-5: mthong ba dag pa'i chos de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-6: bskal par nub par ma gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-7: de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-8: mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-9: ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-10: bla med snying po can rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-11: lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-12: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-13: bram ze kun ri bya ba zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-14: chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-15: gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-16: bram ze ke ni bya ba zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-17: dad pas don gyi rjes su 'brangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-18: gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshogs mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-19: chos kyi mig dang ldan gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-20: don gyi snying po mthong bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-21: lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa ni; ;rig 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-22: de bzhin mthong bas dag par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-23: gzhan dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-24: dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa; ;de ni dngos dang 'dra ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-25: 'bras bu la yang mtho dman med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-26: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84a-27: rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-0: bya ba'i rnal 'byor can @84b zhig la; ;tshom bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-1: rig 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-2: sngags spyod 'bras bu cher thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-3: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-4: thob pa kun tu grags par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-5: de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-6: bram ze dge slob bya ba zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-7: shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-8: 'jug cing bslab bar zhugs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-9: rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsngams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-10: bram ze dad pa ma log par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-11: 'byor ba'i yo byad ci yod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-12: rgyal bo'i 'khor du phul nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-13: rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-14: yid kyis phyogs te smon lam btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-15: rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-16: rjes su yi rang dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-17: yid la byas ba'i bsod nams kyis; ;sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-18: sgrub dang mi ldan bram ze gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-19: 'bras bu mthon dman med par thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-20: 'di ni tshegs med don po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-21: thabs la mkhas pa'i rig 'dzin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-22: de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-23: dga' bas rjes su yi rang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-24: dge ba spyad dang ma spyad gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-25: 'bras bu mnyam par thob par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-26: bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:84b-28: srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-2: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-3: sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-4: gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-5: rang gi sems la goms byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-6: sems nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-7: chos rnams kun la mkhas par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-8: kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-9: sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-10: chos kyi rgyal por de gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-11: sangs rgyas smra ba'i seng+ge zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-12: zhing khams kun tu grags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-13: de bzhin bslab pa dag par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-14: tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-15: skyes la nyan thos bsam yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-16: sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-17: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do; ;ci phyir zhe na gcig mnyes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-18: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-19: nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-20: nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-21: so so ma yin tha mi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-22: sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-23: 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-24: bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-25: des na khyad par de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-26: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-27: las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-28: dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85a-29: dga' ba'i dad pas so sor skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-0: gcig la @85b gcig ni tha tshig byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-1: gcig gis nyan thos bsam yas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-2: mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-3: gcig gis tshogs mchod rgya cher byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-4: tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal ldan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-5: 'di tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-6: sbyin pa spel ba'i dge ldan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-7: bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-8: de bas gnas 'dir spyod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-9: rnal 'byor gsal ldan tshul bzhin spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-12: che yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-13: don gyi gzugs dang bcas par 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-14: de yang ji lta bu zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-15: khyim bdag mes byin bya ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-16: tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-17: rgyun gyis rtag par 'di spyad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-18: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-20: skye ba de yis nges par thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-21: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-22: don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-23: rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-24: goms dang brjod dang smos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-25: chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-26: yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-27: de yang ji lta bu zhe na; ;drang srong rnal 'byor kal ya nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-28: drang srong rnam pa mang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-29: tshogs 'di yon tan rgya cher bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:85b-30: don rnams nges par bshad pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-2: ston par byed pa'i kal yan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-3: gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur 'on kyang gsang ba'i don 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-4: snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-5: bstan tam bshad dam brjod par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-6: des ni yon tan chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-8: des na 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-9: rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-11: rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-12: skad cig tsam mam thang gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-13: rgyal ba'i tshogs 'di rab bskrun na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-14: rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-16: tha tshig zab mo bskangs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-17: chos kyi mig ni thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-18: des ni tshogs spyad yon tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-19: log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-20: sngon byung gleng gzhi bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-21: zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-22: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86a-23: 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-0: /de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de'i zhal du shin tu re zhing @86b bka' sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun tu brjod par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sa la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-1: de nas 'khor phal mo ches rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas aa la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-2: ae ma rdo rje sems chen po; ;rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-3: mgon po yon tan bsam las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-4: rgyal thob khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-5: ae ma rang snang dbyer med sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-6: rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-7: dpe byad 'bru bkod blta mi ngoms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-8: sku lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-9: ae ma rnam dag nam mkha'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-10: gcig gsung sna tshogs sgrar rig mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-11: bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-12: gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-13: ae ma gsang ba nam mkha'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-14: mnyam nyid mi g-yo so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-15: kun rig snying po ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-16: thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-17: ae ma mi mdzad mdzad pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-18: ma chags chags bral 'dod chags mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-19: thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:86b-21: rgyal tshab khyod la gsol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-1: mgon thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-2: sprul pa'i go tshags ru bsnyams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-3: 'khor ba'i skyas lings chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-4: sdug bsngal shin tu gsad pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-5: thams cad dur khrod chen po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-6: byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-7: ae ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-8: sems dpa' rdo rje chen po des rnal 'byor pa'i phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchgo gi bdag po la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-9: aa la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-10: gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-11: yang gsang bla na med pa'i bdag nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-12: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rmad du byung ba'i tshogs shin tu rtul phod pa gsol pa 'tshal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-13: 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-14: ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-15: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun tu 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-16: dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87a-17: snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-0: @87b h'um h'um bi shva badzra kro dha dzva la manda la aa ra li aa li au li ta pa li tram stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-3: brum phu tsa kh'a hi phat phat ha la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-5: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan gyis yid tshod du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i chos bstan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-9: sku kun tu dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-10: he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-12: dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po dgu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-13: don gyi rtags chen po bco brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-14: dur khrod kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des mkhyen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-15: bka' gsang dbang chen 'dis don du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-17: tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-18: bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-19: sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-20: mtshon pas don 'byin mi shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:87b-21: nyon mongs rang dga' spyod mnyam pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-2: nges pa'i shes rab mig ldongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-3: don gyi rtsal shugs chung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-4: dga' bde'i longs spyod bskrun snyam nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-5: mtshan ma rang dgar spyad bsgrubs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-7: rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-8: myu gu brlab ste ga la 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-9: gtan tshigs de bas 'di don dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-10: rtsal zhan dag la bstan min zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-11: gsang bdag rgyal po kun gsungs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-12: ci khyod rnams kyis mi shes sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-13: zhes rnam par smras pa las; 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-14: ae ma ho sems dpa' chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-15: de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-19: ae ma snod du ma gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-21: thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-26: ci phyir mi gsung thogs med sras; ;rgyal ba'i sras po dus 'di lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88a-27: gsang ba'i snying po snang 'di lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-0: gsang ba'i dur khrod @88b tshul 'di lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-1: snying rje zher sems khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-2: gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-3: gsang ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-4: dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyod la 'dud; ;'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-5: gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-6: bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-7: 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-9: bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-10: rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-11: 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-12: zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-13: sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-14: aa aa he he'i gang rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thams cad kyang gad rgyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrog par mdzad de dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de dgyes pa'i rol mo sna tshogs ling long phyad par byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-15: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des lus kun bsrang ste dur khrod kyi chas sna tshogs gsar zhing rtags bco brgyad 'bar bar byas nas brjid pa'i gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:88b-16: rnam grangs sna tshogs don gyi sgrub pa rtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-2: don la rton byed rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-4: ji ltar btso blag mkhan dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-5: ras dkar sbyangs pas tshon 'jen ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-6: rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-7: skong dang sbyong ba'i las rnams gces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-8: zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-9: sems nyid gting nas tshar gcad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-10: theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-11: lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-12: de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-13: rus sbal mgo la 'ongs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-14: shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sems chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-15: rgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-16: gal te gang zag dbang gis ni; ;nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-17: mgon tshun chos nyid chu phab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-18: skong zlog cho ga rgya cher bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-19: sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-20: zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-21: sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-22: dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-23: slong mo dang slong la dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-24: slong la 'tshe ba'i tshe spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-25: sde dang mtshan dang grvar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-26: snying rje khud pa'i zhing du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-27: smar dang 'bru dang rdzid mas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89a-28: bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-0: btags @89b sam phye mar sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-1: klung ngam chu klung mtsho chen du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-2: dor te chags med sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-3: dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-4: nad gso shes slob spyod sgom grva //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-5: btsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-6: dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-7: gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrog pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-8: glegs bam zab mo kun bsten te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-9: brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-10: rgya cher yangs pa'i las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-11: ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-12: shes rab tshogs kyi sbyin mchog dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-13: bstan tam glegs bam la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-14: blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-15: bsgoms dang goms par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-16: kun gzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-17: ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-18: blo mchog yid kyis rtsal de sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-19: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-20: rgyud sbyangs lhag pa'i shes rab blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-21: sho gam srang dang sho gam lam; ;mi bde'i gnod pa kun bsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-22: tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-23: sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-25: me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-26: sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-27: brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:89b-28: mtshams med zlog par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-1: sems rgyud la rdul brlags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-2: 'phags pa'i sbyin tshogs pho brang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-3: rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-4: rgyal mnyes las ni gyis shig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-5: thabs chen spyod pa'i las chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-6: rnam bzhi me yi las mchog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-7: des ni mtshams med bzlog pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-9: gang ltar goms ltar 'bad rtsol bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-10: bstan pa skyong ba'i tshogs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-11: sbyin mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-12: de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-13: don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-14: nan tan tshogs kyi dpung chen bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-15: 'di ltar las chen ltang gsog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-16: gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-17: rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-18: rgyud ldan snod ldan bya phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-19: gal te rtsal zhan ma grub na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-20: dge bsags ltang chen kun bsdoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-21: las kyi bsags pa don bgrangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-22: gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal sprugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-23: nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-24: rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-25: de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-26: bdag gi don du 'gyur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90a-27: de ltar spyad pa spyod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-1: chung ngu chung sogs mthar zad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-3: zhig dang ral dang chag 'dres dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-4: bskang gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-5: las chen skong ba'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-6: gnas su brtag par nges med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-7: mi sdug skyon can bkra mi shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-8: spangs te med par gyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-9: shin tu gsar pa'i gnas chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-10: bskang ba'i gnas su de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-11: de ltar yid 'ong gnas btsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-12: drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-13: sri zhu rgyal chos spyi bor bkur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-14: de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-16: me long snying po ltar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-17: gtsang ma'i rgyu las rdzas byas pa; ;yid 'ong rnam lnga'i mchod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-18: rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-19: brgyan te klubs pa'i sprin phung rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-20: mnyes nas bskang phyir rgyal la dbul; ;phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-21: 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-22: yid bzhin longs spyod rkyen dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-23: yon tan cha las snod bcol mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-24: mnyes nas skong ba'i stongs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-25: khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-26: yo byad sbyin tshogs chen po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:90b-27: 'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-2: bgegs su gyur pa'i bgegs ris kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-3: mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-4: dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-5: bgegs rnams mgu na thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-6: mnyam pa'i don gyis skong pa'i rgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-7: cung zad tsam du snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-8: de ltar skong ba'i las rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-9: bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-10: rnam pa ldar ni snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-11: kun tu nyams pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-12: rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-13: de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-14: skong ba'i thabs kyang lnga yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-15: spyad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-16: rdzas dang nor dang ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-17: man ngag gsang ba'i thabs chen no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-18: de dag la yang lnga lnga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-19: spyod pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-20: rnam pa la ru bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-21: dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-22: rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-23: yan lag nyams par gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-24: stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-25: zlas nyams lnga brgya bcu gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-26: zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-27: bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis skong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-28: rdzas kyis skong pa'i thabs mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91a-29: gal te srung ba 'ga' zhig las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-0: byang chub tha tshig ral gyur @91b na; ;gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-1: dmangs rigs snga ma spyan drangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-2: nyes 'gal mi bcab stong du bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-3: gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-4: tha tshig gang brlags nor des blu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-5: byang chub sems bskyed rgyud spyangs mnyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-6: rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-7: zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-8: rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-9: nyes byas mi bcab 'bum du bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-10: shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-11: tha tshig gang brlags nor des blu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-12: bsam gtan ting 'dzin bsgom brtson bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-13: rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-14: nga rgyal rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-15: rgyal rigs bla ma spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-16: nyes byas mi bcab brgyad khrir bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-17: bee d'urya sogs rdzas chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-18: tha tshig gang brlags nor des blu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-19: sku gdung ring bsrel rnam par spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-20: padma'i tha tshig ral gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-21: 'dod chags rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-22: gdol rigs bla ma spyan drangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-23: nyes byas mi bcab brgyar bshags bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-24: byi ru la sogs rdzas chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-25: tha tshig gang brlags nor des blu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-26: bshad bya zab mo'i glegs bam brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-27: las kyi tha tshig ral gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:91b-28: phrag dog rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-2: nyes byas mi bcab bcu lngar bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-3: aindra la sogs rdzas rnams kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-5: des ni bskang ba'i las chen 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-6: don gyis skong ba'i thabs mchog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-7: rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-8: chos kun nam mkhar bsgoms nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-9: bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-10: ci yang med par blo la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-11: de la goms byas nyes pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-12: kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-13: rgya che yangs pa'i chos nyan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-14: bsam pa'i las rnams rgya cher bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-15: yid kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na; ;rtsa ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-16: gal te yan lag nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-17: chos nyid nam mkha'i don ston pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-18: glegs bam zab mo kun brtags te; ;don rnams rgya cher brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-19: des ni yan lag nyams pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-20: zlas ni tha tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-21: bla med skyes bu mkhas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-22: gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-23: ston pa'i yon bdag gnyer blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-24: blo yi rtsal can kun bsdus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92a-25: dam chos bdud rtsi bstan pa bsgrags //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-14: dmar por spros pas chags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-15: mthing ga thugs kyi sa bon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-16: rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-17: dag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig skong //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-20: dmar po 'bud pa'i rlung byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-21: mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-24: dngos po'i ljan ljin thams cad bkrus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-25: de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-28: bag chags tshig la me mi dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:92b-29: rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:93a-7: sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-22: longs spyod spong len thams cad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-23: 'di rgyu yin par rig bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-24: rgyu nyid rgyur btags dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-25: bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-26: de nyid tha tshig btsan por sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-27: 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96a-28: de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-0: de dag thugs dam @96b mchog nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-1: rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-2: rtogs nas srung sgrub dam bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-3: so sor 'gal zhing chag nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-4: so so nyid du bsab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-5: sku yi chag nyams gnas su gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-8: rdo rje snying po'i tha tshig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-9: bskangs pas skong par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-10: rtags chen dag kyang 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-11: rgyal ba sangs rgyas rig 'dzin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-12: gdung chen dag las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-13: sha ri ram zhes bya ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-14: thams cad ltas su ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-15: shel gyi za ma tog nang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-16: dag par bcug ste btsas pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-17: nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-19: nyams pa skong dam sor chud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-20: gal te dam tshig ma nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-22: legs pa'i yon tan 'byung ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-24: gal te nag gam mi gsal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-25: smyur te bsgrims nas bskor bzlog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-26: 'on tang nyams pa mi phog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-27: de dag so ru gso ba na; ;rtags chen 'di ni bsten bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-28: 'di dag shin tu brtags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-29: dkar la 'tsher bar gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:96b-30: rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-1: yin no; ;des na rnal 'byor las kyi gtsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-2: sbyong dang skong ba'i las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-3: bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-4: 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i bdud kyi sde pa las lha'i rigs su gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa'i rigs 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-5: nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka'i snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs te 'khod pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-6: 'dod chags thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje bram ze thod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ltar ma bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-8: ma dad ma gus 'gal 'khrul du gyur ba'i chad pa'i skye gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-9: rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-10: bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-11: bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje'i bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-12: 'dod chags kyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-13: dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa'i skye gnas 'dri ba legs kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-14: yid tshim bar byed pa bshad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-16: rtsa ba yan lag 'di dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-17: gal te zhig gam nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97a-18: rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-0: lung gi gsang @97b sgor zhugs pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-1: don dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-2: rdo rje tha tshig byin brlabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-3: lce la dam tshig chu bzhag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-4: dmyal ba rdo rjer dmod btsugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-5: yi ge h'um du byas pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-6: snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-7: lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-8: khro bo raksha zhes bya ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-9: khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-10: snying khrag gzhibs te 'thungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-11: sdug bsngal chen por bsad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-12: dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-13: gal te tha tshig ma nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-14: lce la bzhag pa aarga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-15: snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-16: ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-17: gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-18: sangs rgyas sras su skyed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-19: 'dod chags dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-20: mngal gyi grong khyer chen por 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-21: zhe sdang dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-23: gti mug dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-24: mi gtsang zas su za ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-25: rmongs pa'i phag chen lus su ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-26: nga rgyal dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-27: rus spal nag po'i lus su ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-28: phrag dog dam tshig nyams gyur na; ;chu srin mgo dgu'i lus su ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-29: dam tshig chen po'i kun nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-30: ru tra nag po'i lus su ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:97b-31: las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-2: sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-3: nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyis shin tu cho nges chen po 'byin cing dus der ae ma'o bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-5: bdag la ltung rgyu mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-6: dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la btags pa'i tshe bka' la ma dad ma gus pas bka' la skur cing dpyas long btags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-7: ston pa dang grogs la smad cing dpyas long btags pa la sogs pa ltung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-9: bdag kyang chad pa'i skye gnas su mchi bar nges na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos bzung ste bka'i 'khor du bkod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-13: 'on kyang 'gyod pa drag po'i dbang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-16: tshig tu 'don cing smos te bshags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-18: lus gdan khri la phul te bshags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-1: [?] bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-2: bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-4: rig 'dzin chen po mi thod can rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-5: ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnams la 'gyod par gyur nas zhus pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-8: nyes byas rnams bshags par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-9: gang 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas ba spu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-15: shes rab chen po'i rgyud kyis bag chags thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-16: ting 'dzin chen po'i mes bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-17: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mun nag thams cad bsal te de dag dag par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-18: spyod pa rlabs po che'i chus bkru ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-19: de la bshags par bya ba'i yul ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-27: rten du gyur ba rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-28: bshags par bya ba'i rgyu ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:98b-30: sgrib pa che chung bshags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-0: nyon mongs pa rags pa mngon du rgyu ba bshags pa @99a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-2: bag la nyal dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bshags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-3: de'i phyir ltung bar gyur pa'i las rnams 'gyod pa drag pos brten la thabs la mkhas pas spyad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-4: sgrib pa che chung cha shas kyis phye la gus par bshags pa gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-5: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-6: rig 'dzin chen po mi'i thod pa can rnams mgu zhing rangs te rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas 'gyod cing gdung ba'i glu 'di blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-7: aom; ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni; ;zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-8: thugs rjes nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-9: bder gshegs bzhugs shing bdag la dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-10: brjod med shes rab mi g-yo chos mchog dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-11: bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-12: thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya che rol pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-13: cho 'phrul sprul pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-14: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-15: kun tu bzang po'i bla med mchod sprin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-16: mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya cher yongs bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-17: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya chen mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-18: kun tu bzang mo'i yum gyi bha ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99a-19: 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-0: gnyis @99b med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-1: sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-2: chos nyid rnam dag rgya che 'od gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-3: rnal 'byor nyid dbyings smra bsam las 'das pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-4: mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-5: kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas bdal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-6: phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-7: snang srid rnam dag kun bzang yum gyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-8: 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-9: gsang chen rab rdzogs gzungs chen bdag nyid ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-10: gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-11: cir yang snang bas bde chen g-yung drung lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-12: 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-13: bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-14: byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-15: rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-16: ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-17: nyes legs stang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-18: dbang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-19: thugs rjes gdung 'tshob rdo rje thod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-20: bdag cag dregs pa'i bdag po 'dir tshogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:99b-21: 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-2: bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-3: sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-4: 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-5: spyi dang lhag pa'i khyad par dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-6: snga phyi ma nos shing gnyer du rma'o 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-7: don las gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-8: gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i le lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-9: klong du ma gyur rtsal shugs chung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-10: shes bzhin mi ldan dam tshig 'gal gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-11: dang po'i tha tshig bka' la btags pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-12: bka' las ma gus 'gal bgyis dpyas long gtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-13: bar du bslab pa'i gnyer chen phog pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-14: bslab la mi brtson don la g-yel ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-15: tha ma 'di tshe 'bras bu sgrub pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-16: bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma lcogs don las 'gal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-17: tshor dang mtshor sgrib pa che chung rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-18: shin tu mi shes ma rig dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-19: ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-20: dpa' bo thugs rjes bdag la bzod par gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-21: 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100a-22: las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-0: nyon mongs log par lta ba'i @100b dug 'thungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-1: sdug bsngal nad kyis shin tu gdungs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-2: bde gshegs thugs rje sman pa'i rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-3: dam tshig bdud rtsi thar pa'i sman stsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-4: nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-5: bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-6: byams mgon thugs rjes bdag la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-7: zhes dus nas aa la la ho zhes brjod de gnyen po drag por bsten nas lus gdan khrir phul te byang chub sems kyis rnam par 'dud pa'i don la rnam par sbyangs pas lus gcer bu zang mar phyung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-8: gnong ba drag po'i 'gyod pa byas bas bde bar gshegs pa rnams mnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-9: des sgrib pa byang zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs par rtags lus gos dang phral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-10: sa thob pa'i rtags su de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs rten du gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-11: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dgyes te bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-13: 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa legs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:100b-14: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-0: shes bya'i sgrib pa dag cing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bgya ba'i phyir nyan pa'i dbang @101a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-1: pos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs la gsang sngags kyi sgra rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-3: sa nas sar 'phar zhing 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-4: de skad ces gsungs pas 'khor bsam pa nges par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-5: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-6: skong ba las kyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-8: sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po yang ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-9: 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-10: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-11: chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-12: chos nyid stong pa'i nam mkha' las brag ca'i tshul du sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-13: mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-14: ma chags chags bral yul las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-15: ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-16: rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101a-17: zhes sgra byung bas ston pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-1: thams cad don la dam zhing chos nyid kyi nam mkha' mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid snying rje rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-3: de nas chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la snying rje byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhig shar bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-4: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa 'di ltar skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-5: ae ma chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di ltar ma shes pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying pa 'di yang snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-6: de nas nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-7: yongs la khyab pa'i nyi ma'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-8: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-9: rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-11: zhes sgra byung ba las chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:101b-12: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po de nyid cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-0: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis nyi @102a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-1: ma'i snying po las chos thams cad kyi rgyud yi ge aa dkar po shar bar mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-2: de nas aa las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-3: aa ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-4: cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-5: nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-7: zhes sgra byung bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de ci yang mi mdzad pa cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-9: de nas yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba de chos thams cad nam mkha' bha gar byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-11: 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-12: de nas yum gyi bha ga'i snying po las 'od zer mthing ga 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i aa la bskul bas yi ge ae mthing ga 'phros te lding zhing gnas pa las cho 'phrul gyi rang sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102a-13: aa ni ae yi rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-0: aa @102b las ae byung mkha' khyab bdal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-2: mtha' dang dbus med kun tu bdal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-3: zhes sgra byung bas thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du phyam chad par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-4: de nas yang yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug mas yang zhing g-yo ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so; ;des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-5: de nas rlung de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-6: aa yi byin brlabs ye shes las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-7: rlung gi cho 'phrul yam du shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-8: thams cad 'degs pa'i stobs ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-9: rang bzhin g-yo zhing thogs med 'phyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-10: zhes sgra byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-11: de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba nges 'bar 'phro me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-12: 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-13: de nas me'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba; aa yi byin brlabs ye shes las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-14: cho 'phrul me yi snying por shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:102b-16: dngos po kun zang me klong 'tshab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-0: @103a *// ces sgra byung bas me'i bskal pa 'byams klas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-1: de nas yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-2: des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyi chos thams cad chu'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-3: de nas rlabs kyi 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-4: rgyu yi yi ge 'od zer las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-5: chu yi snying po'i cho 'phrul shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-6: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-7: rlung mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-8: zhes sgra byung bas thams cad yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-9: de nas yum chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bas zhing khams thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-10: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-11: de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-12: mi dmigs pa la sna tshogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-14: rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-15: lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-16: zhes sgra byung bas sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag tu thugs su chud par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-17: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103a-18: des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bor mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-0: de nas de'i 'od las cho 'phrul gyi sgra @103b 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-1: rnam dag shes rab mkha' klong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-2: rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-3: rgya che gting zab nam 'phang gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-4: rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-5: ces sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bos nyon mongs pa'i ri bo thams cad zil gyis mnan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-6: de nas dbyings phyug ma chen mo lnga shes rab zab mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' klong rnam dag ces bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-7: bha ga'i snying po las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-8: bha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-9: bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-10: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-11: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-13: byung bas nam mkha' thams cad pho brang gi gzhal yas 'byams klas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog de nyid chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-15: phyag rgya thams cad rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-16: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis 'khor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:103b-17: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-0: de nas yang 'khor ba 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya @104a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-3: zhing chen gyi sa gzhi bdal nga [?] la rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-4: keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-5: ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi gcal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-6: aasma garbha 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-9: nor bu rin po che'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lnga'i brag gtams pa la kri ya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-11: yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-12: rdo rje brag chen gyi steng na padma dkar po'i mandal la bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-13: padma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-14: zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa la dbang phyug pho nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-15: mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-16: dbang phyug pho mo'i steng byol song gi gtso bo brgyad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104a-17: rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir dpa' brtun stag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-4: zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rig 'dzin thams cad sa le yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-5: gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yum kun tu bzang mo rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-6: me dpung chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgu brtsegs su yongs su 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-7: zhabs brgyad la gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-8: sgo ma bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-9: dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po bco brgyad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-10: ma mo chen mo bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-11: phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-12: phra men ma bcu dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na khyung bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phro ba; mkha' 'gro brgyad dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na seng+ge kha glal ba brgyad kyi kha nas ral gri 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-13: shugs 'gro brgyad dbyug pa 'khyer ba'i lag na stag mche ba brtsegs pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-14: ma mo brgyad dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis btags nas klad la bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-15: 'bar ma brgyad dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las thu lum 'phro ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:104b-16: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-6: gsod byed ma bcu ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-7: zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-8: srid pa za byed gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-9: spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-10: he ru ka yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhir gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-11: dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-12: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-13: g-yas kyi dbu bdun gyi spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa re re 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-14: dbus kyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi dbu re re byung ba'i sku la rin po che'i mchod rten 'bar ba bdun du gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-15: g-yon gyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal ba 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-17: rin po che de dag gi lte ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-19: rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-20: rgya bye'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-21: gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-22: gcan gzan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105a-23: sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-0: rin chen @105b sbrul nag rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-1: dpa' bo stag gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-2: gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-3: dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang rtsal chen seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-4: gtum chen dom gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-5: rgyal mtshan de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te gser gyi gtsug to re tog stong 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-6: de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-7: dbu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-8: rgyal mtshan chen po bcu la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-9: dbu'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gser gyi tog stong ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-10: rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-11: de ltar mthong zhing gsal bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-12: chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs pa'i don la 'khor thams cad ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-13: rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyi sku la yongs su bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-14: ae ma'o chos kun sku la yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:105b-15: rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-2: dbyar gyi char sprin gtibs pa lta bu'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-3: chu rlabs lta bur brjod pa'i zhal gdangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-4: nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-5: theg chen dgu dang 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-6: phyag rgya gcig tu bkod nas rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-7: sku gsum lhun grub chos sku tog stong 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-8: dbu skra kham nag ral pa'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-9: klu rgyal 'bum gyis klubs shing mchod kun 'bul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-10: rdo rje gsung gi ljags sgra brdabs pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-11: h'um dang phat gyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-12: theg chen don dam gsang sngags sgrog pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-13: 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-14: spyan dmar zlog pa'i sdang mig nyi ltar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-15: 'bar ba'i shangs nas bskal pa'i tshub nag 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-16: rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser chen 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-17: rno dbal ma che ba zang yag gtsigs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-18: nyon mongs log lta'i tshogs la ngam zhing 'khrug //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-19: thod rus sha khrag rkang rus 'bu dang rnag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-20: za byed rngam pa'i zhal du chem chem gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106a-21: sbrul gdug ko rlon la sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-0: rngam pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par @106b brgyan; ;za byed rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-1: 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-2: 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-3: dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid cing rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-4: 'gran gyi zla med che btsan gcig pu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-5: gsang mchog 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-6: de skad ces bstod pas chos thams cad sku la yongs su rdzogs shing sangs ma rgyas pa med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-7: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-8: spro ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog bdag po chos nyid rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-10: chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-11: nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-12: skar tshogs rig pa'i yig bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-13: 'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-14: gsang sngags chos kyi rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:106b-15: chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yongs su rdzogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-0: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces @107a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-2: stong gsum bandha'i bzang khong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-3: srid gsum sems can dug chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-4: dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-5: bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-7: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-8: 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-9: mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-10: srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun; ;kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-12: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-13: 'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-14: sems can sangs rgyas snying po shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-15: sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-16: thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-18: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-19: 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107a-20: snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-0: thams cad @107b rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-2: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ma rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-4: ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-5: rang bzhin med par bsgral nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-6: mnyam nyid chos sku chen por ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-8: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sku gsung rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-9: 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-10: gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-11: gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-12: gdung chen chos skur rgyun du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-13: zhes gsungs so; ;de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-14: nam mkha' me chu sa rlung rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-15: rmang gzhi ri rab rten du snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-16: bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-17: de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-18: ri bo bum rten bum par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-19: 'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-20: sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-21: 'dzugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmang rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-23: yan lag dang po bum rten bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:107b-24: lcang lo cod pan phreng bas klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-1: so; ;de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shi ba yongs su slong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-2: ro yi sgrub lugs chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-3: dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-4: ro yi rdzas rnams btsal nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-5: 'dod pa sgyur ba'i sngags kyis gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-6: ro yi steng du gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-7: ro yi gnyen bor bdag bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-8: ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-9: ro la bkrag dang mdangs byung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-10: grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-11: rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya; ;ro ni 'gul bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-12: gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-13: ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-14: sngags ni dag par bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-15: ro nyid langs par gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-16: ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-17: brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-18: de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-19: ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-20: de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-21: rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-22: lce bcad ras gri mtshon cha des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-23: ro yi bandha bcad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-24: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste; ;bandha go ru bzung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-25: lce yi ral gri thogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-26: lha min g-yul yang bzlog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108a-27: ro langs grub pa'i rkang mgyogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-0: dpag pa'i tshad @108b las 'das pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-1: skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-2: phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-3: dus gcig mda' yi rgyang 'phangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-4: mda' ni sa la ma babs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-5: bzhi ka bar snang las blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-6: skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-7: skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-8: de ma thag tu gnas su slebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-10: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-12: ro langs sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-13: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rdo rje nam mkha'i them skas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-14: nam mkha' rdo rjer bsgoms nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-15: ting 'dzin red bar gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-16: phan phun gya gyu'i thabs tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-17: rdo rje skas la bgrod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-18: nam mkha'i dbyings su song nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-19: snang srid 'jig rten khams la blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-20: des ni sems yul yangs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-22: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rgya mtsho chen po gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-23: rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-24: ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:108b-25: rgya mtsho chen por bgrod na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-2: ting 'dzin rdo rjes bsgral bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-4: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de thogs med rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-5: nam mkha' dag gi ling+ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-7: bsgoms te ting 'dzin brtas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-8: zhing khams kun tu bgrod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-10: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-11: nam mkha' dag gi ling+ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-13: bsgoms te ting 'dzin brtas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-14: mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad bsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-16: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-17: rnal 'byor sdigs mdzub rtse mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-19: bsgoms te ting 'dzin brtas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109a-20: chu rgyun babs te gzhil bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-0: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying @109b po des stong gi 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-1: rnal 'byor las kyi dkyil 'khor du; ;stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-2: shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-3: ting 'dzin rtsal can rab sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-4: nam mkha'i khams su 'phangs nas ni; ;sa nas sa ru spar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-6: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-7: rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-10: 'od zer de dag re re las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-12: des ni mun pa thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-14: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de 'byung ba chen po bskal pa'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-16: chu zla'i snying po rab shar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-17: bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun babs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:109b-18: sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me chen gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-0: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de sku'i phyag rgya 'bar @110a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-1: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-3: sangs rgyas ye shes dpal gyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-4: rin chen 'bar ba'i ngos brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-5: rig pa'i ma mo dpal 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-6: brgyad du gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-7: ye shes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-9: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsung gi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-13: gsung gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-15: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de thugs kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-17: yi ge h'um gi 'bru yis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-18: mtha' ma rin chen yig 'bru brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-19: kha dog mthing gas bskor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-20: thugs kyi gsang ba'i ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-22: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-23: sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110a-24: ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-0: mdo @110b bzhin snang bar ma gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-1: sems nyid brtags pa de ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-2: gdos bcas dmigs bus mi mthong yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-3: mngon shes yid gzugs can gyis mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-4: gang ltar brtags par yun brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-5: rtog pa brtas pa'i 'bras bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-6: mngon sum gsal bar red par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-7: dge dang mi dge'i bag chags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-8: yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-9: bag chags brtas pa kho nar zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-10: de bas ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-12: rgyud kyi rgyal po chan po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-13: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o ///
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-14: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsang sbyor chen po sgrub pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-16: shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-17: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gshegs shul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-18: 'jig rten gang zag lam yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-19: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-20: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-21: log pa'i lam bzhin mtha' bsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-22: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-23: des na sgrub pa'i lam mchog 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-24: 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:110b-25: shin tu gus pas mnyan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-1: rnams kyis gsang ba sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-2: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-3: bdag cag rnams la gsang ba'i yang gsang ba /
