K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-4: bka' gsang ba chen po ye shes rmad du byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-5: sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i shul yang dag pa'i don bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-6: sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de btsun mo'i tshogs la dgyes par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-7: bha ga gsang ba'i padma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-8: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i pho brang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-9: sngon 'das rgyal ba brnal ba'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-10: da ltar bzhugs pa gnas pa'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-11: slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-12: rgyal ba rnams la de ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-13: de ltar ma shes 'khor ba'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-14: rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-15: yul gyi mchog ni 'dir bzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-16: mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-17: smin dkyus ring la lag sor phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-18: tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-19: kha nas autpal ngad ldang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111a-20: yid 'od mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-0: @111b so dkar tshags dam smin dkyus ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-1: zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-2: dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-3: sna bzang mdog gsal padma'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-4: lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-6: sha dkar tshags dam 'khril bag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-8: skad ni dang pa gzhon nu sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-9: ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-10: skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-11: gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-12: bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mdog po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-13: bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-15: rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-16: bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mdog gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-17: rdo rje thabs la'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-18: de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-19: yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-20: gsang ba dbus kyi zla gam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-21: byang chub sems kyi spro bsdu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-22: gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-23: chags pa'i mkha' la de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-24: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-25: rig pa rang snang mnyam pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-26: mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde chen klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-27: mi gnas bde ba chen po'i lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:111b-28: rig pa thabs kyi rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-2: bzhin mdog mang po sog ka la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-3: dpral b'a dbyes che smin dkyus ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-4: mig gi mdangs gsal dkyus su ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-5: dung chen thags dam shel mdog chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-6: bzhin gyi gzangs ring kos ko phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-7: lus la zhim pa'i dri ldang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-8: kha nas ga pur ngad ldang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-9: nu ma'i dkyil mtho nu mar 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-10: padma can zhes bya bar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-11: dung can ma zhes bstan ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-12: dkar mo zla ba'i mdangs su gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-13: bzhin lus dung ltar g-yas su g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-14: gtsug phud mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-15: skad che gdangs snyan tshig tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-16: bod chung lus ni mdzes par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-17: bu mo mig ring zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-18: shes rab gsal zhing 'dod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-19: gtso bo des pa'i brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-20: zla gsang dkar dmar rlung kar lci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-21: rnam par brdig cing 'khyil pas ni; ;kun gyis dod ni yod mi lon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-22: gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-23: phyi nang rlang kar gser ltar lci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-24: rtog pa med cing don la gzhol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-25: bzhin ni gru bzhi'i dbyibs ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-27: dkar dmar mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112a-28: ljon pa dag gi rigs smos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-0: sdong po yal @112b ga mang po'i dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-1: shin tu 'dab rgyas yal gar legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-2: mthon mthing sgra yi rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-3: byang chub sems 'drar lcang lor bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-4: stod smad kun tu phra la legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-5: srid du ring zhing ldem bag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-6: lcug phran zhes bya'i mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-7: bcu gnyis nyi shu rtsa lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-8: rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-9: mu la raktar ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-10: phra zhing bshad la gzangs su ring //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-11: ban glang sor mo gru bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-12: kham la mig 'bur smin tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-13: skra kham ma la so che zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-14: sna ring 'gram snyongs ring ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-15: ri mo can gyi bud med ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-16: nag mo grva gsum rtsing mgo ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-17: khro gnyer can la gel bag chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-18: sdong gcig yan lag gtan med pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-19: skye ba'i rgyu med bkra mi shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-20: mi reg yal ga mes tshig yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-21: spyir ni de ltar bstan mod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-22: gang dag dad ldan brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-23: yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams; ;dad pa chags shing lus 'bul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-24: thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-25: rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-26: de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-27: rmad du gsang ba'i mchod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-28: gsang ba'i phyag tshang gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-29: las kyi sgrib pa kun bsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:112b-30: man ngag gsang ba'i dmigs bu 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-2: dri spos tsandan la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-3: aa ga ru dang sbyar ba'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-4: khrus kyi cho gas dag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-5: dri zhim la sogs sna tshogs kyis; ;lus la byug pa sna tshogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-6: de nas nang gi khrus chen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-7: shin tu dag par bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-8: rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-9: nang gi rdzas rnams dag par bya; ;bur shing snying po la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-10: ro yi mchog tu gyur pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-11: rtsi 'am bcud dang sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-12: nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-13: rdzas kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-14: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-15: mi dmigs chos la blo sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-16: rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-17: rgya cher shin tu bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-18: phung po sgyu mar snang bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-19: sems la rang bzhin med par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-20: snang srid nam mkhar gcig pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-21: 'khor ba sgyu ma yin par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-22: kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-23: sangs rgyas gzhan na med par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-24: byams la dang ma chags pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-25: sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-26: gnas la nges pa med pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-27: sa rnams bgrod pa med par nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-28: sems la skye shi med pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-30: des na thams cad sgyu mar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113a-31: sgyu ma rang bzhin med shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-0: thams @113b cad chos nyid snying po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-1: mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-2: chos nyid chu bo des bkrus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-4: de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-5: rdzas kyi yo byad yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-6: rlob cing 'phur pa'i chos gos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-7: rin chen prog dang rna char bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-8: 'jo sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-9: dpung rgyan do shal se mo do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-10: nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-11: rkad gdub lag gdub la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-12: gser dang dngul la sogs pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-13: rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-14: mchod rdzas sna tshogs thogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-15: de nas 'dren pa'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-16: gsang ba'i tshig gis bsre ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-17: rdo rje lce yi dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-18: tshig gi brdas ni mtshon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-19: sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-20: sa ma ya stom zhes kyang bsre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-21: ra ga ya mi zhes brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-22: ra ho ham zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-23: ti pa su ki zhes brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-24: gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon; ;aa ti pu ho zhes brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-25: pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-26: g-yas kyi smin ma bskyod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-27: g-yon gyi smin mas mtshon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-28: na sa g-yas kyis mtshon byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-29: de bzhin na sa g-yon gyis mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-30: gtsug tor gtsug tu mtshon byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:113b-31: de bzhin dpal be'u ling+gar mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-2: zhes pa'i tshig gi don rnams bsre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-3: skul ba'i cho ga khyad par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-4: don gyis 'di ltar bskul bar rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-5: shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-6: thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-7: skul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-8: mchod pa'i yo byad dbul bar bya; ;de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-9: shes rab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsal bar gyur to; ;de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis 'di skad ces bskul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-10: mi g-yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-11: rnam par mi rtog shin tu dri med sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-12: 'od zer mdangs ldan zla ba rgyas 'dra'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-13: dgyes pa rol pa'i don la bzhengs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-14: de skad ces bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-15: zla ba'i 'od zer las 'di skad ces bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-16: yid 'ong 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-17: shes rab zab mo'i rnam dag padma'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-18: sgya 'phrul rabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-19: yid 'ong 'byor ldan cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114a-21: de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin tu 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste nyi ma'i 'od zer las sgra byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-2: dgyes pa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-3: byang chub char sprin dbab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-4: zla ba'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra phyung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-5: ae ma yid kyi dga' bde mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-6: gdung ba'i snying phreng shes rab gzungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-8: bde ba'i rdo rje byang chub 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-10: phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-11: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'khor ba thams cad thugs rjes yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thabs mchog zla ba zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-12: 'dod pa'i dbang po thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-13: chags pa'i 'gying ba'i gtso mo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-14: chags pa'i rnam par sbyad ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-15: 'dod pa gnas su drang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-17: 'khor ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i lhung bzed kyis bzung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-18: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de sgrib pa sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-21: chags pa'i sgrib pa'i bud shing rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:114b-22: me yi ye shes kyis sbyangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-0: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des bha ga @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-1: byin gyis rlob pa la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-2: 'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-3: bha ga'i snying por rab gsal ba; ;yum gyi lus kyi yan lag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-4: yum lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-6: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-7: chos nyid nam mkhar rtogs gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-8: sbyor sgrol mang po ci byas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-9: chags sdang drang ba'i thabs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-10: rdul cha tsam yang snang ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-12: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad la dgyes pa'i rol pa la zhugs par gyur te mi dmigs pa'i bde ba la ci yang mi g-yo bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-13: de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po padma'i snying po rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-17: byang chub sems kyis brlan par mdzad cing srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-18: rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115a-19: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ling lod phyad par byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-0: rig 'dzin gyi sems @115b dpa' thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-1: shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-2: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad la dbang bskur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-3: dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-4: 'khor ba'i sems can rgyu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-5: 'khor ba'i sems can rgyun chad na; ;sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-6: 'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-7: shes nas smra bar gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-8: rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-9: chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-11: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas 'jug par mkhyen nas smon gnas chen po'i lam 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-13: ma rtogs log par 'khyams pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-14: rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-15: 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams gcad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-16: nyi zla'i nang du bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-17: bcu drug sa la rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-18: des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-19: don dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa yis; ;sbyor ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-20: yum gyi mkha' dbyings zla gam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:115b-21: grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-2: byang chub sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-3: lha dgu gsal pa'i ye shes bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-4: des ni thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur; ;zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-5: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-6: gsang sbyor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-7: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-10: lo gcig gam ni zla gcig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-11: de bzhin zhag gi rnam grangs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-12: bco lnga'am yang na bdun bar du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-13: tho rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-15: shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-16: shar phyogs nam mkhas bsdus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-17: lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-18: thams cad khong du bsdus nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-19: dbugs de slar la mi dbyung bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-20: rang gi khong du bstim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-21: tha mar sna yi nang du bsre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-22: de ltar mang por bsgrubs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116a-23: dpal che gzi brjid thams cad 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-0: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje @116b snying po des rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-1: gang zhig rten la gnas 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-2: mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas mchog tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-3: thams cad 'byor bar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-4: sa las byas pa'i stegs bu bsham //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-6: zla gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-7: mtha' ma rdo rje ra bas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-8: dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-9: rin chen lugs kyi bum pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-10: tshe rdzas rgyas par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-11: mtshan ldan snod kyis kha dag ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-12: rdo rje gzungs kyis brtags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-13: tshe tshad med par mnga' gsol la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-14: dbus su de bzhin gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-15: rin chen bum pa bzhi rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-16: gsang ba'i bu mo bzhi bkod gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-17: ya mtshan byung ba'i bum pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-18: rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yab yum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-19: so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-20: thabs dang shes rab bsdebs nas ni; ;phyogs phyogs gnas su tshom bur bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-21: sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi rnams gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-22: sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-23: nyi zla ga 'ur a'a yu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-25: a'a yu byang chub sems su zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-26: rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:116b-27: dbang bskur dpal ldan mdzod ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-2: a'a yu yum bzhi'i thugs kang 'phros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-3: de bzhin tshom bu rim par brgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-4: rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-5: dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-6: de nas rdo rje tshe phreng bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-7: nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-8: padma dbang gi zhing khams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-9: byams ldan ye shes tshe dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-10: thugs kyi dpal be'u chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-12: byang chub sems kyi a'a yu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-13: dmar gsal 'bar ba'i tshe mchog de; ;rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-14: 'phros pa dgu lung dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-15: tsi ta'i dbugs la bkrag tu bslan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-16: tshe nyams rgyu drug kun spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-17: gzi byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-18: byang chub sems kyi a'a yu de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-19: skye med dbyings su sbas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-20: phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-21: dang po sku gsung thugs kyi rgya; ;gnyis pa gnon pa'i rgya gram 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-22: gsum pa rta mchog dpal gyi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-23: bzhi pa rin chen dpal be'u ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-24: lnga ba gser gyi gu hya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-25: drug ba zla gam dmar po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-27: tshe yi ngo bo rgyud gsum po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117a-28: srog gi ngo bor gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-1: 'chi ba med pa'i srog btsugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-2: 'gyur ba med pa'i g-yung drung yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-3: chos nyid dbyings su tshe spas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-4: dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar langs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-5: de la gzung zhing bstan du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-6: de nas ci bde spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-8: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de rdo rje khro bo tshe kun tu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-10: ye shes khro bo 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-11: thugs kyi dpal be'u'i 'od zer las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-12: dbang gi lha mo mang po 'phros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-13: za ma tog dang bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-14: lcags kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-15: de yis 'gro drug thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-16: tshe dang gzi byin thams cad 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-17: za ma tog tu bsdus nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-18: tshe yi rig 'dzin rnams la bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-19: ji ltar 'dod pa gong ltar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-20: rdo rje gzi mdangs 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-21: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-22: rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:117b-23: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-0: snyoms par zhugs nas dur khrod gsang ba @118a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-1: mchog gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'di rgya cher bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-4: 'khor ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-5: rnal 'byor can la bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-6: nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-7: sgrub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-8: skyon yon gnyis kyi bye brag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-9: nges par brtags te shes pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-10: blang dor gnyis su sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-11: ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-12: gangs dkar shel gyi 'dab che ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-13: seng phrug 'khra ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-14: thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-15: rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i dkyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-16: dgon pa chen po'i phug chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-17: gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-18: mngon spyod chen po sgrub pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-19: dur khrod ngam grog bshung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-20: sum mdo grog gle rtsub pa'i ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-21: dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-22: chags pa sgrub pa'i gnas yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-23: nags tshal dra bas gtibs pa'i nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-24: shin tu btsan zhing 'jigs pa'i ngogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-25: stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-26: 'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas su shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118a-27: chu mdo chu 'jigs rgya mtsho'i gling //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-0: chu yi ra @118b bas kun bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-1: chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-2: bya ba med pa'i las la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-3: der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-4: ci 'dod bltas te ma thogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-5: kha na ma tho bcas dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-6: 'byor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-7: khams las gyur pa'i nad chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-8: bcun gyi mchog gis bzlog bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-9: rtsi'am bcud dam thar pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-10: nyer rdzogs su ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-11: 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-12: dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-13: rkyen gyis bar chad 'byung srid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-14: sman dang mkhas pas bcas te sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-15: ka p'a la dang lcang lor bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-16: ga 'u chung la sogs pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-17: phyag rgya che dang ldan byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-18: dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-19: sgrub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-20: skyo ba'i yid rnams bsang phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-21: gti mug mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-22: dung dang khar rnga rdza rnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-23: cang te'u pi wam ko ki la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-24: snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-25: sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-26: nyer rdzogs su ni 'byor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-27: shin tu gtams pas tshogs chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-28: bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-29: gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-30: grub chen sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:118b-31: snying rje byams dang dga' snyoms dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-0: @119a *// gdung ba'i byang chub sems bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-1: de yang shes dang shes bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-2: rtsal chen kun tu rdzogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-3: rdo rje snying po 'bru mchog dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-4: shin tu gtams pas tshogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-5: bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-6: yon tan mchog gi gter gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-7: srid pas zhus kyang zad mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-8: rkyen thub dbang lung rdzogs par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-9: rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-11: nam mkha'i khyon ltar kun la khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-12: ma ltar byams pa'i yum mchog gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-13: rgyud sbyangs brtul zhugs mchog 'chang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-14: thogs med the tshom som nyi bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-15: 'dzin chags med cing blang dor med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-16: brtan ldan gzungs thub rdo rje ging //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-17: rdo rje drod kyi dus 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-18: tshig gi 'phen sdud skabs su sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-19: yon tan rlabs kyis 'phang bcad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-20: legs nyes dmigs su gal 'dzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-21: rdo rje tshig gi gdangs skad can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-22: rdo rje mthong ba rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-23: ngag gi dbang phyug tshig la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-24: las kyi phreng ba rdzogs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-25: 'di ltar sbyar ba'i dus chen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-26: nges par brtags te mdo gzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-27: rig byed dag gi yan lag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119a-28: shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-0: bkra @119b shis lha yi nyi ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-1: 'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-2: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-3: brtags na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-4: dus cha bzhi yi dang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-5: mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-6: dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-7: zhi dang rgyas pa de bzhin sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-8: dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-9: bam chen gsang ba'i dus su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-11: cha bzhir khyab par sbyar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-12: sgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-13: gal te dus la bab gyur na; ;dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-14: dus 'di mkhas pas yong mi bcag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-15: rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-16: ci ste 'dod pa'i mtshan ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-18: dam tshig gzungs 'du dus chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-19: sbyangs pas rtsal gyis mthar phyin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-20: shes blo'i yon tan tshogs rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-21: 'di dag tshad la bab pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-22: dus kyi mchog 'di nye bar brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-24: 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-25: gru dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-26: brten pas rin chen lon pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-27: ji srid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-28: rang bzhin med pa kun gcig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:119b-29: bdag med tshogs bral lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-1: las rnam grangs ngang gis med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-2: tha snyad dag par yongs chud na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-3: nges pa'i don chen de nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-4: thams cad dag par 'gyur ba 'o; ;bdag dang gzhan du mi gnyis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-5: bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-6: sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-7: bdag nyid lhun grub dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-8: gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-10: rdza mkhan 'phang lo srub pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-11: gang ltar dmigs pa de ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-12: 'gro ba'i khams su gzi che zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-13: 'byung chen lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-14: ngo mtshar rtsal gyi khyad par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-15: gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-16: de ltar brtson pa'i sgrub pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-17: rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-18: shes dang yon tan phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-19: gzhan du reg las med pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-20: thams cad tshang bar rdzogs pas na; ;phun sum tshogs zhes de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-21: gsang chen sgrub pa'i las 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-22: 'khor ba'i las dang mthun spyad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-23: nyon mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-25: skyon gyi yon tan chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-26: g-yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120a-27: de ltar 'khor ba'i rka bzlog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-0: mi gnas @120b ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-1: gnas rab brtag pa'i gal chen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-2: nam mkha' 'khor lo rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-3: rin chen zur brgyad padma'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-4: rgya gram la sogs 'dra bar brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-5: sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-6: ri bo brtsegs dang bzur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-7: de bzhin sgreng dang gtams pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-8: 'dra bar mkhas pas brtag par bya; ;de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-9: lnga la sogs pa so so yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-10: gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-11: nor bu rin chen de bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-12: skyon gyi gnas dag spang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-13: gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rtse dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-14: ma mo rngam pa'i spar shad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-15: srin mo dus pa'i mchi rjes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-16: gnod sbyin khro bo'i rbab shul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-18: gnas kyi skyon rnams dgra dang kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-19: mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-20: kha na ma thor bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-21: nyams pa las byung nyen dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-22: ma dag pa yi yo byad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-23: gdug can spang du 'ongs pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-24: wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-25: bskal bas bshugs te spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-26: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-27: bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:120b-28: dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-1: ni; ;rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-2: snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-3: sgrub pa brnag pa mthar dbyung phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-4: rgyal po rten dang 'khor bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-5: bden pas bsgo ba'am yang bslad ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-6: dgongs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-7: lha klu gnod sbyin sde dpung bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-8: gangs ri rtse dang rin chen ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-9: kun dga' ldum ra skyed mos tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-10: mtsho rdzing lu ma 'bab chu'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-12: gang dag bdag por gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-13: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-14: sa 'di lhun gyis grub bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-15: 'dzam gling grub pa'i sa slong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-17: rin chen gter gyi sa gzhi bslang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-18: zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-19: sa la gnas pas de mgu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-20: des ni bdag gis de 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-21: nyes pa de dang bral ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-22: byang chub spyod pa g-yo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-23: bsod nams dga' ba skyed pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-24: shes ldan rdzu 'phrul can gyi bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-25: ma skrag phrag dog yong ma skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-26: rnal 'byor mchog gi sgrub ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-27: bdud 'dul phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-28: ru dra tshogs kyi rgol ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121a-29: skyes bu las kyi don bgrangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-0: @121b don gyi dbang po'i phyir sbran pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-1: rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-2: don mchog yang dag mdzad pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-3: skyes bu rtsal gyi khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-5: sngon tshe dpal chen gar dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-6: ru dra sde bzhi bsgral nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-7: gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyas mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-8: 'gro drug thugs rjes bsgral ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-10: lha mos mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-11: bde chen sa la bgrod pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-13: spyan ldan khyod kyis dpang mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-14: sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-15: brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-16: mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir; ;ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-17: dge bar gyur na der gnas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-18: gal te shis par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-19: skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-20: mnan nam spo ba'i las kyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-21: der ni bsod nams gter ldan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-22: rin chen lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-23: sa gzhi gter chen rgyas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-24: bkra shis mchog tu bsngags pa yin; ;sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga'i khu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-25: bsres bas kun tu gru bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:121b-27: ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-1: ma'i dngos po kun sbyangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-2: rgyal ba zhugs pa'i rten du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-3: rdo rje byin rlabs 'byung gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-4: gnas rnams shin tu brtan bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-5: mchog gi sbyor ba dag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-6: sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-7: de dang der ni sa sbyangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-8: thig gis yul bcad skabs dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-9: rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-10: rdo rje drag po'i ging chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-11: lce bag nag po'i dud pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-12: rgyun mi 'chad du byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-13: khro bo drag po'i sngags zlos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-14: rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-15: shes rab yul gyi 'jo tshul gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-16: rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'de gu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-17: srin bal ye 'u sbyar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-18: kun tu zla ba'i thig le bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-19: rdo rje rgyal po 'phags rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-20: so so'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-21: so so'i stang stabs sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-22: de dag gnas su byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-23: gsang ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-24: gsang ba'i las kyi sngon logs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-25: bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-26: sbyin mchod srung ba'i las chen bcol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-27: gzhal yas gnas kyi phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122a-28: mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-0: shing ngam pa so de @122b dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-1: lugs sam phyag rgya'i gzugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-2: mgon po bzhi ru mnga' gsol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-3: gnas kyi sgo srung so bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-4: ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas; ;rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-5: 'jig rten skyong pa'i tha tshig can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-6: mthu chen mgon po sde bzhi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-7: so so'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-8: chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-9: 'phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-10: rigs bzhi kha dog so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-11: rang rtags lha yi mtshan ma thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-13: bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-14: rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-15: sgrub pa'i rtsal 'di mthar dbyung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-16: rkyen gyi bar chad bsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-17: gsang ba'i man ngag sbyang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-18: 'jug srid dam sri gnon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-19: dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-20: rnal 'byor gsang ba'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-21: dngos grub chu la rdul 'jug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-22: khro bo h'um chen kun 'dus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-23: gsod cing gnon pa'i las bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-24: ri rab chen po rmad du gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-25: ya ma r'a dza'i zas su sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-26: chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:122b-28: bdun rgyud rigs ni brlags gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-0: @123a *// nam yang ldang bar mi nus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-1: byang chub sems ni skyes na gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-3: ma ma ba sham ku ru nan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-5: de ltar drag po'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-6: sgo nas phyi rol bar khang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-7: mkha' 'dra'i khung bu byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-8: dug dang rtsub pa'i phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-9: khrag sna tshogs dang mi ro yis; ;shin tu bsub cing gnon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-10: de nas rdo rje nang dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-11: seng+ge'i lta bas bltas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-12: rdo rje gom pas phyogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-13: khro mig 'bar bas phyir bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-14: 'gyid bag tshul du brjid pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-15: 'bar ba'i rdo rje spar nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-16: phyi nang rdul chen bsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-18: h'um/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-19: skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-20: yod mthong snang grags ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-22: rdam chen gtum thung she dag 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-23: dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-25: rakta kro dhi dzva la kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-26: ha la ha la tishtha phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-27: ces pas khro bo rol pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-28: stabs dang ma mo'i rdam tshul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-29: phra men lhags pa'i rngam stabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123a-31: rdo rje dkrigs pa'i phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-0: @123b tho ba lcags kyu 'bar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-1: 'khor lo ral gri la sogs rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-2: kun gyi phyag rgya mtshan mas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-3: de las 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-4: mig les 'bar ba'i me mched pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-6: dmigs sam dngos su sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-7: 'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-8: sreg pa'i dpal chen gur du gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-9: h'um ram rdo rje me yi ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-10: lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-11: 'bar ba'i lha brgyad bsgyel nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-12: dbang chen rdo rje bka' sdod gnas; ;shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-13: gtum chen ha la rngam pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-14: lha chen khyab 'jug pags bshus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-15: zhing chen g-yang gzhi'i na bza' bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-16: gshin rje ma tram 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-17: ro dbyug chen po phyag na 'phyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-18: phra men dgu khri mang po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-19: 'bar ba'i tshogs ni gtibs thag bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-20: gang la cis 'dul der ston pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-21: tsi ta 'bar ba'i me phreng gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-22: do shal mgur chu phreng bas sbrengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-23: bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-25: nam mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:123b-27: dur khrod dgon pa'i sa phyogs dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-2: me yi yi dvags ma dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-3: gang yang gnas par mi phod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-4: steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-7: gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du thal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-8: me lce dgu phreng 'bar ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-10: dur khrod me ni smug cing 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-12: nga rgyal sreg pas ser nag 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-14: phrag dog sreg pas ljang nag 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-15: gti mug sel bas smug nag 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-17: dzva la mandal ha la ha la ram//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-18: me'i ri lag chu'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-19: gnas sam dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-20: chos nyid bdal ba'i nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-21: ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtsegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-22: kun gzhi bdal ba'i nam mkha' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-23: skyed ma'i 'byung chen rnam lnga brtsegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-24: brum las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-25: mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab; ;ta la'i bskyed cing gser tsong dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-26: zla gam dam po dbang gi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-27: brum kham tram kha la ti brum//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124a-28: zhes pas rnam lnga'i byug pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-0: gtor zhing kun tu @124b byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-1: sgrub mchog skyong ba'i rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-2: rdo rje tshig gis btab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-4: 'bras bur red phyir byin gyis rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-5: rdo rje rgyal dbang chen po das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-6: sgrib pa sreg pa'i yi ge ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-7: phreng bar byas te gnas su 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-9: rig 'dzin pho mo'i mtshan mas gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-10: rnam lnga'i byug pas kun la gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-11: rtags kyi phyag rgya lag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-12: rnal 'byor chen po'i lugs su spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-13: 'jig rten spyod tshul thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-14: sgyu ma yin phyir shin tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-16: ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-17: ae ma dur khrod gsang ba yi; ;rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-18: skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-20: ae ma ho dga' mchog bde chen grogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-21: dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-22: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-23: sprul pa'i gshog sprugs gra rgyas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-24: tshogs gnyis rtsal gyis rlabs spar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-25: chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-26: aa yam dza lam kham lhan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:124b-27: de ring phan chad rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-0: dbang phyug yin pas ci bder @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-1: spyod; ;rnal 'byor longs spyod bskyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-2: dug rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-3: mam las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-5: dam rdzas yo byad longs spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-6: gong nas cha gsum so so nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-7: shan ma 'dres par sta gon bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-8: phyi yi cha la 'jug pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-9: mchod sbyin spel ba'i yo byad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-10: de gnyis gnyis pa'i cha dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-11: mjug gi rgyal chos longs spyod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-12: rmad byung nang gi cha dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-13: thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-14: ras sam shing khyon dag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-15: bsdus te sgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-16: dbyug pa chen pos de la gtor; ;lce phog nag po'i dud pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-17: rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-18: 'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-19: tsham ngam chen po'i stabs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-20: sna tshogs bsur gyi dri chen gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-21: de nas rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-22: yo byad de dag bdud rtsi lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-23: dam rdzas so sor bsdus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-25: zhu nas phyag mtshan rnam lngar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-26: dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125a-27: shes rab lha mo rig 'dzin ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-0: bzhi 'am yang na @125b rnam pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-1: rdzas sam yo byad rang bzhin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-2: zas mchog gar gyis spyir blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-3: longs spyod spel ba'i dbyangs 'dis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-4: bdag cag rig 'dzin shes rab ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-5: rgyal sras lha yi dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-6: dgyes pas tshim pa'i longs spyod dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-7: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-9: ma rmos lo tog rgyas pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-10: rnal 'byor longs spyod chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-11: nam mkha'i khams su gtibs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-12: rdo rje dgyes tshogs kun 'dus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-13: skal ldan rnams kyis rab sprul cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-14: rdo rje gar gyi dbang bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-15: sgeg pas lha mo 'jo tshul dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-16: 'dud cing sdod pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-17: rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-18: aom shr'i badzra l'a sye h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-20: badzra girti hr'i:hr'i:badzra nirti aa:aa:rdo rje karma'i thabs mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-21: rdo rje glu 'dis gzi byin skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-22: rdo rje bdud rtsi longs spyod 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-23: rtsi mchog bcud kyi snying po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-24: gzi mdangs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-25: bkrag 'dzin gzugs mchog dran pa'i dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-26: rdo rje can gyi byin stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-27: skal pa can gyi zas su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:125b-28: skal med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-2: sa ma ya dza:ku su tsa ma ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-3: smug zil lha mo mnyen gsal ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-4: rlan rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma; ;bdud rtsi chu rgyun dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-5: rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-6: shing lo 'dab las bdud rtsi sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-7: 'bru thog sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin; ;rang gnyer las skal 'bras bur skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-8: lha mo sra brtan dbang sgyur ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-9: khu ba bcud las bdud rtsir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-10: bdud rtsi zhun chen dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-11: rang gnyer las skal brtan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-12: rdo rje lha mo shel mdog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-13: nyi zer bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-14: gsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-15: rang gnyer las skal gzi byin skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-16: lha mo khro gnyer sngo bsangs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-17: dur khrod rdzas las bdud rtsir sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-18: sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-19: rang gnyen las skal byin 'bebs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-20: rtse yi lha mo blo gros ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-21: rtsi thog bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-22: rtsva mchog kun gyi dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-23: rang gnyer las skal tshim byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-24: sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-25: dug rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-26: bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126a-27: rang gnyer las skal 'di kun yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-0: rdo rje glu yis brten @126b nas ni; ;rnal 'byor chen po'i yo byad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-1: rol mos dga' ston longs spyod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-2: de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-3: phyi nang mthun 'jug bka' sdod pa'i; ;gshin rje chos kyi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-4: bran gyi bya bar dbang bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-5: phyi mtshams srung bar dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-7: ci 'dra bar ni byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-8: phyi khyams sgo yi phyi rol du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-9: ma he khri la bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-10: mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mgu byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-11: de tshe 'di yis bsko bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-12: gsang chen lhun grub pho brang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-13: las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-14: bcom ldan chos rjes bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-15: de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-16: bka' gsang gzhung tshan 'di sgrub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-17: yang dag don la des 'jug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-18: 'di dag nor bu rin chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-19: 'di la rtod cing bar gcod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-20: lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-21: khyod kyi 'khor dang g-yog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-22: rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-23: gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-24: bla med 'bras bur ma gyur tsher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-25: sa 'di yan chad ma gtang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-26: dpal chen mi pham bka' ma 'da'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-27: bdag cag ye nas gnyis med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:126b-28: de tsam don gyi dbyings su gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-0: phyi rol skyong ba'i mu ran @127a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-1: la; ;rdo rje yal dam thub par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-2: badzra ya ma r'a dza sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-3: zhes pas gshin rje mnas bsgags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-5: brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-6: dngos grub 'byung bar byed pa'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-7: phyag rgya che dang gzugs mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-8: stegs bu legs par sbyangs na 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-9: mtshon pas khrid par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-10: rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-11: brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad bgyi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-12: so sor brtags te bshad bgyi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-13: brtan zhing ngos 'jam khung bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-15: kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-16: des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-17: shing shun ras sam dur khrod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-18: zhing chen ras la kha dog lngas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-19: phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs bris na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-20: de yang mtshan ma 'byung pa'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-21: rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-22: dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-23: mkhas pas 'bur du dod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-25: gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-26: zangs lcags khar ba'i rgyu dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-27: mkhan gyis blugs te ma nyams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-28: de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127a-29: blaksha byang chub shing la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-0: rgyud shing yal ga @127b mnyan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-1: phyag rgya'i gzugs de legs sbyar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-2: de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-3: mnyen cing sbyin pa'i mchog rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-4: bzhin dang 'dril khugs legs sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-5: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-7: de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-8: yi ge'am yang na mtshan rtags sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-9: ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-10: bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-11: de las re zhig 'dir bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-12: stegs bu la brten mtshan ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-13: bsgrub pa'i don du brtag bzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-14: brtsam pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-15: gong du smos pa'i rgyu rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-16: stegs bu mdzes shing mnyam byas te; ;kun tu gru bzhi cha mnyam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-17: bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-18: me long lta bur snying por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-19: snang byung yang dag byin brlabs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-20: ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-21: bka' gsang rmad byung pho brang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-22: dur khrod rdzas lngas skyang nul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-23: rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-24: cho ga rnam par bshad bgyi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-25: gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-26: rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:127b-28: 'jur mdud can du ma gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-2: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-3: rgyu de byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-4: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-7: rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs kyis de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-9: nges par brtags te 'dir bzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-10: mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-11: smin dkyus ring la lag sor phra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-12: tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-13: kha nas autpal ngad ldang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-14: lus la ga pur tsandan dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-15: yid 'ong mtshan ldan rked skabs phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-16: skra 'jam mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil; ;so dkar tshags dam dkar dmar phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-17: mig gi dkyus ring smin dkyus legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-18: zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-19: dpral ba'i dbyes phye skra mtshams 'khyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-20: sna bzang mdog gsal padma'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-21: lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-22: nu ma'i dkyil mtho zla rgyas 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-23: sha dkar tshogs dam 'khril bag chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-25: skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128a-26: cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-0: skyes bu bla mas yum @128b du gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-1: gzungs mar byin gyis brlab pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-2: yum gyi phung po gnas lngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-5: sangs rgyas byin brlabs dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-6: bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-7: rdo rje yab la'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-8: de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-9: yum gyi mkha' la me ri bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-10: gsang ba dbugs kyi zla gam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-12: gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin; ;yum gyi mkha' la de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-13: de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-14: lus kyi yum la nges par bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-15: shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-17: chags pa'i tshul gyis thabs la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-19: 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zla gam sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-20: gsang ba'i byang chub sems 'dren pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-21: khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-22: rang bzhin chos kyi mtshan ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-23: rdo rje las kyi yum yin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-24: gsang ba'i las rnams kun byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-25: lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-26: nyi zla 'bar ba'i tshogs bkod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:128b-27: gsang ba'i byang chub dkar dmar 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-2: las kyi rdo rje 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-3: rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-4: byang chub sems kyi thig 'di drongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-5: rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di drongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-6: rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-7: aom tsandra dha ra hr'i zhes pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-8: gsang ba'i thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-9: rdzas mchog 'bar ba'i thig le yis; ;gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-10: gsang ba'i thabs kyi thig le bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-11: srad bu'i sbyor ba de rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-12: gol sgrib rtag chad skyon bral ba'i; ;che chung ya yo med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-13: rdo rje dbu ma'i thig 'di dgye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-15: mi dmigs bdal ba'i mandal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-16: ye shes lnga yi thig 'phros pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-17: bde chen rnam thar phyag rgya'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-18: kun gzhi nam mkha'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-19: nyon mongs rtog pa'i mandal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-21: phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-22: mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-24: byang chub sems kyi thig 'phros pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-25: ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-26: bkra shis dben pa'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129a-27: mtshan ma rten gyi mandal la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-0: @129b rdo rje srad bu'i thig 'phros pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-2: stong gsum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-3: rmad byung rdo rje'i thig 'gyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-4: gsang ba'i dam la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-5: 'byung po skye bo gdol pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-6: rdo rje rtsal gyi h'um ring las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-7: rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu yug 'tshub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-8: phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro bos gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-9: 'bar ba gsang ba'i mtshams bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-10: phyi rol sde pa'i 'grul rnams gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-11: rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-12: sreg dang 'joms pa'i drag shul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-13: rdo rje lce yis 'dir gdeg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-14: rdo rje nyi ma'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-15: rdo rje dpal be'u 'od kyi thig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-16: me long ye shes rang bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-17: rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-18: de bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-20: dpag med nam mkha'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-21: rigs kyi dpal be'u 'od kyi thig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-22: ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-23: rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-24: rdo rje mkha' la 'khro lo bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-25: thabs dang shes rab zung ya bzhis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-26: so so'i phyag tu gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-27: nam mkha' dbus kyis nying po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-28: srad bu bzhi yi rgya gram bre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:129b-29: de nas rdo rje brtan ba'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-2: rdo rje srad bu'i thig chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-3: phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-4: che chung med par snyoms par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-5: 'dir ni rdo rje mu khyud bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-6: 'byung ba'i rim pa drug bar du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-8: gru chad rtsibs mtshan me ri 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-9: mu khyud tshar gsum 'bar ba'i phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-10: bar khyams bzhis mdzes phyi khyams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-11: lngar gsal sgo dgu shar du brtsegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-12: pho brang de yi gnas gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-13: phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-14: mu khyud mtha' zad yan chad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-15: yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhi yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-16: cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-18: ka tsa li la sogs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-19: de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-20: las kyi lha ste he ru ka //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-21: 'khor lo mtha' ma'i rtsibs la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-22: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-23: gru chad phyi dang nang la dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-24: h'um chen bcu yi yab yum dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-25: shin tu mdzes par dang po la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-26: de nyid la ni ma brgyad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-27: ging chen bco brgyad rgyas par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-28: gnyis pa'i khyams la mkha' 'gro brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130a-29: shugs 'gro brgyad kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-0: gsum pa'i @130b khyams la phra men brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-1: de bzhin 'bar ma brgyad rnams bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-2: bzhi pa'i khyams la phor thogs brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-3: de bzhin srin mo gzhong thogs brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-4: kun tu mdzes par bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-5: lnga pa'i khyams ni tha ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-6: rdo rje slas dang bran mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-7: pho nya la sogs rgyas par dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-8: de yang tshul du dgod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-9: gong ma dag ni rgyu rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-10: ka tsa li la sogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-11: ji ltar 'byor pa de ltar bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-12: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-13: rmad du byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-14: rdo rje gsang ba'i rim gyis dkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-15: rdo rje gsang sgo phye nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-17: rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-18: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor der rdzogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-19: 'dir yang don gyi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-20: rig 'dzin che ba'i sa sbar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-21: shar gyi gdan gyi khyad par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-23: zla ba nyi ma g-yas g-yon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-24: zhabs rten tshul gyi mandal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-25: rdo rje rgyal po yab yum bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-26: lho yi gdan gyi khyad par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-27: glang chen rdo rjes btegs 'khor lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-28: padma g-yas g-yon zhabs brten tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-29: rdo rje rgyal ba yab yum bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-30: byang gi gdan gyi khyad par la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:130b-31: padma rdo rje btegs rgya gram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-2: nub bam phyogs sam mtshams gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-3: gzhi rnams gcig tu gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-4: mandal rgyun ma chad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-5: rdo rjes gtams shing sbrel byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-8: rtsal 'phang che chung khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-9: skal dang ldan nam mi ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-10: la la dag la zla ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-11: rangs pa'i gdan gyi mtshan ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-12: de yang rtsal 'phang che chung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-13: la la rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-14: la la rdo rje phyed mas mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-15: la la ma rangs zla gam kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-16: nang du bstan pas mtshan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-17: la la rtses 'bigs rnam par mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-18: la la padma brtsegs pas mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-19: la la dag la mtshan ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-20: la las gdan de mi non te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-21: nar ma gang zag mi yi rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-22: so so'i bde ba'i thabs su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-23: kun tu bde bar sbyar ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-24: pi par stan zhes grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-25: kun tu khyab par lus bder sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-26: rmad byung bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-27: 'jug dang dngos grub stsol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-28: dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131a-29: 'dod par bya ba sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-0: gtor ma la sogs rdzas @131b kyi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-1: cha gsum dag la bgos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-2: gcig ni sbyin sreg las mchog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-3: gcig la rnal 'byor longs spyod gter //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-5: gnas su bkra shis la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-6: sgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-7: dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-8: dkyil 'khor dgu brtsegs dpal gyi rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-9: ye shes dgu yi khong gseng gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-10: me ri 'od kyi thig thag gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-11: 'khor lo tshogs chen bsgrub pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-12: rnal 'byor rtsal mchog can gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-13: sgrub pa rtsa yi dkyil 'khor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-14: dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi mdo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-15: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-16: tshogs chen 'dus pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-17: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-19: rig 'dzin thams cad nges par 'grub par 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-20: de bzhin thams cad kun rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-21: rigs kyi khyad par 'di dag dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-22: so so'i rigs su bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:131b-23: rdo rje can la dpal be'u ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-0: @132a *// de bzhin rin chen rin chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-2: las ni kun tu rgya gram 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-4: so so'i rigs rnams gtsor gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-6: rnam par bkod de legs sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-7: bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-8: sgrub dang sgrub chen rdzogs par bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-9: ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-10: so so'i rigs ni gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-11: ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-12: yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar bya; ;nges ni rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-13: gsal bar nges par 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-15: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-16: rdo rje rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-17: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-20: blang dor med par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-21: chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-22: bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-23: bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132a-24: gtsang ngam mi gtsang gnyis su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-0: de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin mi'i thod pa can mang po @132b dag rnam par 'dzin pa rnal 'byor gyi gral nas langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-1: aa la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-3: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-5: zhes gsol pa las; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-7: rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la phul cig ces gsungs pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-8: 'dod chags kyi rig 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can rdo rje thal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-10: bdag cag gi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-12: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-13: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-14: bud med thams cad thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-16: yang dag rig ni mi gos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-18: de nas rig 'dzin raksha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-19: bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-20: sems can thams cad bsad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:132b-21: zag pa mi gtsang snyigs ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-2: zos na dam tshig mchog lags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-4: bdag gi dam tshig de lag so; ;zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-5: de nas yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yaksha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-7: bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-8: mi yi bdag po thams cad la //
