K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-10: gser la sogs pa brku spyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-11: yang dag rig ni mi gos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-13: bdag gi dam tshig de lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-15: de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od srung ral pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-19: mi yi mgo bo bcad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-20: bzang dang ngan ni bye brag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-21: rig pas brtags te shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-22: bzang ba'i rtags can bsten bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-23: dkar po ra ri lcang lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-26: rgol ba thams cad 'joms par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133a-27: yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-0: de yi yon tan @133b 'di las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-1: bdag gi dam tshig de lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-3: de nas yang bram ze sha la dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-4: sha za mo'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-6: bdag cag gi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-8: ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-9: mi sha glang chen sha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-10: sha rnams 'dra bar gtsang sme med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-11: zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-12: bdag gi dam tshig de lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-14: de nas yang srin mo'i rig 'dzin khrag 'phrog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-16: bdag cag gi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-18: srog chags sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-19: bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-21: bdag gi dam tshig de lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-23: lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-24: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-25: bro gar glu tshig chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-26: thams cad bsten pa'i mchog lags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-27: bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-28: glu yi snyan dngags don bsgrags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:133b-29: yid kyi dbang po thams cad 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-2: 'di ni dga' ba'i dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-3: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-5: de nas rig 'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-7: bdag cag rnams kyi spyi'i dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-9: dkar nag las ni ci spyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-10: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-11: rab 'bring tha dad bye brag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-12: de bzhin 'di la bde sdug gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-13: dge dang mi dge'i rtsod pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-14: rnon po'i mtshon gyis gcad du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-15: ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-16: thogs pa med pa'i don phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-17: srog kyang gcad cing gsad du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-19: sdig pa chen po'i las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-20: bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-21: gal te gang+g'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-22: sems can de la sbyin byin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-23: de bzhin gang+g'a'i bye snyed kyi; ;sems can thams cad bsad pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-24: yang dag rig la tha dad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-25: nam mkha' dag la rdul dang chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-26: ji ltar mi chags pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-27: gang zhig khrel dang 'dzem ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-28: dogs pa'i rtog pa de bzung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-29: dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134a-30: chags pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-0: lus rnams gdung @134b bar byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-1: sems can de ni 'du shes chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-4: ae ma ho thod pa can gyi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-5: khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-6: mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-7: khur dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-8: yang dag yang dag ces smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-9: yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-10: mdud pa bkrol ba ma byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-11: tha mar phyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-12: chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-13: chags pa'i dbang gis der sbyor na; ;de dag de yi grong khyer du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-14: gnas 'gyur de yi sems can yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-15: 'du shes sgyur ba'i las chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-16: sdang ba'i dbang gis sems shor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-17: shan pa gsod pa'i rig 'dzin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-18: ltung 'gyur sdig pa'i ri bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-19: rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-20: gang che bder gshegs rgyal ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-21: mi gcang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-22: yongs su bstabs par gyur na ko //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-23: de tshe las kyi rnam smin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-24: thar med nad kyis bzung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-26: sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-27: dku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-28: gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:134b-30: dri snom ro dang bcud rnams 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-1: na; ;ci phyir ci ste de rnams bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-2: sems nyid rin chen yod bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-3: gzhan gyi rin chen spyod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-4: log pas log pa len pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-5: 'di dag mdud pa dam po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-6: dkar nag las la khyad med ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-7: thams cad khra bos spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-8: rigs med rigs chad log pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-10: bde gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-11: yan lag tshig tu ma dag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-12: nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-13: gang gi dus rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-14: dbang po'i yan lag ma tshang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-15: dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-17: bder gshegs rgyal ba sgom zlos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-18: cho 'phrul khro tshul bstan pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-19: mtshan ma nyid du der go na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-20: las kyi srin po'i rig 'dzin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-21: rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun; ;mtshan ma nyid du brtags gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-22: ci la'ang rtog cing chags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-24: aa dang h'um la sogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-25: rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-26: mtshan ma nyid du der brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-27: tsandan sbrul gdug la sogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135a-28: ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gegs chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-0: khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas @135b chen lnga; ;de nyid dngos por de brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-1: 'byung po khrag gi dri snom pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-2: lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-3: ma bdun rngam pa'i cha lugs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-4: gang zhig rtog par der go na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-5: srin mo mi sdug sha za mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-7: mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-8: der btsan der bzung dmigs pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-9: sho gam gnas kyi gcan chen rigs; ;'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-10: las kyi dbang btsan bran mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-11: de 'dra nyid du de brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-12: gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshogs su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-13: gzhan gyi tshe la 'tshe ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-14: des na mdud pa chen po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-15: khur du bshal ba'i gdongs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-16: 'tshal pas lta ba'i mig long ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-17: sems kyi nor bu rin chen de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-18: rtag chad khams su stor bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-19: de lta'i skyon chen spang bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-20: de skad ces bka' stsal pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-21: thod pa can gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis zin cing rang rang gi spyod pa la skyo ba skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-25: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-26: log pa'i dka' thub tu 'gyur ba lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:135b-27: 'di dag yang dag pa'i dka' thub tu gnas par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-1: gsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-2: bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-3: bdag cag rnams kyis rtog pa so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa chen po'i bzhad pa mdzad nas rigs kyi bu rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-6: de ltar zhu ba legs kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-8: khyed rnams kyi spyod pa mi dgag par ji ltar dga' ba'i bsam pa so sor rabs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-9: 'jig rten mtshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang sngags kyi dka' thub chen por bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-10: rang rang gi spyod pa ma bkag par sgo gsum lhug par spyod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-11: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-12: ae ma ho thod pa can gyi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-13: bud med bud med thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-14: skyed par byed pa'i rten yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-15: 'bras bu smin pa'i zhing yang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-16: bsgral zhing gdon pa'i gnas yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-17: shes rab dga' ba'i yul yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-18: 'di la sems gsum gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-19: ye nas dag pa chos nyid sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-20: mkha' dang sbyor ba byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-21: snying rjes sgrol ba gsum sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136a-22: chos nyid gsang ba nyi shar khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-0: @136b snying rjes sgrol ba gsum gyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-1: ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-2: chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-3: bsgral ba'i rgyu mchog man chad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-4: shel chen car la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-5: de la rgyu drug sa bon gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-6: rang bzhin ye nas de gzhom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-7: khyad par 'das pa'i yi ge lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-8: gnas bkod 'phros pas mtha' yas bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-9: thams cad stongs shing zad byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-10: 'dus pa'i yi ge lnga ru gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-11: de las phyag mtshan ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-12: mi gnas ye shes ngang du thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-13: sgrib pa'i phung por smin pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-14: rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-15: 'jo tshul stabs kyis sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-16: kha tv'am la sogs sngags bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-17: bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-18: rnam shes dbugs kyi sgrom drangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-19: rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sgrom du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-20: bsdus te rdo rje dbugs can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-21: h'u byas sgril ma de la bslan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-22: gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-23: tshon gang 'od du bstim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-24: yu ti aa ham gis sbar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-25: gsal na de dang mnyam du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-26: rdo rje tshe la bslan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-27: rdo rje rlung gis dbugs sbar te; ;thugs las rlung sgrom lam du sbar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-28: nam mkha' chos kyi gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-29: nyi ma'i steng du h'um du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:136b-30: ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-2: aa yang phat kyis bskyod 'phangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs kar 'phros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-4: ye shes sems dpar gsal ba la; ;dngos por snang bar 'dzin dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-6: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-7: rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-8: rdo rje gdung pa'i glu blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-9: man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-10: bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-11: sman gyis bstabs te phung por btsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-12: 'khor ba'i phung po de bsdus la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-13: rdo rje stabs dang klu yis sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-14: gnas gnas dag tu bsngo bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-15: phung po mchod pa'i rdzas su bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-16: rdo rje pra yi las rnams gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-17: des ni mnyes dang skong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-18: rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-19: rnal 'byor las kyi dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-20: mtho gtsang shes rab gangs rum nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-21: rig pa'i sder mo spar shad can; ;nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-22: rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas seng phrug rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-23: rdo rje rtsal chen 'di sbyangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-24: rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs pa'i rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-25: dngos grub 'byung ba'i rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-26: mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137a-27: byin rlabs phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-0: rgyal ba'i dngos grub man @137b chad nas; ;mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-1: dregs pa ma rungs sde pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-2: thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-3: 'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-4: 'khor ba'i skam gling chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-5: rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-6: rgyud drug 'das pa'i rnam shes srog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-7: dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-8: rtag chad mthar shi'i ro gling nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-9: gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-10: bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-11: rtag chad mtha' las ro blangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-12: byang chub sems su gsal ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-13: ro yi rdzas rnams btsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-14: khro tshogs rngam par bdag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-15: rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig nang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-16: mthing nag h'um gi seng chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-17: 'khor ba'i ro gling khams su spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-18: bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-19: ye shes rol pa'i zhing du blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-20: khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-21: tsham ngam chen po'i rngam tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-23: thabs chen bco brgyad stabs kyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-25: 'dzem tshul lta zhing rnam par rtsen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-26: sgra skad bsgyur zhing he hes sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:137b-27: 'thab cing rtsod pas rnam par rngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-0: g-yas su lta zhing g-yon du @138a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-1: 'gyur; ;yid ma ches te phyir yang lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-2: sdang mig logs kyis khyab par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-4: ha ha ru lu'i rngam sgra sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-5: so so'i brda skad 'byin byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-6: bstod pa'i tshul gyis mchod zhing rgyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-7: yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-9: 'khor ba'i rnam smin dpyis phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-10: rnam gsum dug chen gtan sprugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-11: thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-12: rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-13: dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-14: rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma nor bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-15: shel phur gnyis kyis gsang nas bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-16: nges par gshin pa'i gzhi ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-17: cung zhig brtod de nye 'khor bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-18: bzhin phyogs gang bltas legs nyes brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-19: phyi yi bzang ngan de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-20: nang du nges par gsal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-21: nyes pa'i mtshan byung mkhas pas mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-22: gal te dri bas gleng slong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-23: de yi the tshom gsal ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-24: dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-25: mtshan mar rtog pa 'di dag rnams; ;'jigs byed bka' la btags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-26: 'dod chags bdag po nga la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138a-27: ji skad smras pa de bshad kyi [?]/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-0: mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams rtogs par @138b gyis; ;'jig rten mgon khyod bdag la gson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-1: bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-2: snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-3: nye [?] dang legs pa 'di las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-4: skyon gyi mtshan ma bdun pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-5: kha sbub pa dang gdan las bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-6: rgyud mi 'phel dang mtshams su gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-7: bar chad 'byung dang bgegs ldang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-10: legs pa'i rgyu ni bcu gcig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-11: gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-12: rig 'dzin lam 'gro nam mkhar 'phur; ;khams gsum dbang bsdu rdo rje spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-13: pha rol g-yul zlog zil gyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-14: mthu dang byin rlabs tshe 'phel dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-15: mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-16: slob ma chu yi rgyud 'phel dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-17: dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-18: phyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-19: dngos grub rnam gsum thob pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-21: de yang bye brag 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-22: phyed du 'gyur na thob thang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-23: sum cha tsam la btang snyoms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-24: de yang so so'i mtshan rtags su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-25: brtag cing ming du brjod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-26: dkar po spros med chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-27: lcang lo kun rdzogs longs spyod ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:138b-28: ma 'ongs sprul pa mdzad pa'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-2: bder gshegs dus gsum 'byung ba'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-4: thabs kyi rgyal po dpal gyi dkor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-8: rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-9: ngo mtshar thog thog rkan sgra can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-10: rmad byung gsang ba'i rang sgra dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-11: rig 'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-12: nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-13: rmad byung sgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-14: su zhig dngos grub gang 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-15: the tshom med par dus 'dir longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-16: gang dag bka' ltar mi byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-17: su zhig dam la mi gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-18: nga yi gzugs mthong tsam gyis 'tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-19: sgra thos tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-20: zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-21: rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-22: 'di dag don dang ldan par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-23: 'di ltar grags pas nges don ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-24: rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-25: thams cad dpal ldan lcang lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-26: la la bkra shis mtshan ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-27: de bzhin pam tsa ku la yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-28: la la dpyad kyi na sha yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-29: de bzhin mi 'gyur sra mkhregs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-30: ma h'a ke sa dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-31: ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139a-32: a'a yu p'a la tshe yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-0: la la me le @139b de byi brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-1: la la de bzhin kha sva kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-2: kha hu pa yi dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-4: bde gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-5: gtsug phud dge gtsug dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-6: dzny'a na m'urti de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-7: la la dzny'a na kunda li //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-8: de bzhin khro bo kunda li //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-9: ae ka dza ti mtshan ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-10: aa bi mu ka rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-11: 'dod pa brtan zhing bde ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-12: gnyis med don ldan thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-13: bu tra mang 'phel lcug phran rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-14: rdo rje bse phor mtshan rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-15: shel phor gsang ba'i don 'byung ba; ;sku gsung lhun grub ka p'a la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-16: thams cad re ba yid bzhin skong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-17: de bzhin yon tan rdzogs kun rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-18: bkra shis mtshan ni kun ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-19: de bzhin mi 'gyur g-yung drung brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-20: mi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-22: srid pa yongs sgrol las kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-23: khams gsum dbang sdud khyad par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-24: drug gsum gtan sprugs las mchog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-25: mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-26: rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-27: yon tan skyon rnams sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-28: mang dang nyung ba'i gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:139b-30: rjes 'dra la sogs skyon rnams spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-2: sku gsum smin pa'i g-yung drung rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-3: sba thabs gsang ba'i man ngag 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-4: skal ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-5: skal med kun gyi rtog pa'i bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-6: ming tsam 'dzin la ga la brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-7: mkhas pas brtag cing bzang po brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-8: dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus chen yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-9: gcig dang gsum ni rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-10: de bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-11: dgu ni dngos grub tha ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-12: bcu gcig phan chad yal bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-13: de bas rnal 'byor rtsal chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:140a-14: nges par brtson de brtag par rigs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-15: smra ba'i dbang po kha dbye zhing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-17: 'di ni lce yi mngon shes yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-18: rdo rje tshig tu brtag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-20: snying gi dbang po thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-21: bskams sam phye mar byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-22: snying po mchog dang sbyar byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-23: dran pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-24: dpal be'u tsi ta'i dkyil 'khor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-25: dran pa'i rten gyis yongs bskor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-26: snying gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-27: dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144a-28: thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-0: gzhan gyi sems ni @144b shes pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-2: lus kyi dbang po thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-3: btags sam phye mar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-4: sra mkhregs bcud ngang sbyar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-5: reg bya'i snying po 'bum bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-6: lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-7: mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-8: mi gnas ye shes chen po'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-9: phra mo'ang nan tan mchog tu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-11: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-12: mngon shes rig pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-13: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-15: mchog chen po'i sgrub lugs ni; 'di ltar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-16: don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-17: las kyi stegs bu chag phyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-18: me ris bskor te 'bar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-20: sum brtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-21: brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-22: phyi mtha' thod pa'i phreng bas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-23: de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas bskor; ;de yi phyi mtha' dmar chen rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-24: zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-25: zla gam brgyad la gnas bdag brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:144b-26: mthing nag ya tha me rir 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-2: sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-3: sgo brtsegs sgo khyud tha ma bran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-4: thams cad gang yin de ltar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-5: phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-6: rnam bzhi las kyi mandal brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-8: za byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis; ;thar pa tsa ra bsgral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-9: drod ldan man ngag 'chang ba des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-10: mchog gi byin brlabs gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-11: dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrangs nas; ;gnas mchog dben pa'i ri bo rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-12: rna nyan phra gsag can dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-14: gsang chen spyod pa'i gnas su shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-15: rnam bzhi las kyi rtags nyung na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-16: gcig gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-17: sgrub pa'i rgyal po gdeng ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-18: shin tu brjid cing sran tshugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-19: khu 'phrig rtog bral brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-20: las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-21: dri zhim dag pa'i sman dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-22: phyi bkru shi ne da hu las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-23: nang yang dag pa chen por bya; ;tshad mar sbyar ba'i bka' dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-24: ldan nas dus btab shin tu brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-25: de yang brtag pa'i gal che ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145a-26: bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-0: bong @145b tshod lo ni dar la bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-1: rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-2: bsgral ba'i rdzas su rung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-4: bsgrub pa'i rdzas su bya ba de; ;de 'dra'i mtshan rtags yod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-5: ma sbyangs sa la slebs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-6: sgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-7: da hu mandas dbang po bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-8: rdo rje pra mkhan phab nas ni; ;snang srid thams cad dri ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-9: legs nyes thams cad dri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-10: dbang po sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-11: bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig le gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-12: rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo lnga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-13: so so 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-14: so so rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-15: phyag rgya bkod de nyon mongs bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-16: bsgral sbyar thams cad sbyangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-17: mchod dang mnyes dang dam skong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-18: dngos grub rnam gsum gang thob blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-19: thob nas thams cad ci bder spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-20: ces gsungs so; ;de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-22: bar du gcod pa thams cad zlog pa'i sgrub pa chen po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-24: gong ma bzhin du las brtsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-25: thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-26: rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:145b-27: rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-0: @146a *// bsregs dang lce pog nag por sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-2: bcug ste 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-3: drag po sngags kyis bsgrubs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-4: grub na rnal 'byor don ldan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-5: bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-7: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-8: rdo rje thal chen gyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-9: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-13: mandal gru bzhi pa gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-14: zla gam sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-15: mtha' khyud sgo bzhi ldan par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-16: rgyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-17: phyi yi khrus rnams byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-18: shar du kha bstan dbus su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-19: lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-20: rnal 'byor rnams kyis bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-21: phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-22: de yi khong du gzhal yas bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-23: rim par brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-25: don gyi lha mo lnga ru gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-26: kun gzhi kun tu bzang mor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146a-27: de yi thugs kyi khong thag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-0: @146b thig le zla ba nya rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-1: ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-2: thugs kar nor bu rin chen 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-3: dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-4: dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i bum pa la; ;h'um dmar til 'brur gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-5: bde chen byang chub sems zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-6: rdo rje gsang thag rgyun mi gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-7: rdo rje kha bra gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-8: de nas mtshan ma byung gyur na; ;dngos grub blangs te de bsgral la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-9: bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-11: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las; mchog phran thabs kyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-12: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-15: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-18: dngos por snang yang rang bzhin med pa yin te; rang bzhin med pa'i don ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-19: chos nyid rdo rje yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-21: sgyu ma'i chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-22: de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs bdag sgyu ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:146b-24: bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-1: gnas shing sgyu ma ched du bgyid lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-2: bdag cag rnams kyi don ched du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bshad du gsol zhes gsol pa las; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-6: chos rnams thams cad sgyu mar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-7: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-8: stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-9: mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-10: stong pa nyid la sgyu ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-12: de bzhin sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-13: gyin da tsam gyi rgyu rkyen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-14: cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha dad snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-15: snang yang dngos por ma grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-17: kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-18: rde'u dang shing bu'i rgyu dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-19: sman dang sngags kyis rkyen sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-21: sgyu ma'i gsang chig sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-22: sgyu ma'i bdag pos 'di skad bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-23: sgyu la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-24: she'u re'u sman gyis btab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-25: gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-28: chag shing dag gis brdabs byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147a-29: ji ltar 'dod pa sna tshogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-0: @147b bsdu bar 'dod na slar bzlog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-1: des na sgyu ma'i g-yeng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-2: drang ba'i thabs kyis dkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-3: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-4: sgyu ma rdo rje sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-5: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-7: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-9: phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-10: stegs bu kun tu gru bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-11: mu khyud gcig tu bskor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-12: zla ba kham pa'i dbyibs su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-13: sgo bzhi gru chad bzhir ldan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-14: dbyibs kyi thig le zlum po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-15: rdo rje dang ni nyi mas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-16: dbus su bhandha dpal ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-17: dpal chen yab yum sbyar la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-18: tshal bu brgyad la gnas brgyad sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-19: lte ba bskor te rim par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-20: thig le shar gyi sgo gang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-21: rdo rje rnal 'byor gsang ming dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-22: dngos grub gsol bya bris la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-23: mchod pa'i khyams su gyur pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-24: sgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-25: rim pa bzhin du mdzes par dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-26: rdo rje rnal 'byor de dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:147b-27: rdo rje lhag pa'i rtags kyis mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-2: 'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-3: dbang bskur las rnams kun rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-4: rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-5: cha gsum drag po sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-6: bar ma mi zad gter du sba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-7: byang chub sems kyi chu bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-8: chos nyid nam mkha'i dbyings chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-9: bha ga yum gyis gzhi la; ;shin tu sba ba'i tshul du sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-10: cha gcig gzhal yas shar sgo nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-11: bcu gsum gcal bar stegs bu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-12: der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-13: de bzhin bcu gsum lan re la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-14: gnas kyi mgron ni ma sring rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-15: bdun cu bar du kun rdzogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-16: tha mar mandal zla gam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-17: nus na mkha' 'gro nam mkha'i hom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-18: rdzogs bya ma lus de mgu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-19: lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-20: snyigs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-22: rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-23: gnas ni sba phyir su dag gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-24: mi rig phyir na mtshan ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-25: rang rang gnas su sleb par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-26: gang dag 'du tshe'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-27: 'di ni thig le gcig pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-28: sgrub lugs yin par rgyal bas bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148a-29: 'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-0: zla ba'i 'khor lo la gnas @148b nas; ;nyi ma'i 'khor lo thogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-1: yang dag chos kyi dbyings nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-2: dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-4: yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-6: 'di yang rim gyis gong ma ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-7: thams cad tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-8: phyi ru kun tu gru bzhi la; ;thig le zla ba gcig tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-9: de la srad bu bzhi bsnol bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-10: le'u tshe dgu ru gyur par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-11: phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-12: gru bzhi gru chad rab mdzes brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-13: de yi mtha' zad khyams gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-14: sgo gdong sgrub pa po la lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-15: dbus su thig le dkar dmar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-16: kha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-17: der ni dpal chen yab yum bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-18: phyi mtshams le'u tshe de brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-19: zla gam brkyang ba brgyad byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-20: ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-21: phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-22: sgrub pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes par dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-23: bsam bya sgrub pa la sogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-24: thams cad de bzhin 'dir sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-25: 'di ltar grub pa'i skyes bu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-26: chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-27: thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:148b-28: skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-0: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des cho 'phrul thams cad la @149a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-1: dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-4: kun tu gru bzhir ldan 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-5: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-6: gru chang bzhi yi phyi rol du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-7: sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-8: phyi khyams dmar nag me ri klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-9: shin tu brjid cing 'jigs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-10: thig le dbus kyi snying po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-11: zla gam 'bar bas mtshan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-12: rtsibs mchog brgyad la zla gam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-13: nang du lta bde brgyad dri; ;rtsibs mtshan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-14: rdo rje sgo ma bzhi rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-15: phyag rgya rim par bkram byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-16: sgrub pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-17: de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-20: dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-22: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-23: thig le sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149a-24: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-0: dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar @149b 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-2: 'di ni byas la sogs pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-3: 'di ltar sbyor dang phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-4: thabs la mkhas dang yo byad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-5: ji ltar rig par 'dir bsdu bya; ;de nas mandal 'dra gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-6: dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-7: zur bzhi mandal bzhi byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-8: bzhi las de bzhis chags res bstod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-13: khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-14: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-15: sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-16: yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-17: phyi khyams rdo rje me ri bya; ;de yi phyi rol phreng chen gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-18: skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-19: de yi phyi rol me gur 'tshub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-20: bskal pa'i bu yug bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-21: rdo rje sgo khyud sgo gang du; ;gu gu thul dang zar tshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-22: zhing dang sbrul kyi chun po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-23: de nas bhandha dpal ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-24: rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-25: bris la kha sbyar sgrub ste gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-26: ga'u chung la ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-27: brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-28: las byed brgya dang bcu gnyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:149b-29: las byed bcu gnyis bris la 'god //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-2: gdol pa 'byung po nga rgyal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-3: chags sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-4: de yi dug gsum bshig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-5: don gyi sgrub pa chen po bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-6: ru tra lnga yi tshogs chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-7: ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-8: rdo rje drod kyis rnam par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-9: mdo yis la stabs gcig tu'o; ;bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-10: dug lnga rtog pa nyid las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-11: phyed dang gsum gyi dur khrod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-12: gzhi rtsa ngag dang lus sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-13: brjid ldan dpal chen dur khrod bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-15: srid gsum ru tra dur khrod du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-16: tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-17: ma rig mun khang sgo phyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-18: glang chen smon pa de bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-19: gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-20: dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-21: ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-22: nyon mongs dpung rgod de btul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-23: ye shes thabs kyis rnam sbyangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-24: nam mkha'i klong du dmigs med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-25: bde chen mchod pa'i tshogs chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-26: ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-27: chos kyi longs spyod rgyas par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-28: mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150a-29: dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-2: gtum thung rngam pa mgyogs pa tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-3: phyag brnyan char chen phab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-4: 'khor ba'i tha ba spangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-5: bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-6: byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i lo tog bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-8: dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-9: mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-10: rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bting //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-11: nga ni dur khrod dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-12: sangs rgyas sku ste ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-13: thugs rje rnon po'i dmag tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-14: ye shes rnon po'i mtshon cha yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-15: lo tog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-16: gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-17: dbyibs 'dra'i thab ni brtsigs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-18: snying gar 'khor lo'i thab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-19: rigs kyi yam shing lnga brtsigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-20: hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen brtsig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-21: thab chen lnga yi hom khung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-22: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yam shing la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-23: ye shes chen po'i me klong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-24: nyon mongs lnga yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-25: bya bar sbyor ba mtha' dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:150b-28: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-1: can gnon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-2: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-4: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i don 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-7: 'khor khang can gyi gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-8: khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-9: bzhi ni 'khor khang khyams de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-10: phyogs bzhi dag tu brtsam par bya; ;dri zhim tsandan 'de gu gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-11: dri spos tshom bu rin chen 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-12: sbyin mchog rgyas par de bsham bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-13: lha yi dge bsnyen rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-14: phyogs mtshams srung ba'i las rnams bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-15: khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mtshams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-16: chag phyed pa yi stegs bu bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-17: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bris la; ;sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-18: mthun pa'i gzugs bcu dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-19: khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-20: de nas ma tram gnon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-21: dregs pa ru tra sdig can 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-22: nam yang bsgral ba'i zhing yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-23: dza: h'um bam ho ma h'a shr'i he ru ka ma trang ru dra ha ha pra be sha phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151a-24: kha tv'am phyag rgyas bskyel nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-0: ma @151b rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-1: rnam shes aa ru byin brlabs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-2: gsang chen thugs kyi klong du bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-3: sbubs ni gzhal yas 'bar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-4: stegs bu ma tram gzugs 'dra la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-6: kha dog sngo skya gan rkyal thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-7: che chung tshad med gnas kyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-8: de yi snying gar bang rim gsum; ;dang por dmar po gru bzhi brtsig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-9: gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-10: gsum pa smug nag zla gam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-11: yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-12: gsang sgo gnyis te brgyad dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-13: stegs bu chag phyed gru bzhi brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-14: de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-15: zla gam gsal ba'i mandal bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-16: de dag me klong 'bar bar bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-17: ya thog zla gam steng dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-18: dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-19: mthing nag gru gsum me dpung bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-20: gru bzhi'i dmar po bang rim la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-21: rigs bzhi lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-22: yan lag mgo mtshan g-yas g-yon brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-23: dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-24: bri bya yang na mtshan ma gzhag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-26: ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:151b-27: sgo bzhir gsang ba sgo mar gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-0: mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam @152a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-1: la; ;bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-2: ming ngam mtshan ma brten te gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-3: de yi kha la thab tu brtsig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-6: bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-9: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-13: dug gsum dbang du sgyur pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-14: 'di ltar khong du chud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-15: dug gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-16: sku gsum nyid kyi ngo bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-17: gzhan nas btsal ba ci yang med //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-19: kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-20: thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-21: stegs bu 'dom gang ba zhig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-22: phyir dmar po rgyas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-23: de nas mthing nag gru gsum brtsig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-25: zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152a-26: dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-0: bar rim bar @152b la dur khrod 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-1: mtha' mar dmar po gru bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-2: sgo bzhi sgo srung bcas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-3: de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor //
