K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-7: des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-8: dug gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-10: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-11: dug gsum dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-12: /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-14: chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-16: bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-17: chags pa khrag khrig rgya mtsho yin; ;las kyi 'khor ba'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-18: chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-19: chags las rnam grol 'gog pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-20: chags pa de nyid khrag ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-21: khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-22: bud med khrag gi rgya mtsho rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-23: 'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:152b-24: de ltar shes par gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-2: las gyi brtsam pa phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-3: rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-5: 'khor lo bzhi yi thig tu gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-6: mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-7: de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-8: kun gyi phyi rim lag chu hva'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-9: me ri 'bar bas gtib thag gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-10: dbus su shar lta zla gam bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-11: bhandha dpal ldan yab yum dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-12: 'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-13: bar khyams gnyis la gnas yul rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-14: zla gam thig ler ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-15: sgo khyams sgo bzhi zla gam bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-16: phyi khyams lag chu hva yi me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-17: me yi khro bo thig ler bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-18: dur khrod rgyan gyis kun brgyan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-19: ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-20: 'jug pa dbang bskur dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-21: gnas gsung la sogs rdzogs par bya; ;zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-22: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-23: 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153a-24: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-1: bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-3: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-4: 'tsho ba chos nyid kyi rtsi yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-7: de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-8: de ltar shes nas kun rdzob tu 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-9: ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-10: ma tram khog pa'i snying ga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-11: 'dom gang tshad dang mthun pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-13: me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-14: rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-15: mtha' ma sgo khyud 'bar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-16: dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-17: der ni phyag rgya 'bar ba dgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-19: ral pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-21: srid pa gsum ril 'dir sgrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-22: dus bzhi mchod pa'i dam rdzas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-23: de dag ji ltar rigs par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-24: dus bzhi bcud smin snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-25: dngos grub chen po'i rdzas su bya; ;phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-26: rmad du byung ba'i ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:153b-27: 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-2: dbyid rlung nam mkha' gsang bar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-3: cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-4: de dag ral pa can la bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-5: ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-6: 'byung lnga las byung sha rigs lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-7: khyi sha ba lang rta sha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-8: bya dang ri dvags sna tshogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-9: rdzu 'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-10: sgrub pa'i rdzas chen 'byung chen lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-11: 'jig rten kun la dbang sgyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-12: de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-13: ting 'dzin sgom dang sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-14: thams cad gong dang mthun sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-15: 'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-16: ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-18: bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-19: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-21: gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po ni; ;gong ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-22: mandal tshad dang mthun pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-24: phyi rim zla gam dmar po bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-25: rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes par bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-26: me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-27: zla gam mtha' zad bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-28: rin chen ge sar phreng bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154a-29: padma'i lce la bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-0: sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar @154b bas bya; ;phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-1: dbus su gser phor sul med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-2: dung chen 'khor ba can gyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-3: shar du shel phor sul 'greng la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-4: rin chen mdzod spu gsal bar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-5: lho ru rin chen sul mang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-6: rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-7: nub tu rgya phor zla gam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-8: bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur gnyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-9: byang du bse phor rgya gram la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-10: gtsug tor rin chen 'bur bzhi rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-11: rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-12: sgo lnga'i gtso bo rigs su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-13: dbus nas shar lho nub byang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-14: ka ko la dang bu rus ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-15: dza' ti pha la kha dri zhim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-16: lce po dkar zhes rim par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-17: de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-18: aa ru ra dang ga pur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-19: gur gum padma li ga bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-20: de na ra sa ya na rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-21: thams cad rigs dang kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-22: las dang mthun par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-23: sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-24: dpal dang ldan pa'i snod nang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-25: yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-26: dbus dang padma lce la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-27: gnas yul la sogs mdzes par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-28: dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis rdzas; ;'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad bsham //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-29: de nas byin phab dngos grub gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-30: thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:154b-31: dam pa de nyid gsang tshon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-1: brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-2: thams cad sbyang ba'i mchog tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-3: de nas khrol bu sbyang ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-4: gsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-5: khrus bya ba dang bshags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-6: yon tan brjod dang byin dbab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-7: de nas skad cig thang gcig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-8: zhag gcig dag gis sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-9: rtags dag byung na der 'byongs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-10: phye ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-11: snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-12: bsdus te btag pa'i cho ga yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-13: yum gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-14: rig 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing drang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-15: so so las kyi sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-16: gtan gtun thabs dang shes rab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-17: sman nyid byang chub sems su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-18: rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-19: kun tu bzang mo'i gzhal yas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-20: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-21: 'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar; ;ye shes lnga ru gsal pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-22: 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-23: 'chi med bdud rtsis gcong rnying sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-24: mtshan ma btag phyir bcal nas ni; ;rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-25: kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis dkri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-26: rdo rje dbang gi rgya yis gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155a-27: rdo rje sngags kyis gzungs kyis gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-0: @155b dpal chen sku lngar mnga' gsol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-1: ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-2: mandal dag tu dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-3: kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-4: rtsi dang sman gyi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-5: rtags dang rig 'dzin phra mo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-6: rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-7: sgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams pas dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-8: bkra shis gos kyis rgyas par klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-9: gzungs thag gnyer can rigs su dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-10: ting 'dzin me yis rnam par sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-11: rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-12: myur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-13: bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-14: dpal ldan padma ldan pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-15: thams cad bdud rtsir sa ma ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-16: mkha' klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-17: rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-18: gzhan nas bsgrub pa ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-19: 'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-20: tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-22: bdud rtsi phye ma'i sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-23: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-25: thams cad de 'drar sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-27: phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:155b-28: sman sbyang btags btsags btsal nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-1: bur bya; ;bse phor mtshan ldan nang du gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-2: legs par kha sbyar ras kyis dkri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-3: gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-4: dngos grub mchog rnams bdag gis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-6: bdud rtsi ri lu'i cho ga rnam par bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-7: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-9: skyo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-10: thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-11: mtshan ma gsal po byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-12: phye ma chu tshags nang nas dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-13: phye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-14: phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-15: bse phor kha sbyar nang du blugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-16: rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-18: sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-19: rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-20: bcud kyi khu ba thams cad sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-21: rin chen ga'u mtshan ldan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-22: blugs te kha sbyar rgyas btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-24: byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-25: dngos grub chen po blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-26: phye ma'i sgrub rdzas de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-27: cha lnga dag tu bgos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-28: rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-29: ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156a-30: sbyar chang cha lngar bgos pa nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-0: rnal 'byor so so'i cha @156b rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-1: sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-2: zla ba gcig tu thos pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-3: ba spu rangs shing gnyer ma rangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-4: zla ba gnyis su zos byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-6: zla ba gsum gyi phan yon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-7: nad kyi bskal pa dag las thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-8: zla bzhi phan chad gang zag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-9: zas dang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-10: gzhan gyi nad rnams 'joms par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-11: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-13: dgu dang bcu la zag pa zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-16: bdud rtsi skyo ma'i sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-17: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-19: rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-20: lde gu'i cho ga chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-21: 'di ltar khong du chud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-22: sbrang rtsi bu ram rgun 'brum rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-23: lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-24: kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-25: lo yi 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-26: sman gyi rgyal mo rab mnye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-27: rgyun du gsos pa'i 'o ma de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-29: bdud rtsi rgyal mo rab mnye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-30: phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:156b-31: lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-0: sus mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs @157a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-2: bsgrub rdzas de dag bkram nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-3: bdud rtsi sgrub pa de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-4: dus bab pa yi tshod rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-5: bsgrub rdzas de dag thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-6: ba yi 'o mas lde gur sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-7: cha res bskyed cing bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-8: zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-9: zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-10: zhes gsungs so; ;bdud rtsi lde gu'i sgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-11: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-13: 'di yang gong ma ltar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-14: de dang mi mthun bsgrub rdzas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-15: bdud rtsir 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-16: thams cad thams cad bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-17: til chen la sogs zhun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-18: thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-19: gnas kyang gong ma bzhin btsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-20: bdud rtsi bkram nas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-22: grub pa'i rdzas su gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-23: sman rnams phye mar btags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-24: de dag phye mar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-25: zhun chen dag dang sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-26: sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-27: dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-28: gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157a-29: lo yis bshugs te 'phrad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-0: 'tsho ba bdud rtsi @157b zhun gyis sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-1: bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-2: ba spu langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-3: kham gyi zas bral bde bar 'tsho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-4: shes rab gsal zhing thogs pa med; ;zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-6: bdud rtsi zhun chen gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-7: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-9: rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-10: thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-11: mandal thig le lnga pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-12: bkra shis dpal ldan lnga bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-13: gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-14: rlon par bkod nas yi ger sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-15: ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me sbar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-16: dang po ro 'byung bskoms pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-17: de nas btags btsags gong ma bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-18: sbyar nas rigs kyis bsnyen pas sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-19: des ni mtshan ma byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-20: de bzhin gong ltar cir bder spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-22: bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-23: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:157b-24: bdud rtsi sman gyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-0: de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des sgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa @158a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-2: 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-3: dbyings su shes par bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-4: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni; dbyings su 'dus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-7: de gnyis su med pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-8: chos nyid byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-11: thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-13: de ltar na; kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-14: gnyis su med pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-16: dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-17: thams cad rang gi sems la rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-18: kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-19: lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-20: des na chos rnams thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-21: rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-22: 'di dag sgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-23: rnam par rtog pa'i rdul bsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-24: sgrub pa'i rgyal po yab yum gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-25: don la mkhas par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-26: so so'i thugs la thig le dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158a-27: zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-0: de yi rdzas mchog chen po @158b yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-1: thabs kyi ga pur chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-2: shes rab gsang ba'i tsandan gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-3: dkar dmar zla gam chen por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-4: yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-5: thig le kha ni mar lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-6: yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-7: thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-8: yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-9: dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-10: dbus su aom gsal nang du h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-11: yum gyi thig le'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-12: padma dbus su zla ba bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-13: dbus su aa gsal nang du h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-14: de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-15: kun tu bzang po yab yum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-16: gnyis su med par bsgyur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-17: ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-18: ngang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-19: gsang ba gnyis kyi mchod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-20: rang las byung ba'i dngos grub dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-21: rang nyid la ni bstim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-22: 'di ltar sgrub pa gtsor byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-23: bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-24: bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-25: lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-26: bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-27: bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-28: gang zag mi yi zas la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-29: de yang lo yi skad cig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-30: gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-31: lo yi skad cig bar du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:158b-32: bdud rtsi yod byad rnams la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-2: gcig gam gnyis kyi bar dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-3: rang las byung ba'i rdzas rnam lngas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-4: 'phags pa mchod cing rang gis bza'; ;des ni drod la gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-5: drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-6: lo yi skad cig thang gcig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-7: ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-8: kham gyi zas dang bral bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-9: drod chen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-10: rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-12: rin chen phung po 'dod pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-13: sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-16: me yi phung po 'jil 'dod na; ;sdigs pa'i mdzub mo 'phyar nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-17: bden pa'i bsgo ba byas pas 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-18: de la sogs pa thams cad nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-19: rtags thob phan chad sangs rgyas yin; ;zhes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-20: gsang chen thugs kyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-21: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159a-22: bka' gsang chen 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de rdo rje me klong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i @159b ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-1: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ma'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-2: de nas 'khor rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-3: ae ma'o sems dpa' che ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-4: ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-5: cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-6: thabs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-7: chos kun me klong bzhin du snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-8: me nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-10: mun bsal dngos po thams cad bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-11: bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-12: dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-13: thugs rje chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-14: don grub chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-15: sgeg pa chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-16: 'jigs byed chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-17: dgyes pa chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-18: dregs pa chen po aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-19: dpa' bo khyod kyis sbyin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-20: bdag cag rnams la bshad pa shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-21: me yi rang bzhin chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-22: bdag cag rnams la bshad par gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-23: zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-24: sems dpa'i rdo rjes dgyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-26: rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:159b-27: bshad kyi khyed rnams gus par nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-2: rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-3: rgyal ba kun mnyes kun sreg skong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-4: don grub las kyi mchog tu bshad; ;skye med rnam dag hom khung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-5: chos can skye ba'i yam shing la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-6: spros med byang chub ye shes mes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-7: mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim; ;rnam dag bha ga'i hom khung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-8: chags pa'i yam shing spungs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-9: bde chen byang chub me sbar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-10: 'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim; ;dpal chen zhal gyi hom khu 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-11: nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-12: ye shes lnga yi me sbar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-13: gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs thim; ;snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-14: 'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-15: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi me sbar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-16: snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim; ;las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-17: phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-18: ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-19: shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-20: mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-21: zlum po padma le'u tshe zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-22: 'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160a-23: zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-0: gru gsum bha ga kha @160b mngon sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-1: sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-2: las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-3: ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-4: bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-6: rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-7: mchod pa gsang ba dus tshigs sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-8: rdo rje lam gyi smon lam sbyor; ;gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-9: bshar gdab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-10: rgyas dang dbang bshar rgyud bshar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-11: lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-12: de bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-13: rigs kyi lha rgyud lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-14: so so'i rigs su bshar gdab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-15: klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-16: dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-17: sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-18: bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-19: skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-20: 'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-21: chos can rkyen dang 'byung gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-22: rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-23: skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-24: 'di ni skye ba'i chos can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-25: rang byung bsreg rdzas rang zhir thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-26: nyon mongs lnga yi dam rngas dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:160b-27: ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:164b-11: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-0: @165a *// kun la snyoms pa'i phyag rgya yin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-5: aa dang ma gnyis rting sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-6: so phreng mche ba'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-7: shin tu kha gal ba yi tshul //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-10: aa yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-11: 'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165a-12: ma dang aa yis mgo mjug nas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:165b-11: me tog la sogs tsandan phreng //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:166a-10: dug gi phung po 'joms byed pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:166b-6: aa las aam byung gsung gi mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-19: gong ma bzhin du bkod gsal la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-20: byi ru bung ba mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-21: gong ma bzhin du 'phur lding pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-22: bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-23: ji ltar me mgal 'khor tshul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-24: dpal be'u smug po'i klong du bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-25: kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-26: bkod pa'i gong ma thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-27: mthing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-28: khyung chen gzan la 'jums tshod tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:168b-29: h'um sgra 'byin cing phan tshun lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-2: dran pa'i dkyil nas dza phyung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-4: dpal be'u'i dkyil na spungs pa yis; ;ru lu rin chen phung po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-5: bsdus shing drangs te gnas su bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-6: 'bab pa'i shugs sam byin rlabs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-7: mtsho la ser chen 'dril ltar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-8: 'di ltar yi ger sbyar ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-9: rnal 'byor nyag gcig ma yin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-10: lha mchog dbyings nas zhugs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-11: chos nyid dang du mi dmigs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-12: rnal 'byor mchog gis bskul ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-13: thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-14: srog rtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-17: gug skyed klad kor tsheg par phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-18: ra ri khal khol sgrib med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-19: ye shes don la mkhyen rig rgyas; ;de lta mod kyang 'dul dbang gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-20: rgyal ba bskul ba'i sa la gzhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-21: rnal 'byor gso ba'i cho ga byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-22: lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-23: bzlas brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-24: sbyor bas don la nye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-25: 'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169a-26: byin rlabs phebs sam nye ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-0: rtags sam drod @169b dam mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-1: rnal 'byor nyid dang bsgrub rdzas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-2: yod mthong sgra thos kun la 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-3: lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-4: sems kyi rtags su gsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-5: dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-6: shing bal lta bur yang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-7: mi bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-8: rigs la ting 'dzin gsal ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-9: rmi lam du yang mos par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-10: dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-11: gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-12: ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-13: 'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob ste; ;dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-16: mi zad mang du 'phel ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-17: mngar 'jam dang zhing ro mchog rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-18: lto la mi gnod mgrin la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-20: sil snyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-22: rdo rje pra rnams bzang ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-23: rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-24: smyur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-25: bde dang ga 'u'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-27: dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-28: yab yum sbyor ba'i lhag sems dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-29: ma phebs pa yi bar du dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:169b-30: shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-2: zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-3: kha dog lnga yi dar g-yab kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-5: rol mo cha byad mang po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-6: rdo rje gar dang snyan pa'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-7: srid pa'i ma mo kun rten cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-8: byin rlabs chen po dbab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-9: phebs ma thag tu dngos grub bstim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-11: ye shes rgyan gyi las yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-12: zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-13: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-14: rdo rje glu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-15: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-18: gang dag 'jug par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-19: rnal 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-20: snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-21: byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-22: tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-23: ae ma bde mchog dga' tshal 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-25: dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170a-26: gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-0: de @170b skad gsol te zhus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-1: gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-2: rgyud sbyangs rgyud drug las sgo gcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-4: dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-5: phyag rgya dbang dang bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-6: 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-7: 'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-8: rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-9: h'um lnga dag gis mnan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-10: bcug pa de yi spyi bor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-11: pa yi ye shes la bskrun pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-12: padma kha bzhi lte ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-13: mi dang lha yi sa bon dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-14: shar lho nub dang byang dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-15: lha min dud 'gro yi dvags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-16: dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-17: h'um gis lam sgo gcad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-18: lag gnyis mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-19: sor mo gsum sbyar dpral bar bsnol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-20: lha dang lha min gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-21: mi gtong zlog pa'i phyag rgya yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-22: lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-23: mi yi khams nas zlog pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-24: khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgrengs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-25: g-yon gyi steng du mnan pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-26: byol song gnas nas zlog pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-27: thal mo mnyam sbyar gung rtse sprad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-28: gung mo rgyab tu srin lag bsnol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-29: mgul nas mdzub mos 'khyud pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:170b-30: yi dvags khams las zlog pa'i rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-1: sbyar te; ;srin lag gung mdzub gcig nas gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-2: 'khyud pa dmyal ba'i sgo gcod rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-3: lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-4: ngag gi rdo rje rgya brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-5: kye ma ru tra kro dha kyi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-6: hri sa ma pa tsa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-8: 'di ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-9: sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-10: rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-13: rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-14: byams mgon khyod la skyabs su mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-15: de skad gsol ba btab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-16: rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-17: 'jug pa de yi spyi bos gtugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-18: sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-19: rdo rje gsang mchog gsung las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-20: srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-21: dbang bskur snang ba chen po sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-22: a'a ti ho sta hri da kham//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-23: de nas snod du gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-24: gsang ba'i mig ni dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-25: me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-26: de nas dam tshig chen po bsgrag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-27: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-29: rgyal ba thams cad bslus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-31: khros nas snying khrag thogs pas 'thung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171a-32: badzra sa ma ya ai dan the na ra kan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-0: ba ra @171b hri da ya na ma ba sti n'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-1: sa ma ya raksha siddhi badyi badzra aa mri to da kam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-2: rdo rje tha tshig chu blud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-3: rdo rje gal chen mna' dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-4: rdo rje dam tshig sdom pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-5: thams cad thams cad dbog par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-6: slob pa'i gnyer yang dbog par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-7: kye rig 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-8: rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i sras kyi yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-9: gzhan yang gsang ba ma smra zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-10: gal te smras na dmyal bar 'tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-11: khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-12: rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'jin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-13: gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-14: zhing khams kun tu bde bar spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-15: des ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-17: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-18: rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug ba'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-19: de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su rdzogs pa dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-21: srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-22: bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-23: gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-24: phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-25: sgrub pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-26: bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:171b-27: rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-1: dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-3: kun gyis 'da' bar dka' ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-4: tshig btsan yul la dbang sgyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-5: rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-6: sku lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-7: rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-8: rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-9: sbyor ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-10: dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-11: shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-12: don dang ldan par gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-13: mtha' gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-14: gzungs ma'i rgyal mo chen mo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-15: gnyis med yongs su rdzogs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-16: thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-17: byang chub sems dang don du 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-18: shes rab chen po rdzogs pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-19: bkra shis chen po bum ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-20: bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-21: dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-22: dbang chen de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-23: gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-24: yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-25: bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang mchog kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-26: gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-27: don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-28: 'dod rgur re skong rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172a-29: rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-0: rgyal @172b po mchog tu dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-2: bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-3: khyad par chen por gyur pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-4: khri chen dag la gzhag par bya; ;cod pan me tog phreng la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-5: dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan gyis klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-6: dbu rgyan do shal se mo do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-7: dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-8: dbang thob rgyal pos de la sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-9: dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i rgyal po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-10: dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-11: rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po zhes par ni; ;kun gyis sgra chen 'bod cing bsgrag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-12: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-13: rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-14: 'jig rten kun la kha lo sgyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-15: dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-16: phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-17: bla med mchog gi rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-18: gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-19: shin tu gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-20: gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-21: gnang chen po yi rtags su byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-22: gsang ba'i don la nyan cing bslab pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-23: dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:172b-24: bdud rtsi chu 'dis rna ba'i gsang sgo dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-1: ta th'a ga ta sta ma ti ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-2: glegs bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-3: rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-4: des na 'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-5: las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sgrub pa'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-6: rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-7: bu mchog de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya; ;gzhan gyi re 'dod skong ba'i bu mchog de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-8: rgyal po rgyal rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-9: rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyud du byung bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-10: tantra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-11: des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun skyong nus phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-12: bstan pa sgrog pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-13: rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-14: theg chen dgu yi rtags dang bcas te sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-15: de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-16: sa rnams non pa'i rtags mchog gdan khri'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-17: lha chen la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-18: khyu mchog seng+ge ma he gzig dang stag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-19: gtum pa'i dom gyis spar te sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-20: rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-21: skye la dbang sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-22: pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173a-23: bdag gzhan don sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-0: dgos 'dod yid bzhin @173b skong ba'i rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-1: rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-2: de ni rgyal pa'i mchog sras yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-3: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-4: ras sam 'bur ram lugs su blugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-5: phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-6: ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-7: ye shes lnga yi rtags mchog phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-8: gnas lngar gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-9: aom mah'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba aatma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-10: aom mah'a a'a darsha ta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-11: aom mah'a sa man dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aatma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-12: aom mah'a pra tya preksha na dzny'a na sva bh'a ba aatma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-13: aom mah'a kri ty'a nushth'a na dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-14: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-15: rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-16: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-17: rdo rje can la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:173b-23: dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-0: @174a *// don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-1: bdud 'dul bkra shis rdzas mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-2: rtags kyis brgyan te sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-3: don rnams grub pa'i bu mchog de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-4: rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-5: zhing khams kun tu grags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-6: rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-7: nang du 'jug pa'i dbang thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-8: de dag kun la spyod sgrub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-9: dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-10: skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-11: sems kyi dbang bskur thob pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-12: shes rab chen po rig pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-13: sems lon don gyi gtan tshigs sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-14: bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-15: btsal med gnas pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-16: snying rje chen po'i bde mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-17: khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-18: sbyin gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-19: thams cad rdzogs par nus pa yi; ;rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-20: thong gshol 'bar ba sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-21: dug gsum gting nas sprug pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-22: rtags chen ga 'u rnam pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-23: dmar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-24: dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-25: srid gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174a-26: dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-0: ka @174b tar la sogs mtshon cha rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-1: dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-2: 'khor ba'i chos la spyir spyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-3: skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-4: rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni; ;rnam dag rdzas kyi padma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-5: las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-6: dbang mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-7: sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-8: dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-9: yum dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-10: chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-12: dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin; ;gsang ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-13: dri med rnam dag lha mo zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-14: mtshan ldan shin tu brgyan byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-15: dbang thob de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-16: dbang thob rgyal po chen po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-17: kun gyi bdag po yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-18: rol mo dri dang zhal zas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-19: 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-20: nye ba'i longs spyod rgyan rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-21: thams cad thams cad sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-22: sgrub pa'i las la dbang thob phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-24: rgyal ba thams cad sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-25: rdo rje tshe dang sman la sogs; ;sgrub pa ma lus sgrubs shig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-26: bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:174b-27: rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-0: dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i @175a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-1: phyir; ;rig 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-2: rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-3: bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-4: gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-5: gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-6: dga' ba byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-7: kun tu tshim par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-8: dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-9: dbang thob de yi lce la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-10: btsal mod byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-11: shes rab chen po'i rtsal gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-12: chos sku sgyu mar dbang bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-13: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-14: rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-15: kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-16: chos la sems kyi dbang thob na; ;rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-17: srid gsum dbang can thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-18: de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-19: dbang gi tshad ni 'di lta ste; ;dad ldan sri zhur ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-20: gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang chen bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-21: rnam bzhi las kyi don tshang na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-22: las rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-23: lta ba'i dmigs bus chos mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-25: rkyen thub tshad ma gsum ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175a-26: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-0: dam @175b pa mdzod gsum thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-1: phyogs med par ni 'chad shes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-2: rab 'byams rgyal po'i dbang thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-3: dad med blo zhan rdzob pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-4: tshul 'chos mkhan la ras gcod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-5: de ni dbang gis 'tshig par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-6: gsang med brjed ngas dbang mi 'chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-7: dad med g-yel rmugs dbang mi dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-8: snod med bcud bral kun stongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-9: des ni dbang thob ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-10: snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang thob na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-11: dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyud ces bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-13: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-14: rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-16: sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams cad kyi me long yin par rig nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa shin tu dga' ba chen po'i glu 'di blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-18: nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi mtha' las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:175b-19: dpag med byams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-2: rdo rje che mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-3: 'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khrag la rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-4: thugs kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i tha la rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-5: yul med ma skyes mtshan ma'i g-yul las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-6: bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-7: shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-8: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-9: dpa' rtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-10: rtog 'joms ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-11: dam pa'i don gsungs gnyis med ston pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-12: smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-13: rin chen gter ldan 'dod rgur kun skong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-14: lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-15: brda can yang dag len pa'i me long gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-16: rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal ba'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-17: chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-18: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-19: ngo mtshar bstod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-098-001:176a-20: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs so ////
